SA20bsa034_u:5: daśeme dharmāḥ saphalasya bodhisattvamārgasya mahāyānasya saṃgrahāya saṃvartante /
SA20bsa034_u:7: ādhāro liṅgaṃ pakṣo 'dhyāśayo vihāra upapattiḥ parigraho bhūmiścaryā pratiṣṭhā ca /
SA20bsa034_u:12: iha bodhisattvasya svagotraṃ prathamaścittotpādaḥ sarve ca bodhipakṣyā dharmā ādhāra ityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:14: iha bodhisattvo gotraṃ niśritya pratiṣṭhāpayitavyo bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:17: iha bodhisattvaḥ prathamacittotpādaṃ niśritya pratiṣṭhāya dāne 'pi prayujyate śīle kṣāntau vīryeṃ dhyāne prajñāyāmapi prayujyate iti /
SA20bsa034_u:18: yadvā pāramitāsu puṇyasaṃbhāre jñānasaṃbhāre sarveṣu ca bodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu prayujyate /
SA20bsa034_u:20: iha bodhisattvastameva bodhisattvacaryāprayogaṃ niśritya pratiṣṭhāyānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ paripūrayati /
SA20bsa034_u:22: agotrastha pudgalo gotre 'sati cittotpāde 'pi yatnasamāśraye satyabhavyaścānuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ paripūraye /
SA20bsa034_u:23: tadanena paryāyeṇa veditavyamanutpāditacittasyāpi bodhisattvasya akṛte 'pi bodhisattvacaryāprayoge gotramādhāra iti /
SA20bsa034_u:24: sa cet punargotrasthaścittaṃ notpādayati bodhicaryāsu na prayujyate na kṣipraṃ bodhimārāgayati tāsvapi [Dutt_2] viparyayāt kṣipramārāgayatīti veditavyam /
SA20bsa034_u:39: tena khalu gotreṇa samanvāgatānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānatikramya prāgevānyān sattvānniruttaro viśeṣo veditavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:43: tatra sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ tadgotraṃ kleśāvaraṇaviśuddhyā viśudhyati na tu jñeyāvaraṇaviśuddhyā /
SA20bsa034_u:44: bodhisattvagotraṃ punarapi kleśāvaraṇaviśuddhyā api jñeyāvaraṇaviśuddhyā viśudhyati /
SA20bsa034_u:46: api ca caturbhirākārairbodhisattvasya śrāvakapratyekabuddhebhyo viśeṣo veditavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:54: bodhisattvaḥ apyātma hitāya api parahitāya bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai arthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanuṣyāṇām /
SA20bsa034_u:56: śrāvakaḥ pratyekabuddhaśca skandhadhātvāyatanapratītyasamutpāda-sthānāsthānasatyakauśalyaṃ karoti bodhisattvastatra cānyeṣu ca sarvavidyāsthāneṣu /
SA20bsa034_u:67: satsu ca saṃvidyamāneṣu deyadharmeṣu satatasamitaṃ pareṣāṃ saṃvibhāgaśīlo bhavati pramuditacittaśca dadāti na vimanaskaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:76: pṛṣṭo 'pṛṣṭo vā teṣu teṣu sattvakṛtyeṣvanapāyamihaloke paraloke nyāyopadeśamanuprayacchati /
SA20bsa034_u:80: ṛṇaṃ gṛhītvā parebhyo na visaṃvādayati nābhidruhyati /
SA20bsa034_u:87: udāreṣu ca karmānteṣvadhimukto bhavati na parīttāyadvāreṣu /
SA20bsa034_u:93: hrīvyapatrāpyaṃ prāviṣkaroti vipule 'pi ca bhogapratilambhe nādhimātralolupo bhavati prāgevālpe /
SA20bsa034_u:94: itimānyevaṃ bhāgīyāni bodhisattvasya dānapāramitāyā gotraliṅgāni veditavyāni /
SA20bsa034_u:97: iha bodhisattvaḥ prakṛtyā mṛdunā kāyavāṅmanaskarmaṇā samanvāgato bhavatyakuśalena nātyartharaudreṇa nātyarthasattvopaghātakena /
SA20bsa034_u:98: kṛtvāpi ca pāpakaṃ karma laghu ladhveva vipratisāraṃ pratilabhate /
SA20bsa034_u:106: upakāriṣu ca sattveṣu kṛtajño bhavati kṛtavedī /
SA20bsa034_u:112: parabādhayā cāttyartha bādhyate yaduta pareṣāṃ vadhabandhanacchedanatāḍanakutsanatarjanādikayā dṛṣṭvā vā śrutvā vā /
SA20bsa034_u:115_0: parakṛtyeṣu ca parakaraṇīyeṣu sahāyībhāvaṃ gacchati yaduta kṛṣivaṇijyāgorakṣyarājapauruṣyalipigaṇananyasanasaṃkhyāmudrāyāṃ
SA20bsa034_u:116: na kalahabhaṇḍanavigrahavivādeṣu ca paraviheṭhanakaraṇīyeṣu ye ātmanaḥ pareṣāñcānarthāyāhitāya duḥkhāya saṃvartante /
SA20bsa034_u:120: samānakṣāntiśīlatayā apahāya svakāryaṃ parairātmakārye yathākāmaṃ niyojyate /
SA20bsa034_u:121: ārdracittaśca bhavati peśalacitto na ca ciramāghātacittatāṃ pratighacittatāmudvahati nānyatra tatkṣaṇa evāsya taccittaṃ bhadratāyāṃ parivartate /
SA20bsa034_u:123: na ca pareṣāṃ mitrabhedaṃ rocayati na karoti /
SA20bsa034_u:125: priyaṃvadaśca bhavatyaparakaṭukaḥ api svakasya dāsādiparijanasya prāgeva pareṣām guṇapriyaśca bhavati pareṣāṃ bhūtasya varṇasyāhartā /
SA20bsa034_u:128: iha bodhisattvaḥ prakṛtyā pareṣāmantikādapakāraṃ labdhvā nāghātacittatāṃ prāviṣkaroti nāpyapakārāya prapadyate /
SA20bsa034_u:130: na ca khilaṃ dhārayati na cirakālikaṃ vairāśayaṃ vahati /
SA20bsa034_u:134: kālyotthāyī sāyaṃ nipātī na nidrāsukhaṃ śayanasukhaṃ pārśvasukhamatyarthaṃ svīkaroti /
SA20bsa034_u:135: pratyupasthite ca kṛtye abhibhūyākartukāmatāmālasyaṃ pratisaṃkhyāya prayujyate tasya kṛtyasyābhiniṣpattaye /
SA20bsa034_u:136: sarvakṛtyasamārambheṣu ca dṛḍhaniścayo bhavati nākṛtvā nāpariprāpya sarveṇa sarvaṃ vīryasraṃsayati antarā vā viṣādamāpadyate /
SA20bsa034_u:137: udāreṣu ca parameṣvartheṣu na cetasā saṃkocamāpadyate /
SA20bsa034_u:140_0: vīraśca bhavati mahāsabhāpraveśe vā paraiḥ sahābhiprayoga pratyabhiyoge vā tadanyatra
SA20bsa034_u:140_1: vā duṣkarakarmaṇi mahāvyavasāyeṣvapi cārthopasaṃhiteṣu nātyarthaṃ khedamāpadyate prāgeva parītteṣu /
SA20bsa034_u:143: iha bodhisattvaḥ prakṛtyā dharmārthopanidhyāne avikṣepabahulo bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:145_0: ca prāntāni śayanāsanāni manuṣyarahaḥsevitāni vigatapāpakāni pratisaṃlayanasārūpyakāṇi
SA20bsa034_u:145_1: dṛṣṭvā śrutvā sukhaṃ tannaiṣkramyaṃ prāvivekyamiti [Dutt_6] naiṣkramyaprāvivekye
SA20bsa034_u:146: prakṛtyā ca mandakleśo bhavati mandanivaraṇo mandadauṣṭhulyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:147: pravivekagatasya cāsya svārthaṃ paritulayataḥ pāpakāḥ asadvitarkā nātyarthaṃ cittaṃ kṣobhayanti na paryādāya tiṣṭhanti /
SA20bsa034_u:148: [saḥ] amitrapakṣe 'pi tvaritaṃ tvaritaṃ maitracittatāmupasthāpayati prāgeva mitrodāsīnapakṣe /
SA20bsa034_u:149: vicitraiśca duḥkhairduḥkhitānāṃ sattvānāṃ duḥkhaṃ śrutvā vā dṛṣṭvā vā mahatkāruṇyacittamutpādayati /
SA20bsa034_u:150: duḥkhāpanayāya ca teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ yathāśaktyā yathābalaṃ vyāpāraṃ gacchati /
SA20bsa034_u:151: prakṛtyā ca sattveṣu hitakāmo bhavati sukhakāmaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:152: dhṛtimāṃśca bhavatyāpatsu jñātivyasane vā bhogavyasane vā vadhe vā bandhane vā pravāse vā ityevaṃbhāgīyāsvāpatsu /
SA20bsa034_u:153: medhāvī ca dharmāṇāṃ grahaṇadhāraṇohanasamarthaḥ smṛtibalena ca samanvāgato bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:157: iha bodhisattvaḥ sarvavidyāsthānajñeyapraveśāya sahajayā prajñayā samanvāgato bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:159: tāsu tāsu ca pramādasthānaviratiṣu pratisaṃkhyānabaliko bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:162: bhūtārthaniścaye tu buddhā eva bhagavantaḥ pratyakṣadarśinaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:163_0: yasmācca tadgotraṃ bodhisattvānāṃ prakṛtyaiva guṇayuktaṃ bhadraṃ kalyāṇaṃ śukladharmasamanvāgataṃ
SA20bsa034_u:164: tāvacca bodhisattva ebhiḥ śukladharmaiḥ prakṛtyaiva yukto bhavati yāvanna śukladharmavairodhikaiścaturbhirupakleśaiḥ sakalavikalairupakliṣṭo bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:165: yadā copakliṣṭo bhavati sa tadā eṣu ca śukleṣu dharmeṣu na saṃdṛśyate /
SA20bsa034_u:167: apāyopapattāvapi bodhisattvasya tadanyebhyaḥ apāyopapannebhyaḥ sattvebhyo [Dutt_7] gotrakṛto mahān viśeṣo veditavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:168: iha bodhisattvo dīrgheṇa kālena kadācit karhicidapāyeṣūpapadyate /
SA20bsa034_u:170: na ca tathā tīvrāmāpāyikīṃ duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ vedayate tadyathā 'nye 'pāyopapannāḥ sattvāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:171: tayā ca tanvyā duḥkhayā vedanayā spṛṣṭo 'dhimātraṃ saṃvegamutpādayati /
SA20bsa034_u:172_0: teṣu ca sattveṣu tatropapanneṣu duḥkhiteṣu kāruṇyacittaṃ pratilabhate yaduta tenaiva
SA20bsa034_u:172_1: gotreṇa ca sattveṣu tatropapanneṣu duḥkhiteṣu kārūṇyacittaṃ pratilabhate yaduta tenaiva
SA20bsa034_u:173: ityevaṃbhāgīyaḥ apāyopapattau bodhisattvasya tadanyebhyaḥ apāyopapannebhyaḥ sattvebhyo viśeṣo veditavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:174: tatra katame te bodhisattvasya catvāraḥ śukladharmavairodhikā upakleśāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:175: pūrvaṃ pramattasya kleśābhyāsāttīvrakleśatā āyatakleśatā cāyaṃ prathama upakleśaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:179: caturbhiḥ kāraṇairevaṃ gotrasaṃpanno 'pi bodhisattvo na śaknotyanuttara samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum /
SA20bsa034_u:181: iha bodhisattvaḥ ādita eva kalyāṇamitraṃ na labhate aviparītabodhimārgadaiśikaṃ buddhaṃ vā bodhisattvaṃ vā /
SA20bsa034_u:183: punaraparaṃ bodhisattvo labdhvāpi kalyāṇamitraṃ viparītagrāhī viparītaṃ śikṣate bodhisattvaśikṣāsu /
SA20bsa034_u:185: punaraparaṃ bodhisattvo labdhvāpi kalyāṇamitramaviparītaṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvaśikṣāsu tasmin prayoga śithilaprayogo bhavati kusīdo nodagrapratatavīryasamanvāgataḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:187_0: punaraparaṃ bodhisattvo labdhvā kalyāṇamitramaviparītaṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvaśikṣāsu
SA20bsa034_u:191: asati tu gotre sarveṇa sarva sarvathā bodharaprāptireva veditavyā /
SA20bsa034_u:192: bodhisattvabhūmau ādhāre yogasthāne prathamaṃ gotrapaṭalaṃ samāptam //
SA20bsa034_u:195: iha bodhisattvasya prathamaścittotpādaḥ sarvabodhisattvasamyakpraṇidhānānāmādyaṃ samyakpraṇidhānaṃ tadanyasamyakpraṇidhānasaṃgrāhakam /
SA20bsa034_u:197: sa khalu bodhisattvo bodhāya cittaṃ praṇidadhadevaṃ cittamabhisaṃskaroti vācañca bhāṣate /
SA20bsa034_u:198: aho batāhamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeyaṃ sarvasattvānāñcārthakaraḥ syāmatyantaniṣṭhe nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhāpayeyaṃ tathāgatajñāne ca /
SA20bsa034_u:201: tāṃ khalu bodhiṃ sattvārthañcālamvya sa cittotpādaḥ prārthayate nānālambya /
SA20bsa034_u:203_0: sa ca cittotpādaḥ sarvabodhipakṣyakuśalamūlasaṃgrahāya pūrvaṅgamatvātkuśalaḥ paramakauśalyaguṇayuktaḥ
SA20bsa034_u:204: yāni ca kānicittadanyāni laukikalokottareṣvartheṣu kuśalāni samyakpraṇidhānāni teṣāṃ sarveṣāmagrya metatsamyakpraṇidhānaṃ niruttaraṃ yaduta bodhisattvasya prathamaścittotpādaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:207: tasya ca bodhicittasya sahotpādādevāvatīrṇe bhavati bodhisattvo 'nuttare bodhimahāyāne /
SA20bsa034_u:208: bodhisattvo bodhisattva iti ca saṃkhyāṃ gacchati yaduta saṃketavyavahāranayena /
SA20bsa034_u:210: utpādya ca bodhisattvastaccittaṃ krameṇānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimadhigacchati nānutpādya /
SA20bsa034_u:212: duḥkhiteṣu ca sattveṣu sa kāruṇiko bodhisattvaḥ paritrāṇābhiprāyastaccittamutpādayati /
SA20bsa034_u:214: [Dutt_9] tañca cittotpādaṃ niśritya pratiṣṭhāya bodhisattvo bodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu sattvārtha kriyāyāñca bodhisattvaśikṣāyāṃ prayujyate /
SA20bsa034_u:216: evamasau prathamaścittotpādaḥ saṃgrahato 'pi mūlato 'pi niṣyandato 'pi sanniśrayato 'pi veditavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:217: sa ca bodhisattvasya prathamacittotpādaḥ samāsena dvividhaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:219: tatra nairyāṇiko ya utpanno 'tyantamanuvartate na punarvyāvartate /
SA20bsa034_u:220: anairyāṇikaḥ punarya utpanno nātyantamanuvartate punareva vyāvartate /
SA20bsa034_u:223: tatrātyantikī yatsakṛdvyāvṛttaṃ cittaṃ na punarutpadyate bodhāya /
SA20bsa034_u:224: anātyantikī punaḥ yadvyāvṛttaṃ cittaṃ punaḥ punarutpadyate bodhāya /
SA20bsa034_u:227: iha kulaputro vā kuladruhitā vā tathāgatasya vā bodhisattvasya vā acintyamatyadbhutaṃ prātihāryaṃ prabhāvaṃ paśyati saṃpratyayitasya vā 'ntikācchṛṇoti /
SA20bsa034_u:228: tasya dṛṣṭvā vā śrutvā vā evaṃ bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:229_0: mahānubhāvā bateyaṃ bodhiryasyāṃ sthitasya vā pratipannasya vā 'yamevarūpaḥ prabhā[vaḥ]
SA20bsa034_u:229_1: idamevaṃrūpaṃ prātihāryaṃ dṛśyate ca śrūyate ca sa tadeva prabhāvadarśanaṃ śravaṇaṃ
SA20bsa034_u:231: sa na haiva prabhāvaṃ paśyati vā śṛṇoti vā aparitvanuttarāṃ bodhimārabhya saddharmaṃ śṛṇoti bodhisattvapiṭakaṃ deśyamānaṃ śrutvā ca punarabhiprasīdati /
SA20bsa034_u:232: abhiprasannaśca saddharmaśravaṇamadhipatiṃ kṛtvā tathāgatajñānādhimuktaḥ tathāgatajñānapratilambhāya cittamutpādayati /
SA20bsa034_u:234: sa na haiva dharma śṛṇotyapi tu bodhisattvaḥ saddharmāntardhānimāmukhāmupagatāṃ paśyati /
SA20bsa034_u:235: dṛṣṭvā ca punarasyaivaṃ bhavati aprameyāṇāṃ bata sattvānāṃ duḥkhāpagamāya bodhisattvasaddharmasthitiḥ saṃvartate /
SA20bsa034_u:236: yannvahaṃ bodhisattva-saddharmacirasthitaye cittamutpādayeyaṃ yaduta eṣāmeva sattvānāṃ duḥkhāpakarṣaṇāya /
SA20bsa034_u:239: sa na haiva saddharmāntardhāniṃ pratyupasthitāṃ paśyati apitvantayuge 'ntakāle pratyavarāntayugikān sattvāśrayān paśyati yaduta daśabhirupakleśairupakliṣṭān /
SA20bsa034_u:240: tadyathā mohabahulānāhrīkyānapatrāpyabahulānīrṣyāmātsaryabahulān duḥkhabahulān dauṣṭhulyabahulān kleśabahulān duścaritabahulān pramādabahulān kausīdyabahulān āśraddhyabahulāṃśca /
SA20bsa034_u:243: asminnevamupakliṣṭe kāle na sulabho nihīnaḥ śrāvakapratyekabodhāvapi tāvaccittotpādaḥ prāgevānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
SA20bsa034_u:245: so 'ntakāle cittotpādadurlabhatāmadhipatiṃ kṛtvā mahābodhāvadhimukto mahābodhau cittamutpādayati /
SA20bsa034_u:254: iha bodhisattvasya mitramādita evājaḍaṃ bhavatyadhandhajātīyaṃ paṇḍitaṃ vilakṣaṇaṃ na ca kudṛṣṭipatitam /
SA20bsa034_u:259: na cainaṃ duścirite viniyojayati na duścaritasthānamasyopasaṃharati /
SA20bsa034_u:261: na cainamutkṛṣṭatarebhyaḥ śraddhācchandasamādānavīryopāyaguṇebhyo vicchandayitvā nihīnatareṣu śraddhācchandasamādānavīryopāyaguṇeṣu samādāpayati /
SA20bsa034_u:262_0: tadyathā mahāyānādvicchandayitvā śrāvakayāne vā pratyekabuddhayāne vā bhāvanāmayād
SA20bsa034_u:262_2: vaiyāvṛttyakarmaṇi śīlamayād vicchandayitvā dānamaye ityevaṃbhāgīyebhya utkṛṣṭatarebhyo
SA20bsa034_u:262_3: guṇebhyo na vicchandayitvā evaṃbhāgīyeṣu nihīnatareṣu guṇeṣu samādāpayati /
SA20bsa034_u:266: santi te lokadhātavo yeṣu duḥkhaṃ nopalabhyate daśasu dikṣvanantāparyanteṣu lokadhātuṣu /
SA20bsa034_u:267: sa ca bodhisattvaḥ saduḥkhe loka dhātau pratyājāto bhavati yatra duḥkhamupalabhyate nāduḥkhe /
SA20bsa034_u:270: punaśca paramātmānaṃ vā tadubhayaṃ vā dīrghakālikena vicitreṇa tīvreṇa nirantareṇa duḥkhena spṛṣṭamupadrutamabhibhūtaṃ paśyati /
SA20bsa034_u:271: iti tasya bodhisattvasya svagotrasanniśrayeṇa prakṛtibhadratayā ebhiścaturbhirālambanairadhiṣṭhānaiḥ karuṇāmṛdumadhyādhimātrā pravarvate anyatrābhyāsataḥ //
SA20bsa034_u:272: caturbhiḥ kāraṇairbodhisattvaḥ sattveṣu karuṇāṃ saṃpuraskṛtya saṃsāraduḥkhāddīrghakālikādvicitrāttīvrānnirantarādapi na bibheti nottrasyati prāgeva nihīnāt /
SA20bsa034_u:279: sattveṣu cādhimātrayā karuṇayā samanvāgato bhavati idaṃ caturtha kāraṇam /
SA20bsa034_u:282: tatra svaśaktipatitā yā ruciranuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau idamucyate bodhisattvasyādhyātmabalaṃ cittasyotpattaye /
SA20bsa034_u:283: paraśaktisamutpāditā tu ruciranuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau bodhisattvasya parabalam ityucyate cittasyotpattaye /
SA20bsa034_u:284_1: mātrakeṇa tadvarṇaśravaṇamātrakeṇa vā āśu cittasyottpattaye prāgeva saddharmaśravaṇena
SA20bsa034_u:284_2: vā prabhāvadarśanena vā hetubalam ityucyate cittasyottpattaye /
SA20bsa034_u:285: dṛṣṭadhārmiko bodhisattvasya satpuruṣasaṃsevā-saddharmaśravaṇacintādiko dirghakālikaḥ kuśaladharmābhyāsaḥ prayogabalam ityucyate cittasyotpattaye /
SA20bsa034_u:286: tatra bodhisattvasya samastavyastāṃścaturaḥ pratyayāṃścaturo hetūnāgamya sacedadhyātmabalena hetubalena ca samastābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ balābhyāṃ taccittamutpadyate /
SA20bsa034_u:294: saṃsāraduḥkhācca dīrghakālikādvicitrāttīvrānnirantarād bhīrurbhavati atyartha bibhetyuttasyati saṃtrāsamāpadyate /

SA20bsa034_u:524: vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā ca puṇyapakṣyā jñānapakṣyā ca veditavyā /
SA20bsa034_u:525: yadvīrya niśritya dānaṃ dadāti śīlaṃ vā samādatte rakṣati maitryādīni cāpramāṇāni bhāvayati /
SA20bsa034_u:527_0: yatpunarvīryaṃ niśritya śrutacintābhāvanāmayyāṃ prajñāyāṃ yogaṃ karoti skandhakauśalyaṃ
SA20bsa034_u:527_2: duḥkhaṃ vā duḥkhataḥ samudayaṃ vā samudayato nirodhaṃ vā nirodhato mārgaṃ vā mārgataḥ pratyavekṣate /
SA20bsa034_u:528: kuśalākuśalāndharmān sāvadyānanavadyān hīnapraṇītān kṛṣṇaśuklasapravibhāgapratītyasamutpannān dharmān yathābhūtaṃ pravicinoti pratyavekṣate /
SA20bsa034_u:530: yaddhyānaṃ niśrityaṃ dānaṃ vā dadāti śīlaṃ vā samādatte rakṣati maitryādīni cāpramāṇāni bhāvayati /
SA20bsa034_u:532: [Dutt_23] yatpunardhyānaṃ niśritya śrutacintābhāvanāyyāṃ prajñāyāṃ yogaṃ karoti skandhakauśalyaṃ vā pūrvavat sarvaṃ vaktavyaṃ tadyathā vīrye /
SA20bsa034_u:538: puṇyajñānapratilambhasthānopacayāya yacchandaḥ anukūlo 'vidhuraḥ pratyayaḥ pūrvakaśca puṇyajñānābhyāsaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:539: tatrāyamavidhuraḥ pratyayaḥ yā viparītasya ca pratyayasyāpratyupasthānamasannihitatā /
SA20bsa034_u:541: tatra yā pāpamitramāgamya viparītā puṇyajñānadeśanā viparītena vā manaskāreṇa viparītagrāhitā /
SA20bsa034_u:545: teṣāñca vivarjanamanutpādaḥ pratyayo 'vidhura ityucyate bodhisattvasya puṇyajñānayoḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:546: eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ hetūnāmanyatamavaikalyānnāpi puṇyasya nāpi jñānasya prasūtirveditavyā /
SA20bsa034_u:548: puṇyamāśritya bodhisattvo 'kṣataḥ saṃsāre saṃsarati nātyarthaṃ duḥkhairbādhyamānaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:550: jñānamāśritya bodhisattvaḥ samyak puṇyaparigrahaṃ karoti na mithyā vicitrāprameyakauśalyakriyayā ca yāvadanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate /
SA20bsa034_u:551: itīdaṃ samāsena puṇyajñānaphalaṃ yathāyogaṃ caturvidhaṃ veditavyam /
SA20bsa034_u:553: tatra yaśca vipāko yaśca vipākaheturyacca vipākaphalaṃ sarvametatpuṇyāśritaṃ puṇyaprabhavam /
SA20bsa034_u:555: puṇyaṃ pradhānaṃ jñānaṃ punarnirūttaram puṇyajñānaṃ tadanyataravaikalyādayaṃ bodhisattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ nādhigacchet /
SA20bsa034_u:561: pūrvakasya ceṣṭaphalasya karmaṇo vipakvavipākasya [Dutt_24] yo dṛṣṭe dharme phalopabhogaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:562: dhyānavyāvartanakuśalasya ca bodhisattvasya dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārārthaṃ dṛṣṭa eva ca dharme tatsanniśrayo na parārthaprasādhanārthaṃ dhyānasanniśrayaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:563: yacca dṛṣṭadharmanirvāṇaṃ tathāgatabhūtasya ye ca laukikalokottarā dṛṣṭadharmanirvāṇasaṃprāpakāḥ saṃskṛtā dharmāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:567: tatra yā ca kāmadhātau bhogasaṃpatparatra yā cātmabhāvasaṃpat paratra /
SA20bsa034_u:568_0: yā ca paratra dhyānārūpyopapattiḥ tasyāśca paratra bhogātmabhāvasaṃpado dhyānārūpyopapatteśca
SA20bsa034_u:568_1: yā dṛṣṭe dharme sahaiva duḥkhena sahaiva daurmanasyena pratisaṃkhyāya pratisaṃkhyāya hetvāsevanā /
SA20bsa034_u:569: ayaṃ sāṃparāyika eva bodhisattvasya svaparārtho veditavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:570: yā punardṛṣṭe dharme sahaiva sukhena sahaiva saumanasyena bhogātmabhāvasaṃpado hetvāsevanā /
SA20bsa034_u:575: kāmadhātau bhogātmabhāvasaṃpattiḥ sahetuphalā laukikī ca pṛthagjanānāṃ śuddhiḥ sahetuphalā anātyantikaḥ svaparārthaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:576: sarvātyantakleśaprahāṇamāryāṣṭāṅgaśca mārgaḥ tadāśrayeṇa ca ye laukikāḥ kuśalā dharmāḥ pratilabdhāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:578: tatra tribhiḥ kāraṇairātyantikatā anātyantikatā ca veditavyā /
SA20bsa034_u:584: ityayaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ daśavidhaḥ svaparārthaḥ samāsavistarataḥ yatra bodhisattvairyathāśakti yathābalaṃ śikṣitavyam nāta ūttari nāto bhūyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:585: atīte 'pyadhvanyanāgate 'pi ye svaparārthe śikṣitavantaḥ śikṣiṣyante sarve te 'sminneva daśavidhe svaparārthe /
SA20bsa034_u:592: yathāvadbhāvikatāñca dharmāṇāmārabhya yā dharmāṇāṃ bhūtatā yāvadbhāvikatāñcārabhya yā dharmāṇāṃ sarvatā /
SA20bsa034_u:593: iti bhūtatā sarvatā ca dharmāṇāṃ samastastattvārtho veditavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:596: tatra laukikānāṃ sarveṣāṃ yasmin vastuni saṃketasaṃvṛtisaṃstavanāgamapraviṣṭayā buddhyā darśanatulyatā bhavati tadyathā pṛthivyāṃ pṛthivyaiveyaṃ nāgniriti /
SA20bsa034_u:597_0: yathā pṛthivyāmevamagnāvapsu vāyau rūpeṣu śabdeṣu gandheṣu raseṣu spraṣṭavyeṣu bhojane
SA20bsa034_u:597_1: pāne yāne vastre alaṅkāropavicāre bhāṇḍopaskare gandhamālyavilepane nṛtyagītavāditre
SA20bsa034_u:597_2: āloke strīpuruṣaparicaryāyāṃ kṣetrāpaṇagṛhavastuni sukhaduḥkhe duḥkhamidaṃ na sukhaṃ
SA20bsa034_u:599: evamidaṃ nānyatheti niścitādhimuktigocaro yadvastu sarveṣāmeva laukikānāṃ paraṃparāgatayā saṃjñayā svavikalpa-prasidvaṃ na cintayitvā tulayitvopaparīkṣyodgṛhītam /
SA20bsa034_u:602_0: satāṃ yuktārthapaṇḍitānāṃ vicakṣaṇānāṃ tārkikāṇāṃ mīmāṃsakānāṃ tarkaparyāpannāyāṃ
SA20bsa034_u:602_1: bhūmau sthitānāṃ svayaṃ prātibhānikyāṃ pārthagjanikyāṃ mīmāṃsānucaritāyāṃ pratyakṣamanumānamāptāgamaṃ
SA20bsa034_u:605: sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāmanāsraveṇānāsravāvāhakena cānāsravapṛṣṭalabdhena ca laukikena jñānena yo gocaraviṣayaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:616: tena jñeyāvaraṇena vimuktasya jñānasya yo gocaraviṣayastajjñeyāvaraṇaviśuddhijñānagocarastattvaṃ veditavyam /
SA20bsa034_u:618_0: bodhisattvānāṃ buddhānāñca bhagavatāṃ dharmanairātmyapraveśāya praviṣṭena suviśuddhena
SA20bsa034_u:618_2: jñānena yo gocaraviṣayaḥ sāsau paramā tathatā niruttarā jñeyaparyantagatā yasyāḥ
SA20bsa034_u:624: tadyathā rūpamiti vā vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānamiti vā /
SA20bsa034_u:625: cakṣuriti vā srotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ jihvā kāyo mana iti vā /
SA20bsa034_u:627: rūpamiti vā śabdo gandho rasaḥ spraṣṭavyamiti vā /
SA20bsa034_u:628: kuśalamiti vā akuśalamiti vā avyākṛtamiti vā /
SA20bsa034_u:629: utpāda iti vā vyaya iti vā pratītyasamutpanna iti vā /
SA20bsa034_u:630: atītamiti vā anātagamiti vā pratyutpannamiti vā /
SA20bsa034_u:634: yadapi dṛṣṭaśrutamatavijñātaṃ prāptaṃ paryeṣitaṃ manasā 'nuvitarkitamanuvicāritamiti vā /
SA20bsa034_u:636: ityevaṃbhāgīyaḥ prajñaptivādanirūḍhaḥ svabhāvo dharmāṇāṃ lokasya bhāva ityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:638_0: tatrābhāvo yā asyaiva rūpamiti prajñaptivādasya yāvadantato nirvāṇamiti prajñaptivādasya
SA20bsa034_u:638_1: nirvastukatā nirnimittatā prajñaptivādāśrayasya sarveṇa sarvaṃ nāstikatā asaṃvidyamānatā
SA20bsa034_u:640: yatpunaḥ pūrvakeṇa ca bhāvenānena cābhāvena ubhābhyāṃ bhāvābhāvābhyāṃ vinirmuktaṃ dharmalakṣaṇasaṃgṛhītaṃ vastu /
SA20bsa034_u:643: tasmiṃśca tattve buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ suviśuddhaṃ jñānaṃ veditavyam /
SA20bsa034_u:644: bodhisattvānāṃ punaḥ śikṣāmārgaprabhāvitaṃ tatra jñānaṃ veditavyam /
SA20bsa034_u:645: sā ca prajñā mahānupāyo bodhisattvasyānuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ prāptaye /
SA20bsa034_u:647: tathā hi bodhisattvastena śūnyatādhimokṣeṇa tāsu tāsu jātiṣu prayujyamānaḥ sattveṣu buddhadharmaparipākāya saṃsāre saṃsaran tañca saṃsāraṃ yathābhūtaṃ parijānāti /
SA20bsa034_u:650: anadhyupekṣamāṇaścasaṃkliṣṭacittaḥ saṃsāre saṃsaret saṃkliṣṭacittaḥ saṃsarannaiva buddhadharmān paripācayennāpi sattvān /
SA20bsa034_u:651: sa cet punaranityādibhirākāraiḥ saṃsārānmānasamudvejayedevaṃ sati bodhisattvo laghu ladhveva parinirvāyāt /
SA20bsa034_u:652: laghu ladhveva ca parinirvāyan bodhisattva evamapi naiva buddhadharmānnaiva sattvān paripācayet /
SA20bsa034_u:654: tenaiva ca śūnyatādhimokṣeṇa bodhisattvaḥ prayujyamānaḥ na nirvāṇāduttrasyati nāpi nirvāṇaṃ prārthayate /
SA20bsa034_u:655_0: sa cedvodhisattvo nirvāṇāduttrasyet paratra nirvāṇasaṃbhāro 'sya na paripūryeta yathāpi
SA20bsa034_u:656: sa cetpunarbodhisattvo nirvāṇo prārthanābahulavihārī bhavedāśveva parinirvāyāt /
SA20bsa034_u:657: āśu parinirvāyam naiva buddhadharmānna sattvān paripācayet /
SA20bsa034_u:658: tatra yā ca saṃsāraṃ yathābhūtamaparijānataḥ saṃkliṣṭacittasya saṃsārasaṃsṛtiḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:661: yā ca nirvāṇaprārthanābahulavihāriṇa [Dutt_28] āśu parinirvṛtiḥ ayamanupāyo bodhisattvasya veditavyo 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:662: yā punaḥ saṃsāraṃ yathābhūtaṃ parijānato 'saṃkliṣṭacittasya saṃsārasaṃsṛtiḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:664: yā ca nirvāṇādanuttrastamānasasya tatsaṃbhāraparipūriryā ca nirvāṇe guṇānuśaṃsadarśino na cātyarthamutkaṇṭhāprāptasyāśu nirvṛtiḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:667: tasmātsā paramanśūyatādhimokṣabhāvanā bodhisattvasya śikṣāmārgasaṃgṛhīto mahānupāya ityucyate yaduta tathāgatajñānādhigamāya /
SA20bsa034_u:668_0: sa khalu bodhisattvastena dūrānupraviṣṭe na dharmanairātmyajñānena nirabhilāpyasvabhāvatāṃ
SA20bsa034_u:668_1: sarvadharmāṇāṃ yathābhūtaṃ viditvā na kiñcidvikalpayati nānyatra vastumātraṃ gṛhṇāti tathatāmātram /
SA20bsa034_u:669: na cāsyaivaṃ bhavati vastumātraṃ vā etattathatāmātraṃ caiti /
SA20bsa034_u:671: arthe parame caran sarvadharmāṃstayā tathatayā samasamān yathābhūtaṃ prajñayā paśyati /
SA20bsa034_u:672: sarvatra ca samadarśī samacittaḥ san paramāmupekṣāṃ pratilabhate /
SA20bsa034_u:673: yāmāśritya sarvavidyāsthānakauśaleṣu prayujyamāno bodhisattvaḥ sarvapariśramaiḥ sarvaduḥkhopanipātaiḥ na nivartate /
SA20bsa034_u:680: dṛḍhasannāhaprayogaḥ yathā yathā saṃsāre saṃsaran duḥkhaviśeṣaṃ labhate tathā tathotsāhaṃ bardhayatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
SA20bsa034_u:681: yathā yathā samucchrayaviśeṣamadhigacchati tathā tathānirmānataro bhavati sattvānāmantike /
SA20bsa034_u:682_0: yathā yathā jñānaviśeṣamadhigacchati tathā tathā bhūyasyā mātrayā paropārambhavivādaprakīrṇalapitākleśopakleśebhyaśca
SA20bsa034_u:683: yathā yathā guṇairvi[va]rdhate tathā tathā praticchannakalyāṇo bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:684: na parato jñātuṃ samanveṣate na lābha satkāram /
SA20bsa034_u:685: imā [Dutt_29] evaṃbhāgīyā bahavo 'nuśaṃsā bhavanti bodhisattvasya bodhipakṣyā bodhyanukūlāstajjñānasanniśritasya /
SA20bsa034_u:686: tasmād ye kecidbodhimanuprāptavanto ye ca kecitprāpsyanti ye ca prāpnuvanti sarve ta etadeva jñānaṃ niśritya nānyannyūnaṃ prativiśiṣṭaṃ vā /
SA20bsa034_u:687: evaṃ niṣprapañcanayārūḍho bodhisattva evaṃ caṃ bahvanuśaṃsa ātmanaśca buddhadharmaparipākāya pareṣāñca yānatrayadharmaparipākāya samyak pratipanno bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:692: kāyena vācā sambareṇa ca śikṣate prakṛtyā pāpārucitāyai prakṛtibhadrakalyāṇatāyai ca /
SA20bsa034_u:694: kṣamitvaṃ ca śikṣate mandakrodhatāyai ca a-paropatāpanatāyai ca /
SA20bsa034_u:695: sarvavidyāsthāneṣu cābhiyukto bhavati kuśalaśca sattvānāṃ vicikitsāprahāṇāyānugrahopasaṃhārāya ca ātmanaśca sarvajñatvahetuparigrahāya /
SA20bsa034_u:697: cittasthitaye ca śikṣate caturbrāhmavihārapariśodhanatāyai pañcābhijñāvikrīḍanatāyai ca sattvakṛtyānuṣṭhānatāyai sarvakauśalyābhiyogajakleśa-vinodanatāyai ca /
SA20bsa034_u:699: paramatattvajñatāyai ca śikṣate mahāyāne cāyatyāmātmanaḥ parinirvāṇāya /
SA20bsa034_u:700: sa khalu bodhisattva evaṃ samyakprayukto guṇavatsu sattveṣu pūjālābhasatkāreṇa pratyupasthito bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:701: doṣavatsu sattveṣu parameṇa kāruṇyacittenānukampācittena pratyupasthito bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:704: yathāśaktyā ca yathābalam aśaṭho bhūtvā amāyāvī teṣāṃ hitasukhamupasaṃharati /
SA20bsa034_u:705: teṣāmapakāriṇāṃ svenāśayaprayogadoṣeṇa vairacittatāyāḥ prahāṇārthamupakāriṣu sattveṣu kṛtajñatayā tulyādhikena pratyupakāreṇa pratyupasthito bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:707: apratibalo 'pi ca yācitaḥ san teṣu teṣu kṛtyakaraṇīyeṣvādaraṃ vyāyāmamupadarśayati na sakṛdeva nirākaroti /
SA20bsa034_u:709: ityayamevaṃbhāgīyo bodhisattvasya niṣprapañcanayārūḍhasya paramatattvajñāna-sanniśritasya samyakprayogo veditavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:711: tatra kayā yuktyā nirabhilāpyasvabhāvatā sarvadharmāṇāṃ pratyavagantavyā /
SA20bsa034_u:712: yeyaṃ svalakṣaṇaprajñaptirdharmāṇāṃ yaduta rūpamiti vā vedaneti vā pūrvavadantato yāvannirvāṇamiti vā prajñaptimātrameva tadveditavyam /
SA20bsa034_u:713: na svabhāvo nāpi ca tadvinirmuktastadanyo vāggocaro vāgaviṣayaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:714: evaṃ sati na svabhāvo dharmāṇāṃ tathā vidyate yathābhilapyate /
SA20bsa034_u:715: na ca punaḥ sarveṃṇa sarvaṃ na vidyate /
SA20bsa034_u:716: sa punarevamavidyamāno na ca sarveṇa sarvamavidyamānaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:719: sa punaḥ pāramārthikaḥ svabhāvaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ nirvikalpasyaiva jñānasya gocaro veditavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:720: sa cetpunaryathaivābhilāpo yeṣu dharmeṣu yasminvastuni pravartate tadātmakāste dharmā vā tadvastu syāt /
SA20bsa034_u:721: evaṃ sati bahuvidhā bahavaḥ svabhāvā ekasya dharmasyaikasya vastuno bhaveyuḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:723: tathā hyekasmindharme ekasminvastuni bahuvidhā bahavo bahubhirabhilāpaiḥ prajñaptaya upacārāḥ kriyante /
SA20bsa034_u:724: na ca bahuvidhānāñca bahūnāṃ prajñaptivādānāṃ niyamaḥ kaścidupalabhyate /
SA20bsa034_u:725: yadanyatamena prajñaptivādenaikena tasya dharmasya tasya vastunaḥ tādātmyaṃ tanmayatā tatsvabhāvatā syānnānyairavaśiṣṭaiḥ prajñaptivādaiḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:726: tasmātsakalavikalaiḥ sarvaprajñaptivādaiḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ sarvavastūnāṃ nāsti tādātmyaṃ nāsti tanmayatā nāsti tatsvabhāvatā /
SA20bsa034_u:727: api ca sa cedrūpādayo dharmā yathāpūrvanirdiṣṭāḥ prajñaptivādasvabhāvā bhaveyuḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:728: evaṃ sati pūrva tāvadvastu paścāttatra chandataḥ prajñaptivādopacāraḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:729: prākprajñaptivādopacārādakṛte prajñaptivādopacāre sa dharmastadvastu niḥsvabhāva eva syāt /
SA20bsa034_u:730: sati niḥsvabhāvatve nirvastukaḥ prajñaptivādo na yujyate /
SA20bsa034_u:731: prajñaptivādopacāre cāsati prajñaptivādasvabhāvatā dharmasya vastuno na yujyeta /
SA20bsa034_u:732: sa cetpunaḥ pūrvameva prajñaptivādopacārādakṛte prajñaptivādopacāre sa dharmastadvastu tadātmakaṃ syāt /
SA20bsa034_u:733: evaṃ sati vinā tena rūpamiti prajñaptivādopacāreṇa rūpasaṃjñake dharme rūpasaṃjñake vastuni rūpabuddhiḥ pravarteta /
SA20bsa034_u:735: tadanena kāraṇonānayā yuktyā nirabhilāpyaḥ svabhāvaḥ sarvadharmāṇāṃ pratyavagantavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:736: yathārūpamevaṃ vedanādayo yathānirdiṣṭā dharmā antato yāvannirvāṇaparyantā veditavyāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:738: yaśca rūpādīnāṃ dharmāṇāṃ rūpādikasya vastunaḥ prajñaptivādasvabhāvaṃ svalakṣaṇamasadbhūtasamāropato 'bhiniviśate /
SA20bsa034_u:739: yaścāpi prajñaptivādanimittādhiṣṭhānaṃ prajñaptivādanimittasanniśrayaṃ [Dutt_31] nirabhilāpyātmakatayā paramārthasadbhūtaṃ vastvapadamāno nāśayati sarveṇa sarvaṃ nāstīti /
SA20bsa034_u:740: asadbhūtasamārope tāvadye doṣāste pūrvameva nirūpitā uttānā viśaditāḥ prakāśitāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:742_0: yathā punā rūpādikeṣu dharmeṣuvastumātramapyapavadamānaḥ sarvavaināśikaḥ pranaṣṭo
SA20bsa034_u:742_1: bhavatyasmāddharmavinayāt tathā vakṣyāmi rūpādīnāṃ dharmānāṃ vastumātramapavadato
SA20bsa034_u:746: evaṃ sati rūpādīnāṃ dharmāṇāṃ vastumātre [sa] rūpādidharmaprajñaptivādopacāro yujyate /
SA20bsa034_u:749: tatra prajñaptervastu nāstīti niradhiṣṭhānā prajñaptirapi nāsti /
SA20bsa034_u:750_0: ato ya ekatyā durvijñeyān sūtrāntānmahāyānapratisaṃyuktān gambhīrān śūnyatāpratisaṃyuktānābhiprāyikārthanirūpitān
SA20bsa034_u:753: teṣāṃ prajñaptyadhiṣṭhānasya vastumātrasyābhāvātsaiva prajñaptiḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ na bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:755: tadanena paryāyeṇa taistattvamapi prajñaptirapi tadubhayamapyapavāditaṃ bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:757: sa evaṃ nāṣṭikaḥ sannakathyo bhavatyasaṃvāsyo bhavati vijñānāṃ sabrahmacāriṇām /
SA20bsa034_u:760: idañca sandhāyoktaṃ bhagavatā- varamihaikatyasya pudgaladṛṣṭirna tvevaikatyasya durgṛhītā śūnyateti /
SA20bsa034_u:762: pudgaladṛṣṭiko janturjñeye kevalaṃ muhyennatu sarva jñeyamapavadeta /
SA20bsa034_u:764: nāpi dharmārthikaṃ duḥkhavimokṣārthikañca paraṃ visaṃvādayenna vipralambhayet /
SA20bsa034_u:767: durgṛhītayā punaḥ śūnyatayā jñeye vastuni muhyet /
SA20bsa034_u:772: evaṃbhūtaṃ vastu apavadamānaḥ praṇaṣṭo bhavatyasmād dharmavinayāt /
SA20bsa034_u:774: yaḥ kaści] cchramaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā tacca necchati yena śūnyam /
SA20bsa034_u:780: sarvābhāvācca kutra kiṃ kena śūnyaṃ bhaviṣyati /
SA20bsa034_u:781: na ca tena tasyaiva śūnyatā yujyate /
SA20bsa034_u:784: yataśca yad yatra na bhavati tat tena śūnyamiti samanupaśyati /
SA20bsa034_u:787: tadyathā rūpādisaṃjñake yathā nirdiṣṭe vastuni rūpamityevamādiprajñaptivādātmako dharmo nāsti /
SA20bsa034_u:791: taccobhayaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti yaduta vastamātrañca vidyamānaṃ vastamātre ca prajñaptimātraṃ ca cāsadbhūtaṃ samāropayati /
SA20bsa034_u:792: na bhūtamapavadate nādhikaṃ karoti na nyūnīkaroti notkṣipati na pratikṣipati /
SA20bsa034_u:794: iyamucyate sugṛhītā śūnyatā samyak prajñayā supratividdheti /
SA20bsa034_u:795: iyaṃ tāvadupapattisādhanayuktirānulomikī yayā nirabhilāpyasvabhāvatā sarvadharmāṇāṃ pratyavagantavyā /
SA20bsa034_u:797: yathoktaṃ bhagavatā evamevārthaṃ gāthābhigītena paridīpayatā bhavasaṃkrāntisūtre /
SA20bsa034_u:799: yena yena hi nāmnā vai yo yo dharmo 'bhilapyate /
SA20bsa034_u:800: na sa saṃvidyate tatra dharmāṇāṃ sā hi dharmatā // iti /
SA20bsa034_u:803: yena rūpamityevamādinā nāmnā te rūpādisaṃjñakā dharmā abhilapyante 'nuvyavahriyante rūpamiti vā vedaneti vā vistareṇa yāvannirvāṇamiti vā /
SA20bsa034_u:804: tatra na ca rūpādisaṃjñakā dharmāḥ svayaṃ rūpādyātmakāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:805: na ca teṣu tadanyo rūpādyātmako dharmo vidyate /
SA20bsa034_u:806: yā punasteṣāṃ rūpādisaṃjñakānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ nirabhilāpyenārthena vidyamānatā saiṣā paramārthataḥ svabhāvadharmatā veditavyā /
SA20bsa034_u:808: yāḥ kāñcana saṃvṛtayo hi loke sarvā hi tā munirno upaiti /
SA20bsa034_u:809: anupago hyasau kena upādadīta dṛṣṭaśrute kāntimasaṃprakurvan /
SA20bsa034_u:813: tābhiḥ prajñaptibhistasya vastunastādātmyamityevaṃ nopaiti tāḥ saṃvṛtīḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:818: tayā dṛṣṭyā vinā tadvastusamāropato vāpavādato vā anupādadānaḥ samyagdarśī bhavati jñeye tadasya dṛṣṭam /
SA20bsa034_u:820: tasmin dṛṣṭaśrute tṛṣṇāṃ notpādayati na vivardhayati /
SA20bsa034_u:823: panaścoktaṃ bhagavatā saṃthakātyāyanamārabhya-iha saṃtha bhikṣurna pṛthivīṃ niśritya dhyāyati /
SA20bsa034_u:827_1: nobhau sūryācandramasau na dṛṣṭaśrutamatavijñātaṃ prāptaṃ paryeṣitaṃ manasānuvitarkitamanuvicāritam /
SA20bsa034_u:830: pṛthivīṃ na niśritya dhyāyati vistareṇa yāvat sarvaṃ na niśritya dhyāyati /
SA20bsa034_u:831: iha saṃtha bhikṣoryā pṛthivyāṃ pṛthivīsaṃjñā sā vibhūtā bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:832: apsu apsaṃjñā vistareṇa yāvat sarvatra yā saṃjñā sā vibhūtā bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:833: evaṃdhyāyī bhikṣurna pṛthivīṃ niśritya dhyāyati vistareṇa yāvanna sarvaṃ sarvamiti niśritya dhyāyati /
SA20bsa034_u:834: evaṃ dhyāyinaṃ bhikṣuṃ sendrā devāḥ seśānāḥ saprajāpataya ārānnamaṣyanti /
SA20bsa034_u:836: yasya te nābhijānīmaḥ kiṃ tvaṃ niśritya dhyāyasi // iti /
SA20bsa034_u:837: kathañca punaretatsūtrapadametamevārthaṃ paridīpayati pṛthivyādisaṃjñake vastuni yā pṛthivītyevamādikā nāmasaṃketaprajñaptiḥ sā pṛthivyādisaṃjñetyucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:838: sā punaḥ saṃjñā pṛthivyādisaṃjñake vastuni samāropikā cāpavādikā ca /
SA20bsa034_u:843: tasmādāgamato 'pi tathāgatāt paramāptāgamādveditavyaṃ nirabhilāpyasvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmā iti /
SA20bsa034_u:844: evaṃ nirabhilāpyasvabhāveṣu sarvadharmeṣu kasmādabhilāpaḥ prayujyate tathā hi vinābhilāpena sā nirabhilāpyadharmatā pareṣāṃ vakta mapi na śakyate śrotumapi /
SA20bsa034_u:845: vacane śravaṇe cāsati sā nirabhilāpyasvabhāvatā jñātumapi na śakyate /
SA20bsa034_u:847: tasyā eva tathatāyā evamaparijñātatvādvālānāṃ tannidāno 'ṣṭavidho vikalpaḥ pravartate trivastujanakaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:849: tadyathā svabhāva vikalpo viśeṣavikalpaḥ piṇḍagrāhavikalpaḥ ahamiti vikalpaḥ mameti vikalpaḥ priyavikalpaḥ apriyavikalpaḥ tadubhayaviparītaśca vikalpaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:850: sa punarayamaṣṭavidho vikalpaḥ katameṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ vastūnāṃ janako bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:851: yaśca [Dutt_35] svabhāvavikalpo yaśca viśeṣavikalpo yaśca piṇḍagrāhavikalpa itīme trayo vikalpā vikalpaprapañcādhiṣṭhānaṃ vikalpaprapañcālambanaṃ vastu janayanti rūpādisaṃjñakam /
SA20bsa034_u:852: yadvastvadhiṣṭhāya sa nāmasaṃjñābhilāpaparigṛhīto nāmasaṃjñābhilāpaparibhāvito vikalpaḥ prapañcayan tasminneva vastuni vicaratyanekavidho bahunānāprakāraḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:853: tatra yañcāhamiti vikalpo yaśca mameti vikalpaḥ itīmau dvau vikalpau satkāyadṛṣṭiśca tadanyasarvadṛṣṭi[-mūlaṃ māna-]mūlamasmimānañca tadanyasarvamānamūlaṃ janayataḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:854: tatra priyavikalpo 'priyavikalpastadubhayaviparītaśca vikalpo yathāyogaṃ rāgadveṣamohān janayanti /
SA20bsa034_u:855: evamayamaṣṭavidho vikalpaḥ asya trividhasya vastunaḥ prādurbhāvāya saṃvartate yaduta vikalpādhiṣṭhānasya prapañcavastunaḥ dṛṣṭyasmimānasya rāgadveṣamohānāñca /
SA20bsa034_u:858: ebhiśca tribhirvastubhiḥ sarvalokānāṃ pravṛttipakṣo niravaśeṣaḥ paridīpito bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:863: tasminneva rūpādisaṃjñake vastuni ayaṃ rūpī ayamarūpī ayaṃ sanidarśano 'yamanidarśana evaṃ sapratigho 'pratighaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:867_1: piṇḍiteṣu bahuṣu dharmeṣu piṇḍagrāhahetukaḥ pravartate gṛhasenāvanādiṣu bhojanapānayānavastrādiṣu
SA20bsa034_u:870_0: yadvastu sāsravaṃ sopādānīyaṃ dīrghakālamātmato vā ātmīyato vā saṃstutamabhiniviṣṭaṃ
SA20bsa034_u:870_1: paricitaṃ tasmādasaṃgrāha-saṃstavāt svaṃ dṛṣṭisthānīyaṃ vastu pratītyotpadyate vitatho viakalpaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:879: taccaitad dvayaṃ bhavati samāsataḥ vikalpaśca vikalpādhiṣṭhānaṃ vikalpālambanañca vastu /
SA20bsa034_u:881_0: pūrvako vikalpaḥ pratyutpannasya vikalpālambanasya vastunaḥ prādurbhāvāya pratyutpannaṃ
SA20bsa034_u:883: tatsaṃbhāvācca punarniyataṃ tadadhiṣṭhānasyāpi tadāśritasya vikalpasya prādurbhāvo bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:891: tatra nāmaparyeṣaṇā yadvodhisattvo nāmni nāmamātraṃ paśyati /
SA20bsa034_u:898: nāmaiṣaṇāgataṃ yathābhūtaparijñānaṃ vastveṣaṇāgataṃ svabhāvaprajñaptyeṣaṇāgataṃ viśeṣaprajñaptyeṣaṇāgatañca yathābhūtaparijñānam /
SA20bsa034_u:900: sa khalu bodhisattvo nāmni nāmamātratāṃ paryeṣya tannāmaivaṃ yathābhūtaṃ parijānāti itīdaṃ nāma ityarthaṃ vastuni vyavasthāpyate yāvadeva saṃjñārtha dṛṣṭyarthamupacārārtham /
SA20bsa034_u:901: yadi rūpādisaṃjñake vastuni rūpamiti nāma na vyavasthāpyeta na kañcittadvastu rūpamitmevaṃ saṃjānīyāt /
SA20bsa034_u:907: yataśca bodhisattvo [vastuni] vastumātratāṃ paryeṣya sarvābhilāpaviśliṣṭaṃ nirabhilāpyaṃ tadrūpādisaṃjñakaṃ vastu paśyati /
SA20bsa034_u:909_0: svabhāvaprajñaptyeṣaṇāgataṃ yathābhūtaparijñānaṃ katamat yataśca bodhisattvaḥ rūpādisaṃjñake
SA20bsa034_u:909_1: vastuni svabhāvaprajñaptau prajñaptimātratāṃ paryeṣya tathā svabhāvaprajñaptyā atatsvabhāvasya
SA20bsa034_u:910: tasya nirmāṇapratibimbapratiśrutkā-pratibhāsodakacandrasvapnamāyopamaṃ tatsvabhāvaṃ paśyataḥ tadābhāsamatanmayam idṃ tṛtīyaṃ yathābhūtaṃ parijñānaṃ sugambhīrārthagocaram /
SA20bsa034_u:912: yataśca bodhisattvo viśeṣaprajñaptau prajñaptimātratāṃ paryeṣya tasmin rūpādisaṃjñake vastuni viśeṣaprajñaptimadvayārthena paśyati /
SA20bsa034_u:919: tathā sanidarśanānidarśanādayo viśeṣaprajñaptiparyāyāḥ sarve 'nena nayenaivaṃ veditavyāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:922: tatra yo 'sāvaṣṭavidho mithyāvikalpo bālānāṃ trivastujanako lokanirvartakaḥ so 'sya caturvidhasya yathābhūtaparijñānasya vaikalyādasamavadhānātpravartate /
SA20bsa034_u:924: saṃkleśātsaṃsārasaṃsṛtiḥ saṃsārasaṃsṛteḥ saṃsārānugataṃ jātijarāvyādhimaraṇādikaṃ duḥkhaṃ pravartate /
SA20bsa034_u:925_0: yadā ca bodhisattvena caturvidhaṃ yathābhūtaparijñānaṃ niśritya so 'ṣṭavidho vikalpaḥ
SA20bsa034_u:925_1: parijñāto bhavati dṛṣṭe dharme tasya samyak parijñānādāyatyāṃ tadadhiṣṭhānasya tadālambanasya
SA20bsa034_u:927: evaṃ tasya savastukasya vikalpasya nirodho yaḥ sa sarvaprapañcanirodho veditavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:929: dṛṣṭe ca dharme tasya śreṣṭhatattvārtha gocarajñānasya viśuddhatvāt sarvatra vaśitāprāpti labhate sa bodhisattvaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:934: sa evaṃ vaśitāprāptaḥ sarvasattvaśreṣṭho bhavati niruttaraḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:935: evañca sarvatra vaśinastasya bodhisattvasya uttamāḥ pañcānuśaṃsā veditavyāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:936: paramāṃ cittaśāntimanuprāpto bhavati vihārapraśāntatayā na kleśapraśāntatayā /
SA20bsa034_u:937: sarvavidyāsthāneṣu cāsyāvyāhataṃ pariśuddhaṃ paryavadātaṃ jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate /
SA20bsa034_u:941: asya khalu pañcavidhasyānuśaṃsasya pañcavidhameva karma veditavyam /
SA20bsa034_u:942: paramo dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihāro bodhisattvasya bodhāya prayoganiryātasya kāyikacaitasikasya vyāyāmaklamasya nāśāya cittaśānteranuśaṃsasyaitatkarma veditavyam /
SA20bsa034_u:943: sarvabuddhadharmāṇāṃ paripāko bodhisattvasya sarvavidyāsthāneṣvavyāhatajñānatāyā anuśaṃsasyai tatkarma veditavyam /
SA20bsa034_u:945_0: vineyānāmut pannotpannānāṃ saṃśayānāṃ prativinodanaṃ dharmanetryāśca dīrghakālaṃ
SA20bsa034_u:946: sarvaparapravādinigraho dṛḍhavīryatā ca prāṇidhānāccācyutiḥ asaṃhāryatā 'parapratyayatvānuśaṃsasyaitatkarma veditavyam /
SA20bsa034_u:947: evaṃ hi bodhisattvasya yāvat kiñcidbodhisattvakaraṇīyaṃ tatsarvamebhiḥ pañcabhiranuśaṃsakarmabhiḥ parigṛhītaṃ bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:949: asaṃkliṣṭañca ātmasukhaṃ buddhadharmaparipākaḥ sattvaparipākaḥ saddharmasya dhāraṇam acalapraṇidhānasyottaptavīryasya paravādavinigrahaśca /
SA20bsa034_u:951: tatra caturṇā tattvārthānāṃ prathamau dvau hīnau /
SA20bsa034_u:958: samāsataḥ samādhivaśitāprāptasya samādhivaśitāsanniśrayeṇocchāmātrāt sarvārthasamṛddhiḥ karmaṇyacittasya suparibhāvitacittasyāryaḥ prabhāva ityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:959: dharmāṇāñca yā mahāphalatā mahānuśaṃsatā sā teṣāṃ prabhāva ityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:960: pūrvaṃ mahāpuṇyasaṃbhāropacayād buddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ca sahajā āścaryādbhutadharmatā /
SA20bsa034_u:962: sa khalveṣa prakārabhedena buddhabodhisattvānāṃ pañcavidho bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:963: abhijñāprabhāvo dharmaprabhāvaḥ sahajaśca prabhāvaḥ sādhāraṇaśca śrāvaka pratyekabudvairasādhāraṇaśca taiḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:964: tatra ṣaḍbhijñāḥ - ṛddhiviṣayo divyaṃ śrotraṃcetasaḥ paryāyaḥ pūrvanivāsānusmṛtiścyutyupapādadarśanamāsravakṣayajñānasākṣātkriyā ca abhijñāprabhāva ityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:965: tatra ṣaṭpāramitāḥ-dānaṃ śīlaṃ kṣāntirvīryaṃ dhyānaṃ prajñā ca dharmā ityucyante /
SA20bsa034_u:966: teṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ yo 'nubhāvaḥ sa dharmaprabhāva ityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:972_0: tadyathā kampanaṃ jvalanaṃ spharaṇaṃ vidarśanamanyathībhāvakaraṇaṃ gamanāgamanaṃ
SA20bsa034_u:974: iha tathāgataḥ samādhivaśitāprāpto vā karmaṇyacitto vā bodhisattvo vihāramapi kampayati /
SA20bsa034_u:975_0: gṛhamapi grāmanagarakṣetramapi narakalokamapi tiryaglokamapi pretalokamapi manuṣyalokamapi
SA20bsa034_u:975_1: devalokamapi cāturdvīpakamapi sāhasrikamapi lokadhātuṃ dvisāhasrikamapi trisāhasramahāsāhasramapi
SA20bsa034_u:983: sarvakāyena prajvalitasya vividhā arciṣaḥ kāyānnirgacchanti nīlapītalohitāvadātamāñjiṣṭhāḥ sphaṭikavarṇāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:985: yathāpi tadgṛhamapyābhayā spharati vihāramapi pūrvavadyāvadaprameyānasaṃkhyām lokadhātūnābhayā spharati pūrvavattadyathā kampane /
SA20bsa034_u:987_1: pariṣadaḥ tathāgato vā bodhisattvo vā apāyānapi vidarśayatyadhaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:990_1: yena nāmnā saṃśabditaṃ bhavati buddhakṣetraṃ tatra ca buddhakṣetre yannāmako bhavati
SA20bsa034_u:990_2: tathāgataḥ tacca buddhakṣetraṃ darśayati tañca tathāgatam /
SA20bsa034_u:991: tacca nāma vyapadiśati tasya buddhakṣetrasya tathāgatasya ca /
SA20bsa034_u:992: tato 'pyarvāgvidarśaṃyati vyapadiśati tato 'pi pareṇa yatkāmaṃ yāvatkāmam /
SA20bsa034_u:995: sa cet pṛthivīmapo 'dhimucyate tattathaiva bhavati nānyathā /
SA20bsa034_u:996: tejo vāyumadhimucyate tadapi tathaiva bhavati nānyathā /
SA20bsa034_u:1003: yathā mahābhūteṣvanyonyapariṇāme nānyathībhāvakriyā evaṃ rūpagandharasaspraṣṭavyeṣu veditavyam /
SA20bsa034_u:1006: himavantaṃ vā parvatarājamādiṃ kṛtvā sarvaparvatān suvarṇaṃmadhimucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:1010: tadubhayavivarjitānāṃ suvarṇatāṃ vā durvarṇatāṃ vā tadubhayaṃ vā /
SA20bsa034_u:1011: yathā suvarṇadurvarṇatāmevaṃ vyaṅgāvyaṅgatāṃ kṛśa sthūlatāmityevamādi yatkiñcidanyathā satsvalakṣaṇataḥ śakyarūpañcā [nyathā] 'dhimucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:1014_0: tiraḥ kuḍyaṃ tiraḥ śailaṃ tiraḥ prākāramasajyamānena kāyena gacchati vistareṇa yāvadbrahmalokamupasaṃkrāmati
SA20bsa034_u:1014_2: lokadhātūn gacchati āgacchati ca kāyena vā audārikeṇa cāturmahābhautikena /
SA20bsa034_u:1015: dūraṃ cāsannamadhimucya manaḥsadṛśena vā javena gacchati cāgacchati ca /
SA20bsa034_u:1021: mahatyā vicitrāyāḥ pariṣadaḥ purastāt sa grāmanigamatṛṇavana[-bhūmi-]parvataṃ rūpakāyamātmakāye praveśayati /
SA20bsa034_u:1022: sā ca sarvā pariṣattasminneva kāye praviṣṭamātmānaṃ saṃjānīte /
SA20bsa034_u:1025: upasaṃkrāntasya yādṛśī teṣāṃ varṇapuṣkalatā bhavati tādṛśī tasya /
SA20bsa034_u:1029: yamapi te 'rthaṃ na mantrayante tamapi so 'rthaṃ na mantrayate /
SA20bsa034_u:1030: uttaraṃ caitānānudhārmyā kathayā saṃdarśayitvā samādāpayitvā samuttejayitvā saṃpraharṣayitvā 'ntarddhīyate /
SA20bsa034_u:1031: antarhitañcainaṃ na prajānanti ko 'nveṣo 'ntarhito devo vā manuṣyo veti /
SA20bsa034_u:1032_3: śubhakṛssnān anabhrakān puṇyaprasavān bṛhatphalānasaṃjñisattvān abṛhān atapān sudṛśān
SA20bsa034_u:1034: mahatyā pariṣadaḥ purastācchatakṛtvaḥ sahasrakṛtvaḥ ato vā pareṇāntardhīyate /
SA20bsa034_u:1037: yāvān kaścit sattvadhātuḥ taṃ sarva gamanāgamanasthānādyāsu kriyāsu saṃvartayati /
SA20bsa034_u:1038: sa cedasyai vaṃ bhavati gacchatu gacchati /
SA20bsa034_u:1044: niṣṭhāgato bodhisattva ekajātipratibaddhaśca caramabhaviko vā tathāgataṃ sthāpayitvā tulyajātīyañca bodhisattvaṃ tadanyeṣāṃ [Dutt_44] sarveṣāmṛddhyabhisaṃskāramabhibhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:1045: tadanye bodhisattvā utkṛṣṭatarabhūmipraviṣṭāṃstulyajātīyāṃśca bodhisattvān sthāpayitvā tadanyeṣāṃ sarvarddhimatāmṛddhyabhisaṃskāramabhibhavanti /
SA20bsa034_u:1051: ye 'sya bhāṣamāṇasya dharmaṃ śṛṇvanti teṣāṃ tādṛśaṃ kāyikaṃ caitasikamanugrahamupasaṃharati pratiprasrabdhi sukham /
SA20bsa034_u:1054_0: tatra raśmipramokṣaḥ bodhisattvo vā tathāgato vā ṛddhyātadrūpān raśmīn kāyatpramuñcati
SA20bsa034_u:1054_1: ya ekatyā daśasu dikṣvaprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu gatvā nārakāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ nārakāṇi
SA20bsa034_u:1055: ekatyā devalokasthānudārān devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragān svabhavanasthān gatvā ihāgamanāya saṃcodayati /
SA20bsa034_u:1056: tathā tadanyalokadhātusthitān bodhisattvānihāgamanāya saṃcodayati daśasu dikṣvaprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu /
SA20bsa034_u:1057: samāsatasthāgataḥ aprameyairasaṃkhyeyairnānāprakārai raśmibhirapramāṇānāṃ sattvānāṃ vicitramaprameyamasaṃkhyeyamarthaṃ karoti /
SA20bsa034_u:1058: te punarete sarve pāriṇāmikyā ṛddhyāḥ prakārā ekaikaśaḥ prabhidyamānā aprameyā asaṃkhyeyā veditavyāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:1059: anyathā prakṛtyā vidyamānasya vastunastadanyathāvikārāpādanatā pariṇāma ityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:1066: tatpunaḥ kāyanirmāṇamātmano vā sadṛśaṃ visadṛśaṃ vā parasya vā sadṛśaṃ visadṛśaṃ vā nirmimīte /
SA20bsa034_u:1070: tadyathā bhojanapānādi maṇimuktāvaidūryādi ca yatkiñcidrūpagandharasaspraṣṭavyasaṃgṛhītaṃ bāhyamupakaraṇaṃ tatsadṛśaṃ tadvinirmuktaṃ sarvaṃ yathākāmaṃ nirmimīte /
SA20bsa034_u:1071_1: manuṣyavarṇa tiryakpretanārakavarṇaṃ śrāvakavarṇaṃ pratyekabuddhavarṇaṃ bodhisattvavarṇaṃ tathāgatavarṇam /
SA20bsa034_u:1072: sa yadi tādṛśa eva bodhisattvo bhavati tādṛśameva nirmimīte /
SA20bsa034_u:1075: sa cetparaṃ devabhūtaṃ tatsādṛśyena nirmimīte parasadṛśamasya tannirmāṇaṃ bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:1079: iha tathāgato vā bodhisattvo vā daśasu dikṣvaprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu sakṛdaprameyāsaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānām arthaṃ karoti tairvicitravarṇanirmitaiḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:1080: kiñcicca nirmāṇamadhitiṣṭhati yaduparate 'pi bodhisattve tathāgete vā 'nuvartata eva /
SA20bsa034_u:1081: kiñcinnirmāṇaṃ buddhabodhisattvānāṃ kevalaṃ sattvānāṃ vidarśanāya māyopamaṃ bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:1087: asti viśadasvarānvitaṃ svasambaddhaṃ parasambaddhamasambaddhaṃ dharmadeśanāsaṃgṛhītaṃ pramattasaṃcodanā-saṃgṛhītañca /
SA20bsa034_u:1089: buddhabodhisattvānāṃ nirmito vāgvyāhāro gambhīro bhavati megharavaḥ kalaviṅkamanojñasvarasadṛśo hṛdayaṃgamaḥ gremaṇīyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:1090: paurī ca sā vāṅnirmitā bhavati valguvispaṣṭā vijñeyā śravaṇīyā apratikūlā aniśritā aparyantā /
SA20bsa034_u:1092_0: ākāṃkṣamāṇaḥ tathāgato vā bodhisattvo vā vicitrāṃ devanāgayakṣāsura garuḍakinnaramahoragaśrāvakabodhisattvapariṣadaṃ
SA20bsa034_u:1092_2: svareṇa suparipūrṇena vijñāpayati ye 'pi dūre ya 'pyantike niṣaṇṇāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:1094: dvisāhasraṃ vā trisāhasraṃ vā yāvaddaśasu dikṣvaprameyāsaṃkhyeyān lokadhātūn svareṇa vijñāpayati /
SA20bsa034_u:1097: tatra svasambaddhaṃ vāṅnirmāṇaṃ yatsvayameva nirmitayā vācā dharmaṃ vā deśayati pramattaṃ vā saṃcodayati /
SA20bsa034_u:1098: parasaṃbaddhaṃ punaryat paranirmitayā vācā dharmaṃ vā deśayati pramattaṃ vā saṃcodayati /
SA20bsa034_u:1099: tatrāsambaddhaṃ vāṅnirmāṇaṃ yadākāśāt vāṅniścarati nirmitādvā na sattvasantānāt /
SA20bsa034_u:1100: tatra dharmadeśanānirmāṇaṃ yat tatra tatra sammūḍhānāṃ yuktisaṃdarśanārtham /
SA20bsa034_u:1101: tatra codanānirmāṇaṃ yadasammūḍhānāṃ pratilabdhaprasādānāṃ pramattānāṃ pramāde hrīsaṃjananāya apramāde ca samādāpanāya /
SA20bsa034_u:1103: samāsataḥ kāyanirmāṇaṃ vāṅnirmāṇaṃ viṣaya nirmāṇañca veditavyam /
SA20bsa034_u:1106: sā punareṣā dvividhāpi ṛddhirbuddhabodhisattvānāṃ samāsato dve kārye niṣpādayati /
SA20bsa034_u:1107: āvarjayitvā vā ṛddhiprātihāryeṇa sattvān buddhaśāsane 'vatārayati anugrahaṃ vā anekavidhaṃ bahu nānāprakāraṃ duḥkhitānāṃ sattvānāmupasaṃharati /
SA20bsa034_u:1109_0: iha tathāgato vā bodhisattvo vā ātmanaivātmanastāvatpūrvanivāsaṃ samanusmarati amukā
SA20bsa034_u:1109_1: nāma te sattvā yatrāhamabhūvamevannāmeti vistareṇa yathāsūtraṃ sattvakāyadikaṃ sarvamanusmarati /
SA20bsa034_u:1110: yathā cātmanātmanaḥ samanusmarati tathā pareṣāmapi anusmārayati /
SA20bsa034_u:1112: ye 'pi te sattvakāyāḥ pūrvānte yannivāsāstānapyātmanā [Dutt_47] smarati pareṣāṃ smārayati amukā nāma te sattvā yatrāhamabhūvamevaṃnāmeti vistareṇa /
SA20bsa034_u:1113: teṣāmapi sattvānāṃ tathaiva sarvaṃ pūrvenivāsamanusmarati yathaivātmano dṛṣṭadharme /
SA20bsa034_u:1114: sūkṣmamapi samanusmarati yatkiñcidalpaṃ vā prabhūtaṃ vā pūrvaceṣṭitaṃ pūrvameva cetayitvā apramuṣitam /
SA20bsa034_u:1117: yasya kalpagaṇanāyogena śakyā saṃkhyāṃ kartum aprameyāsaṃkhyeyamapyanusmarati /
SA20bsa034_u:1118: yasya kalpagaṇanāyogenāśakyā saṃkhyāṃ kartum avyāhatamasya samāsataḥ pūrvenivāsajñānaṃ pravartate yatreṣṭaṃ yatheṣṭaṃ yāvadiṣṭam /
SA20bsa034_u:1119: evaṃrūpo bodhisattvasya tathāgatasya ca pūrvenivāsasaṃgṛhītaḥ prabhāvaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:1120_0: sa tena pūrvenivāsānusmṛtijñānena jātakān pūrvān bodhisattvacaryāṃ sattvānāṃ buddhe
SA20bsa034_u:1120_1: bhagavati prasādajananārthaṃ gauravotpādanārthaṃ ca vicitrānanekaprakārān prakāśayati
SA20bsa034_u:1121: śāśvatadṛṣṭikānāṃ ca sattvānāṃ śāśvatadṛṣṭiṃ nāśayati tadyathā pūrvāntakalpakānāṃ śāśvatavādināmekatya-śāśvatikānāṃ vā /
SA20bsa034_u:1123: iha tathāgato vā bodhisattvo vā divyena śrotreṇa divyān mānuṣyakān śabdānāryānapyanāryānapi ghanānapyaṇukānapi vyaktānapyavktānapi nirmitānapyanirmitānapi dūrāntikasthān śṛṇoti /
SA20bsa034_u:1124: tatra divyāḥ śabdāḥ ūrdhvaṃ yāvadakaniṣṭhabhavanopapannānāṃ sattvānām /
SA20bsa034_u:1125: sa cetpareṇābhogaṃ na karoti atha karoti tato 'pi pareṇānyeṣūrdhvaṃ lokadhātuṣu śṛṇoti /
SA20bsa034_u:1129: ye buddhānāṃ buddhaśrāvakānāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ pratyekabuddhānāñca /
SA20bsa034_u:1131: tadyathā saṃdarśayatāṃ samādāpayatāṃ vā samuttejayatāṃ saṃpraharṣayatāṃ kuśalasamādānamārabhyākuśalatyāgañca /
SA20bsa034_u:1132: [Dutt_48] tathā 'saṃkliṣṭacittānāmuddeśaḥ svādhyāyo viniścayaḥ samyak codanā smāraṇāvavādānuśāsanī iti yadvā punaranyadapi kiñcit subhāṣitaṃ sulapitamarthopasaṃhitam /
SA20bsa034_u:1135: ye sattvānāṃ mṛṣāvādapaiśunyapārūṣyasaṃbhinnapralāpaśabdā adho vā 'pāyopapannānāmūrdhvaṃ vā devopapannānāṃ tiryagvā manuṣyeṣūpapannānām /
SA20bsa034_u:1137: ye mahāsattvasaṃghaśabdā vā vividhairvā kāraṇaiḥ kāryamāṇānāmārttasvaraṃ kandamānānāṃ vikrośatāṃ vā meghastanitaśabdā vā śaṃkhabherīpaṭahaśabdā vā /
SA20bsa034_u:1148: yatra grāme kṣetre vihāre vā tathāgato vā bodhisattvo vā viharati tatra ye śabdā niścaranti tān sthāpayitvā tadanyatra yāvadaprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu /
SA20bsa034_u:1150: iha tathāgato vā bodhisattvo vā divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhenātikrāntamānuṣyakeṇa sattvān paśyati cyutikāle 'pi cyutānapi suvarṇadurvarṇān hīnapraṇītānaparānte ca jātān /
SA20bsa034_u:1153: yadrūpaṃ nirmitaṃ yacca divyamacchaṃ rūpamadho yāvadavīcimūrdhvaṃ yāvadakaniṣṭhabhavanam /
SA20bsa034_u:1154: sa cedadha ūrdhvaṃ vānyeṣu lokadhātuṣu rūpadarśanamārabhyābhogaṃ karoti tiryagyāvadaprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvaṃ rūpagataṃ paśyati /
SA20bsa034_u:1155: antatasteṣu teṣu buddhakṣetreṣu [Dutt_49] tāṃstāṃstathāgatān vicitreṣu mahatsu parṣanmaṇḍaleṣu niṣaṇṇān dharma deśayataḥ paśyati /
SA20bsa034_u:1156: tatra divyena cakṣuṣā tathāgato vā bodhisattvo vā daśasu dikṣu kāyaceṣṭitaṃ śubhāśubhaṃ dṛṣṭvā yathāyogaṃ yathārha teṣu sattveṣu pratipadyate /
SA20bsa034_u:1157: divyena ca śrotreṇa vākceṣṭitaṃ śubhāśubhaṃ śrutvā teṣu sattveṣu yathāyogaṃ yathārhaṃ pratipadyate /
SA20bsa034_u:1158: evaṃ divyena cakṣuṣā divyena śrotreṇa bodhisattvastathāgato vā samāsena karma karoti /
SA20bsa034_u:1160: iha bodhisattvo vā tathāgato vā pareṣāṃ daśasu dikṣvaprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvānāṃ kleśaparyavasthitamapi cittaṃ jānāti /
SA20bsa034_u:1161: vigatakleśaparyavasthānamapi kleśasānubandhaṃ sānuśayamapi kleśaniranubandhaṃ niranuśayamapi mithyāpraṇihitamapi cittaṃ jānāti /
SA20bsa034_u:1162: tadyathā tīrthikacittaṃ sāmiṣābhiprāyasya kliṣṭamapi cittaṃ samyak praṇihitamapi cittaṃ jānāti /
SA20bsa034_u:1165: madhyamacittaṃ jānāti tadyathā sarveṣāṃ rūpadhātūpapannānāṃ sattvānām /
SA20bsa034_u:1166: praṇītamapi cittaṃ jānāti tadyathā sarveṣāmārūpyopapannāṃ sattvānām /
SA20bsa034_u:1168: ekena paracittajñānenaikasya sattvasya yasya yadyathā yādṛśaṃ yāvaccitaṃ pratyupasthitaṃ bhavati tatsakṛdyathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
SA20bsa034_u:1169: ekenaiva paracittajñānena prabhūtānāmapi sattvānāṃ yeṣāṃ yadyathā yādṛśaṃ yāvaccittaṃ pratyupasthitaṃ bhavati tadapi sakṛdyathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
SA20bsa034_u:1170_0: sā punariyamabhijñā buddhasya bodhisattvānāmindriyaparāparajñānāya sattvānāṃ nānādhimuktijñānāya
SA20bsa034_u:1170_1: nānādhātucaritajñānāya yathāyogañca pratipatsu citrāsu nirvāṇapuraḥsarīṣu samyaksanniyogāya /
SA20bsa034_u:1173: iha tathāgato vā bodhisattvo vā kleśānāṃ kṣayaprāptiṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
SA20bsa034_u:1174: prāpto mayā parairvā āsravakṣayo na veti /
SA20bsa034_u:1179: bodhisattvaḥ punaḥ sarvaṃ caitat prajānātyāsravakṣayañca svayaṃ na sākṣātkaroti /
SA20bsa034_u:1181: ataḥ sāsravāñca vastu bodhisattvaḥ sahasravairna vijahāti /
SA20bsa034_u:1183: na ca saṃkliśyata iti so 'sya sarvaprabhāvāṇāṃ mahattamaḥ prabhāvo veditavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:1184: tena khalvāsravakṣayajñānena buddhabodhisattvāḥ svayaṃ na kliśyante /
SA20bsa034_u:1189: sa punareṣa dānādīnāṃ dharmāṇāṃ prabhāvaḥ samāsataścaturbhirākārairveditavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:1191: dānaṃ dadad bodhisattvo dānavipakṣaṃ mātsaryaṃ prajahāti /
SA20bsa034_u:1198: paratra ca yatra yatra pratyājāyate āḍhyo bhavati mahābhogo mahāpakṣo mahāparivāra ityeṣa caturākāro dānasya prabhāvo nāta uttari nāto bhūyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:1199: kāyavāksaṃvaraśīlaṃ samādadāno bodhisattvaḥ śīlavipakṣaṃ dauḥśīlyaṃ prajahāti /
SA20bsa034_u:1202: dauḥśīlyapratyayaṃ bhayamavadyaṃ vairaṃ prajahadātmānamanugṛhaṇāti sukhaṃ svapan sukhaṃ pratibudhyamānaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:1213: ātmānañca parañca mahato bhayātparitrāyamāṇastayā kṣyāntyā ātmānañca paraṃścānugṛhṇāti /
SA20bsa034_u:1217: ityayañcaturākāraḥ kṣānteḥ prabhāvo nāta uttari nāto bhūyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:1218: ārabdhavīryo bodhisattvo viharan vīryavipakṣaṃ kausīdyaṃ prajahāti /
SA20bsa034_u:1221: ārabdhavīryaśca sukhaṃ sparśaṃ viharannavyavakīrṇaḥ pāpakairakuśalairdharmaḥ pūrveṇāparaṃ viśeṣādhigamaṃ paśyan prītiprāmodyenātmānamanugṛhṇāti /
SA20bsa034_u:1222: kuśalapakṣābhiyuktaśca paraṃ na kāyena vācā vā viheṭhayati /
SA20bsa034_u:1228: dhyānaṃ samāpadyamāno bodhisattvo dhyānavipakṣaṃ kleśaṃ kāma vitarkaprītisukharūpasaṃjñādīṃścopakleśān prajahāti /
SA20bsa034_u:1229: bodheśca saṃbhārabhūtaṃ sanniśrayabhūtaṃ bhavati tadasya dhyānam /
SA20bsa034_u:1234: ityeṣa caturākāro dhyānaprabhāvo nāta uttari nāto bhūyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:1237: dānenāpi priyavāditayāpyarthacaryayāpi samānārthatayāpi [Dutt_52] ca sattvān paripācayati /
SA20bsa034_u:1239: sarvatra nyāyopadeśena dṛṣṭe dharme saṃparāye ca hitasukhābhyāṃ sattvānapyanugṛhṇāti /
SA20bsa034_u:1250: tribhiśca sthānaistuṣitopapannānāṃ tadanyeṣāṃ deva putrāṇāmabhibhavaḥ divyenāyuṣā divyena varṇena divyena yaśasā /
SA20bsa034_u:1251: upapadyamānasya ca mātuḥ kukṣāvudāreṇāvabhāsena lokadhātuspharaṇaṃ saṃprajānataśca mātuḥ kukṣipraveśaḥ sthānaṃ nirgamo janma ca /
SA20bsa034_u:1255: carame ca bhave paścime janmani sarvapratyarthikairmārānīkairapi sarvopakramaiścābādhyatā /
SA20bsa034_u:1260: svayañcānācārya kamekākina eva ca trisāhasramahāsāhasre mahābodherabhisaṃbodhaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:1261: brahmaṇā ca sahāṃpatinā svayamupasaṃkramya loke saddharmadeśanāyai adhyeṣaṇā /
SA20bsa034_u:1264: bodhisattve ca mṛgapakṣiṇāmapyantataḥ kṣudramṛgāṇāmapi paramā viśvāsyatā /
SA20bsa034_u:1266: [Dutt_53] tiraścāmantikāttathāgatasya pūjā tadyathā markaṭo madhvaneḍakaṃ tathāgatāyānupradattavān /
SA20bsa034_u:1267: pratigṛhīte ca tasmin bhagavatā sa markaṭo hṛṣṭamānasaḥ pratyavasṛṣṭaḥ sa nṛtyamānaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:1268: bhagavantamevoddiśya tathāgataḥ snāsyati taṃ snāpayiṣyāmīti meghapratīkṣaṇā /
SA20bsa034_u:1269: vṛkṣamūle ca bodhisattvasya tathāgatasya vā santiṣṭhatastasya sarvavṛkṣāṇāṃ prācīnanimnāsu chāyāsu tasya vṛkṣasya chāyayā kāyāvijahanatā /
SA20bsa034_u:1272: smṛtasya ca pratisaṃviditānāṃ vedanānāṃ saṃjñānāṃ vitarkāṇāmutpādaḥ sthānaṃ nirodhaśca /
SA20bsa034_u:1275: tadyathā unmattāḥ kṣiptacittāḥ tathāgataṃ dṛṣṭvā svacittaṃ pratilabhante /
SA20bsa034_u:1278: raktānāṃ rāgaparyavasthānāṃ vigacchati dviṣṭānāṃ dveṣaparyavasthānaṃ mūḍhānāṃ mohaparyavasthānam /
SA20bsa034_u:1296: na cāvaśiṣṭaṃ bhavati yāvad dvitīyamālopaṃ [Dutt_54] prakṣipati /
SA20bsa034_u:1298: parinirvāṇasamaye ca mahāpṛthivīcāla ulkāpātā diśo dāhā antarikṣe devadundubhīnāmabhinadanam /
SA20bsa034_u:1299: so 'pi sahaja eva tathāgatānāṃ prabhāvo nābhijñāsaṃskṛtaḥ /

SA20bsa034_u:2150: yāni vā punastāni śrāddhakulāni yeṣvaharahaḥ pravṛtā eva deyadharmā vistīrṇabhogatayā teṣu kuleṣu āgatāgatān yācanakānupasaṃharati /
SA20bsa034_u:2151: svayameva vā gatvā dāneṣu dīyamāneṣu puṇyeṣu kriyamāṇeṣu dakṣo 'nalasa utthānasampannaścittamabhiprasādya kāyena vācā yathāśaktyā yathābalaṃ vyāpāraṃ gacchati /
SA20bsa034_u:2154: yadupasthāpaka-vaiguṇyād duṣpratipāditaṃ syāt pakṣapatitaṃ vā anādarato vā smṛtisaṃpramoṣato vā tanna bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:2155: evaṃ hi bodhisattvaḥ asatsvasaṃvidyamāneṣu bhogeṣu prājñadānasya dātā bhavati yāvadāśayaśuddhi nādhigacchati /
SA20bsa034_u:2156: śuddhāśayastu bodhisattvo yathaivāpāsamatikramaṃ pratilabhate tathaivākṣayabhogatāṃ janmani pratilabhate /
SA20bsa034_u:2157: punaraparaṃ bodhisattvo na tīrthikāya randhraprekṣiṇe dharmaṃ mukhoddeśato vā pustakagataṃ vā dadāti /

SA20bsa034_u:2396_1: vāntāśanamiva samyak prajñayā paśyan nāsvādayati prāgeva pratyavarebhyaḥ [sattvebhyaḥ] pratyavaram /
SA20bsa034_u:2397: pravivekābhirataśca bhavati ekākī saṃvamadhye vā sarvakālaṃ cittavyapakṛṣṭavihārī /
SA20bsa034_u:2399: api tu śīlaṃ niśritya śīlaṃ pratiṣṭhāya ye te 'prameyā bodhisattvasamādhayasteṣāmabhinirhārāya vaśitāprāptaye vyāyacchate /
SA20bsa034_u:2400: saḥ saṃsargato 'pyaṇukām apyasatsaṃkathā masadvācaṃ nādhivāsayati pravivekagataścāṇukamapyasadvitarkam /
SA20bsa034_u:2401: pramuṣitayā ca smṛtyā tatsamudācārahetoḥ kālena kālaṃ tīvraṃ vipratisāramādīnavadarśanamutpādayati /
SA20bsa034_u:2405: pratisaṃharaṇābhyāsataśca krameṇa tadyathā pūrvaṃ tatsamudācāra-ratirabhūt tathā etaharyasamudācāra-ratiḥ santiṣṭhate samudācāraprātikūlyañca /
SA20bsa034_u:2406_0: sarvabodhisattvaśikṣāpadāni cāsya mahābhūmipraviṣṭānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ śrutvā udārāṇyaprameyāṇyacintyāni
SA20bsa034_u:2406_1: dīrghakālikāni paramaduśkarāṇi na bhavati cetasa uttāso vā layaḥ saṃkoco vā nānyatrāsyaivaṃ bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:2408: vayamapi manuṣyabhūtāḥ krameṇa ca śikṣamāṇāḥ asaṃśayamanuprāpsyāmastāṃ kāyavāksaṃvarasampattimiti /
SA20bsa034_u:2409: ātmadoṣāntaraskhalitagaveṣī ca bodhisattvo bhavati śīlasaṃvare vyavasthito na paradoṣāntaraskhalitagaveṣī /

SA20bsa034_u:2411: dharmamahākaruṇatāmupādāyādhimātrameva teṣāmantike bodhisattvānāmanukampācittañca kartukāmatācittañca pratyupasthitaṃ bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:2412: saṃvaraśīlavyasthitaśca bodhisattvaḥ pāṇiloṣṭadaṇḍaśastrasaṃsparśairapi pareṣāmantike cittamapi na pradūṣayati /
SA20bsa034_u:2413: kutaḥ punaḥ pāpikāṃ vācaṃ niścārayiṣyati pratihaniṣyati vā prāgeva punaḥ ākrośaroṣaṇaparibhāṣaṇaistanukaduḥkhasparśajairapakāraiḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:2414_1: bhavati pūrvāntasahagatenāparāntasahagatena madhyāntasahagatena pūrvakālakaraṇīyena sahānucareṇa ca /
SA20bsa034_u:2415: bodhisattvaśikṣāsu śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvaḥ atītamadhvānamupādāya yāmāpattimāpannaḥ sā 'nena yathādharmaṃ pratikṛtā bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:2422: kaccidahaṃ tathā tathā careyaṃ yathā yathā caran yathā yathā viharan āpattiṃ nāpadyeyam /
SA20bsa034_u:2424: sa pūrvakālakaraṇīyamevāpramādaṃ niśritya tathā tathā carati tathā tathā viharati yathā yathāsya carato viharato vā āpattirnottiṣṭhate /
SA20bsa034_u:2426_0: saṃvaraśīla-vyavasthito bodhisattvaḥ praticchannakalyāṇo bhavati vivṛtapāpaḥ alpecchaḥ
SA20bsa034_u:2427: ebhirdaśabhiraṅgaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvaḥ saṃvaraśīlavyavasthitaḥ susaṃvṛtaśīlī bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:2429: punarbodhisattvaḥ kuśala[dharma]saṃgrāhakaśīle vyavasthitaḥ uttpannāṃ kāyabhogāpekṣāṃ svalpāmapi nādhivāsayati prāgeva prabhūtām /
SA20bsa034_u:2436: kuśalahetuṃ kuśalahetuphale viparyāsamaviparyāsañca kuśalasaṃgrahāya cāntarāyaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
SA20bsa034_u:2438: kuśalasaṃgrahāya viparyāsañcāviparyāsañca yathābhūtaṃ prajānan bodhisattvaḥ prāpya kuśalaphalaṃ nānitye nityadarśī bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:2443_1: bhavati sarvākāra[saṃgraha]śca yaduta dānopaniṣadāśīlopaniṣadā kṣāntyupaniṣadā vīryopaniṣadā
SA20bsa034_u:2446_0: iha bodhisattvaḥ sattvānāṃ teṣu teṣu kṛtyeṣu sahāyībhāvaṃ gacchan kṛtyacintāyāṃ kṛtyasamarthane
SA20bsa034_u:2446_1: sahāyībhāvaṃ gacchati adhvagamanāgamane samyakkarmāntaprayoge bhogānāmārakṣaṇe vibhinnānyo
SA20bsa034_u:2447: punarbodhisattvaḥ sahāyībhāvaṃ gacchan vyādhitān sattvān paricarati /
SA20bsa034_u:2450: vyaṅgān śirasā vā yānena vā vahati /
SA20bsa034_u:2454_1: kulodaya pratisaṃyuktaśca vitarko veditavyaḥ pariparibhavaparājayaduḥkhena duḥkhitānāṃ
SA20bsa034_u:2456_0: punarbodhisattvaḥ sattvānāṃ nyāyaṃ vyapadiśan duścaritacāriṇāṃ sattvānāṃ duścaritaprahāṇāya
SA20bsa034_u:2457_0: upāyakauśalyaṃ vā punarvyapadiśati yathā duścaritacāriṇāṃ sattvānāṃ duścaritaprahāṇāya
SA20bsa034_u:2457_1: evaṃ matsāriṇāṃ [sattvānāṃ] mātsaryaprahāṇāya dṛṣṭe vā dharme samyagalpakṛcchreṇa
SA20bsa034_u:2457_2: bhogānāmarjanāya rakṣaṇāya ca śāsane 'smin pratihatānāṃ śraddhāpratilambhāya darśanapratilambhāya /
SA20bsa034_u:2458_1: punarbodhisattva upakāriṇāṃ sattvānāṃ kṛtajñatāṃ prāviṣkurvan dṛṣṭvā satkṛtyālapati
SA20bsa034_u:2460: tulyādhikena cāsya pratilābhasatkāreṇa pratyupasthito bhavati na nyūnena /
SA20bsa034_u:2461: sa kṛtyeṣvasyāyācito 'pi sahāyībhāvaṃ gacchati prāgeva yācitaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:2462_0: yathā kṛtyeṣu evaṃ duḥkheṣu nayopadeśe bhayaparitrāṇe vyasanasthaśokaprativinodane
SA20bsa034_u:2462_1: upakaraṇopasaṃhāre sanniśrayadāne cittānuvartane bhūtairguṇaiḥ saṃpraharṣaṇe snigdhena
SA20bsa034_u:2465_0: kṣudramṛgabhayādapi sattvān rakṣati āvartagrāhabhayādapi rājabhayādapi corabhayādapi
SA20bsa034_u:2466: punarbodhisattvo vyasanasthānāṃ sattvānāṃ śokaprativinodanaṃ jñātivyasanamārabhya mātāpitṛmaraṇe 'pi śokaṃ [prati]vinodayati /
SA20bsa034_u:2468: bhoga vyasanaṃ vā punarārabhya sa cedbhogā rājñā vā pareṣāmapahṛtā bhavanti /
SA20bsa034_u:2471: agninā vā dagdhā udakena vā apahṛtāḥ kunihitā vā nidhayaḥ pranaṣṭā bhavanti /
SA20bsa034_u:2475: yena te bhogā anayena vyasanamāpāditā bhavanti /
SA20bsa034_u:2476: tannidānamapi śokamutpannaṃ mṛdumadhyādhimātraṃ sattvānāṃ bodhisattvaḥ samyak prativinodayati /
SA20bsa034_u:2477: punarupakaraṇārthinām upakaraṇopasaṃhāraṃ kurvan bodhisattvo bhojanaṃ bhojanārthibhyo dadāti /
SA20bsa034_u:2486: punaḥ parigrahaśīlena bodhisattvaḥ sattvānāṃ gaṇaparikarṣaṇayogena parigrahaṃ kurvan pūrvantāvat niśrayaṃ dadāti nirāmiṣeṇa cittenānukampācittenānukampācittameva [saṃ]puraṣkṛtya /
SA20bsa034_u:2488: dhārmikaiśca dharmalabdhaiḥ svaiścīvarapiṇḍapātaśayānāsanaglāna pratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ sādhāraṇaparibhogī ca bhavatyapratiguptabhojī /
SA20bsa034_u:2492: punarbodhisattvaścittānuvartanaśīlena sattvānāṃ cittamanuvartamānaḥ ādita evaṃ sattvānāṃ bhāvaṃ ca jānāti prakṛtiñca /
SA20bsa034_u:2493: bhāvañca jñātvā prakṛtiñca yathā yaiḥ sattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃvastavyaṃ bhavati tathā [taiḥ] saṃvasati /
SA20bsa034_u:2494: yathā yeṣu sattveṣu pratipattavyaṃ bhavati tathā teṣu pratipadyate /
SA20bsa034_u:2495: yasya ca sattvasya bodhisattvaścittamanuvartitukāmo bhavati tasya ca cetpaśyatyevaṃrūpeṇāsya vastusamudācāreṇa kāyikavācikena duḥkhadaurmasyamutpatsyete /
SA20bsa034_u:2496: taccaduḥkhadaurmanasyamasya nākuśalāt sthānād vyutthānāya kuśale ca sthāne pratiṣṭhāpanāya saṃvartiṣyate /
SA20bsa034_u:2497: pratisaṃkhyāya bodhisattvastaṃ kāyikavācikaṃ vastasamudācāraṃ yatnataḥ pariharati na samudācarati /
SA20bsa034_u:2498: sa cetpunastad duḥkhadaurmanasyamasyākuśalāt sthānād vyutthāpya [Dutt_103] kuśale sthāne pratiṣṭhāpanāya paśyati nānuvartate /
SA20bsa034_u:2499_0: pratisaṃkhyāya bodhisattvaḥ paracittaṃ yaduta parānukampāmevopādāya yena ca pareṣāṃ
SA20bsa034_u:2499_2: tadanyeṣāmakuśalāt sthānād vyutthānāya kuśale sthāne pratiṣṭhā[pa]nāya [na] saṃvartate
SA20bsa034_u:2500: sa cetpunaḥ paśyati pareṣāṃ tadanyeṣāṃ vā tadubhayorvā akuśalāt sthānād vyutthāpya kuśale sthāne pratiṣṭhāpanāya pratisaṃkhyāya samudācarati bodhisattvastaṃ kāyavāksamudācāram /
SA20bsa034_u:2502_0: yena ca bodhisattva ātmano vastusamudācāreṇa kāyikavācikena pareṣāṃ duḥkhadaurmanasyamutpadyamānaṃ
SA20bsa034_u:2502_1: samanupaśyati sa ca kāyavāksamudācāro na śikṣāpadaparigṛhīto bhavati na puṇyajñānasambhārānugataḥ
SA20bsa034_u:2502_2: tacca duḥkhadaurmanasyaṃ pareṣāṃ nākuśalāt sthānāditi pūrvavadveditavyam /
SA20bsa034_u:2505: yathā duḥkhadaurmanasyamevaṃ sukhasaumanasyaṃ yathāyogaṃ vistareṇa veditavyam /
SA20bsa034_u:2506: na ca paracittānuvartī bodhisattvaḥ parasya krodhaparyavasthānena paryavasthitasya sammukhamavigate krodhaparyavasthāne varṇamapi bhāṣate prāgevāvarṇam /
SA20bsa034_u:2508: punaḥ paracittānuvartī bodhisattvaḥ paramanālapantamapyālapati [prati]sammodayati prāgevālapantaṃ pratisammodayantam /
SA20bsa034_u:2509: [na ca] paracittānuvartī bodhisattvaḥ pareṣāṃ kṣubhyati nānyatrāvasādayitukāmaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:2511: na ca paricittānuvartī bodhisattvaḥ paramavahasati nāvaspaṇḍayati na maḍkubhāvamasyopasaṃharati nāpyasparśavihārāya kaukṛtyamupasaṃharati /
SA20bsa034_u:2514: na ca paracittānuvartī bodhisattvaḥ pareṣāmasevī bhavati nāpyatisevī nāpyakālasevī nāpi teṣāṃ purastātpriyavigarhako bhavati nāpyapriyapraśaṃsakaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:2521: punarbodhisattvaḥ nigrahaśīlena sattvānnigṛhṇan mṛdvaparādhaṃ mṛduvyatikramaṃ snigdhenāntarbhāvenāvipannena mṛdvyā 'vasādanikayā avasādayati /
SA20bsa034_u:2527_0: punarbodhisattvaḥ ṛddhibalena sattvānuttrāsāyitukāmaḥ āvarjayitukāmo vā duścaritacāriṇāṃ
SA20bsa034_u:2528: paśyantu bhavanto duścaritasya [kṛtopacitasya] manuṣyabhūtairidamīdṛśaṃ raudraṃ paramakaṭukamaniṣṭaṃ phalavipākaṃ pratyanubhūyamānamiti /
SA20bsa034_u:2529: te ca taṃ dṛṣṭvā uttrasyanti saṃvegamāpadyante duścaritātprativiramanti /
SA20bsa034_u:2530_0: tadekatyāṃśca sattvān bodhisattvasya mahatyāṃ pariṣadi sannisannasya praśnasaṃpādenānādeyaṃ
SA20bsa034_u:2530_1: vacanaṃ kartukāmān bodhisattvo vajrapāṇiṃ vā 'nyatamaṃ vā udāravarṇamahākāyaṃ [mahābalaṃ]
SA20bsa034_u:2532: tasya ca mahājanakāyasya tena praśnavyākaraṇena vinayanārtham /
SA20bsa034_u:2533: vicitreṇa vā punaḥ ṛdvyabhisaṃskāreṇa tadyathā eko bhūtvā bahudhā bhavan bahudhā bhūtvā eko bhavan tiraḥ kuḍayaṃ tiraḥ
SA20bsa034_u:2534_0: śailaṃ tiraḥ prākāramasajjamānena kāyena gacchanvistareṇa yāvadbrahmalokaṃ kāyena
SA20bsa034_u:2534_1: vaśe vartayan yamakānyapi prātihāryāṇi vidarśayastejodhātumapi samāpadyamānaḥ śrāvakāsādhāraṇaṃ
SA20bsa034_u:2534_2: vā punarṛddhimupadarśayannāvarjayan toṣayitvā saṃpraharṣya aśraddhaṃ [Dutt_105] śraddhāsaṃpadi niveśayati /
SA20bsa034_u:2535: duḥśīlaṃ śīlasaṃpadi alpaśrutaṃ śrutasaṃpadi matsariṇaṃ tyāgasaṃpadi duṣprajñaṃ prajñāsaṃpadi niveśayati /
SA20bsa034_u:2536: evaṃ hi bodhisattvaḥ sarvākāreṇa sattvārthakriyāśīlena samanvāgato bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:2537: ta ete bhavanti trayo bodhisattvasya śīlaskandhāḥ aprameyāḥ puṇyaskandhāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:2539_0: tatra bodhisattvenāsmin trividhe 'pi śīlaskandhe bodhisattvaśikṣāyāṃ śikṣitukāmena
SA20bsa034_u:2539_1: gṛhiṇā vā pravrajitena vā 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau kṛtapraṇidhānena sahadhārmikasya
SA20bsa034_u:2539_3: ityevaṃrūpasya bodhisattvasya pūrvaṃ pādayornipatyādhyeṣaṇāṃ kṛtvā yathā tavāhaṃ
SA20bsa034_u:2540_1: daśamu dikṣu mahābhūmipraviṣṭānāñca mahājñānaprabhāvaprāptānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ sāmīcīṃ
SA20bsa034_u:2540_2: kṛtvā guṇāṃśca teṣāṃmāmukhīkṛtya ghanarasaṃ prasādaṃ cetasaḥ sañjanayya parīttaṃ
SA20bsa034_u:2541: sa vijño bodhisattvo nīcairjānu-maṇḍalanipatitena vā utkuṭu[ka]sthitena vā tathāgatapratimāṃ purataḥ sthāpayitvā saṃpūraskṛtyaivaṃ syādvacanīyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:2542: anuprayaccha me kulaputrāyuṣman bhadanteti vā bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvarasamādānam /
SA20bsa034_u:2543_0: ityuktvā ekāgrāṃ smṛtimupasthāpya cittapraśādamevānupabṛṃhayatā na cirasyedānīṃ me
SA20bsa034_u:2544: tena punarvijñena bodhisattvena sa tathā pratipanno bodhisattvaḥ avikṣiptena cetasā sthitena vā niṣaṇṇena vā āsane idaṃ syādvacanīyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:2545: śruṇu evaṃnāman kulaputra dharmabhrātariti vā bodhisattvo 'si bodhau ca kṛtapraṇidhānaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:2548: pratīcchasi tvamevaṃnāman [Dutt_106] kulaputra mamāntikāt sarvāṇi bodhisattvaśikṣāpadāni sarvañca bodhisattvaśīlaṃ saṃvaraśīlaṃ kuśaladharmasaṃgrāhakaśīlaṃ sattvārthakriyāśīlañca /
SA20bsa034_u:2551: yāni śikṣāpadāni yacchīlametarhi daśasu dikṣu pratyutpannānāṃ sarvabodhisattvānāṃ bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:2556: evaṃ dvirapi trirapi tena ca vijñena bodhisattvena vaktavyam /
SA20bsa034_u:2557: tena ca mamādāyakena bodhisattvena yāvat trirapi pratijñātavyaṃ pṛṣṭena /
SA20bsa034_u:2558_0: evaṃ hi tena vijñena bodhisattvena tasya pratigrāhakasya bodhisattvasya yāvat trirapi
SA20bsa034_u:2558_1: bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvarasamādāna dattvā pratijñāñca pratigṛhyāvyutthita eva tasmin
SA20bsa034_u:2558_2: pratigrāhake bodhisattve tasyā eva tathāgatapratimāyāḥ purato daśasu dikṣu sarvabuddhabodhisattvānāṃ
SA20bsa034_u:2558_3: tiṣṭhatāṃ dhriyatāṃ yāpayatāṃ pādayornipatya sāmīcīṃ kṛtvā evamārocayitavyam /
SA20bsa034_u:2559: pratigṛhītamanena evanāmnā bodhisattvena mama evaṃnāmno bodhisattvasyāntikādyāvat trirapi bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvarasamādānam /
SA20bsa034_u:2562_1: daśasu dikṣvanantāparnyateṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatānāṃ mahābhūmipraviṣṭānāñca bodhisattvānāñca
SA20bsa034_u:2568: yathā evaṃnānmā bodhisattvena amuṣmin lokadhātāvevaṃnāmno bodhisattvasyāntikāt samyagbodhisattvaśīla saṃbarasamādānaṃ gṛhītamiti /
SA20bsa034_u:2569: te cāsya sarve putrasyaiva bhrāturivakalyāṇairmanobhiḥ pratyanukampante /
SA20bsa034_u:2570: evaṃ kalyāṇamanaḥpratyanukampitasya [tasya] bodhisattvasya [Dutt_107] bhūyasyā mātrayā vṛddhiḥ pratikāṃkṣitavyā kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ na hāniḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:2572_1: daśasu dikṣu teṣāmanantāparyantalokadhātugatānāṃ buddhabodhisattvānāṃ sāmīcīṃ kṛtvā
SA20bsa034_u:2574_1: nopayanti sahasratamīmapi saṃkhyāmapi kalāmapi gaṇanāmapyupamāmapyupaniṣadamapi nopayanti
SA20bsa034_u:2575_1: bodhisattvasya pratirūpaṃ kartum idamapratirūpaṃ kartumiti tathaiva tata ūrdhvaṃ
SA20bsa034_u:2576: bodhisattvasūtrapiṭakādvā yatnataḥ śrutvā 'smābodhisattvasūtrapiṭakamātṛkānibandhāt śrutvā tathaiva śikṣā karaṇīyā /
SA20bsa034_u:2579_1: na lobhābhibhūtasya mahecchasyāsantuṣṭasya na śīlavipannasya śikṣāsvanādarakāriṇaḥ
SA20bsa034_u:2579_2: śaithilikasya na krodhanasyopanāhinaḥ akṣāntibahulasya parato vyatikramāsahiṣṇoḥ
SA20bsa034_u:2579_3: nālasasya kusīdasya yadbhūyasā rātrindivaṃ nidrāsukhaṃ pārśvasukhaṃ śayanasukhañca
SA20bsa034_u:2581: na mandasya na momuhajātīyasyātyarthaṃ saṃlīnacittasya bodhisattvasūtrapiṭakaṃ bodhisattvapiṭakamātṛkāmapavadamānasya /
SA20bsa034_u:2582: na ca punaretat saṃvarasamādānavidhānaṃ bodhisattvenodgṛhya paryavāpyāpi bodhisattvapiṭaka pratihatānāmaśrāddhānāṃ sattvānāṃ sahasaivārocayitavya pravedayitavyam /
SA20bsa034_u:2585_0: yaścainamapavadate sa yāvadapramāṇena puṇyaskandhena samanvāgataḥ saṃvarasthāyī bodhisattvo
SA20bsa034_u:2585_1: bhavati tāvadapramāṇenaiva so 'puṇyaskandhenānuṣakto bhavati yāvattāṃ pāpikāṃ vācaṃ
SA20bsa034_u:2585_2: pāpikāṃ dṛṣṭiṃ pāpakān sakalpān sarveṇa sarva notsṛjati /
SA20bsa034_u:2586: śīlasaṃvarasamādānañca kartukāmasya bodhisattvasya purato 'syāṃ bodhisattvasūtrapiṭakamātṛkāyāṃ yāni bodhisattvasya śikṣāpadānyāpattisthānāni cākhyātāni tānyanuśrāvayitavyāni /
SA20bsa034_u:2588: na parasamādāpanikayā nāpi paraspardhayā [sa]dhīro bodhisattvo veditavyaḥ /

SA20bsa034_u:2594: yadapi bodhisattvastadrūpaṃ krodhaparyavasthānamanuvṛṃhayati yena tato na vākpāruṣyaniścāraṇamātrakeṇa nivartate /
SA20bsa034_u:2595: krodhābhibhūtaḥ pāṇinā vā loṣṭena vā daṇḍena vā śastreṇa sattvāṃstāḍayati vihiṃsayati viheṭhayati /
SA20bsa034_u:2596: krodhāśayameva ca tīvramantarākṛtvā pareṣāmantikādvyatikramasajñapti na pratigṛhaṇāti na kṣamate nāśayaṃ vimuñcati /
SA20bsa034_u:2599: svayaṃ vā saddharmapratirūpakādhimuktasya pareṣāṃ cā 'nuvṛttyā bodhisattvasya pārājayikasthānīyo dharmaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:2601: yeṣāṃ bodhisattvo 'nyatamānyatamaṃ dharmamadhyāpadya prāgeva sarvānabhavyo bhavati dṛṣṭe dharme vipulasya bodhisattvasaṃbhārasyopacayāya parigrahāya /
SA20bsa034_u:2602: abhavyo bhavati ca dṛṣṭe [Dutt_109] dharme āśayaviśuddheḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:2607: yataśca bodhisattvaḥ eṣāṃ caturṇāṃ pārājayikasthānīyānāṃ dharmāṇāmabhīkṣṇa-samudācārāt parīttamapi hrībyapatrāpyaṃ notpādayati /
SA20bsa034_u:2612: na tu bodhisattvaḥ sakṛdeva pārājayikasthānīyadharmasamudācārāt bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvarasamādānaṃ vijahāti /
SA20bsa034_u:2614_0: parityaktasamādāno 'pi ca bodhisattvo dṛṣṭe dharme bhavyaḥ punarādānāya bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvarasamādānasya
SA20bsa034_u:2614_1: bhavati nābhavya eva tadyathā pārājayikādhyāpannaḥ prātimokṣasaṃvarastho bhikṣuḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:2615: samāsataśca dvābhyāmeva kāraṇābhyāṃ bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvarasamādānasya tyāgo bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:2617: na ca parivṛttajanmāpi bodhisattvaḥ bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvarasamādānaṃ vijahāti /
SA20bsa034_u:2618: adha urdhvaṃ tiryaksarvatropapadyamāno yena bodhisattvena praṇidhānaṃ na tyaktaṃ bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:2619: nāpi ca pārājayikasthānīyānāṃ dharmāṇāmadhimātraṃ paryavasthānaṃ samudācaritaṃ bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:2620: muṣitasmṛtistu parivṛttajanmā bodhisattvaḥ kalyāṇamitrasamparkamāgamya smṛtyudbodhanārthaṃ punaḥ punarādānaṃ karoti /
SA20bsa034_u:2624_0: evaṃ bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvarasthito bodhisattvaḥ pratidivasaṃ tathāgatasya vā tathāgatamuddiśya
SA20bsa034_u:2624_1: caitye dharmasya vā dharmamuddiśya pustakagate 'pi bodhisattvasūtrapiṭake [Dutt_110]
SA20bsa034_u:2624_2: [bodhisattvasūtrapiṭaka]mātṛkāyāṃ vā saṃghasya vā yo 'sau daśasu dikṣu mahābhūmipraviṣṭānāṃ
SA20bsa034_u:2624_3: bodhisattvānāṃ saṃghaḥ kiñcidevālpaṃ vā prabhūtaṃ vā pūjādhikārikamakṛtvā 'ntata

SA20bsa034_u:2630: bodhisattvo mahecchatāmasantuṣṭiṃ lābhasatkāragardhamutpannamadhivāsayati sāpattiko bhavati sātisāraḥ kliṣṭāmāpattimāpadyate /
SA20bsa034_u:2631: anāpattistatprahāṇāya cchandajātasya vīryamārabhata statpratipakṣaparigraheṇa tatpratibandhāvasthitasya prakṛtyā tīvrakleśatayābhibhūya punaḥ punaḥ samudācārāṇāt /
SA20bsa034_u:2632: bodhisattvo vṛddhatarakaṃ guṇavantaṃ satkārārhaṃ sahadhārmikaṃ dṛṣṭvā mānābhinigrahītaḥ āghātacittaḥ pratighacitto vā utthāyāsanaṃ nānuprayacchati /
SA20bsa034_u:2633_0: paraiścālapyamānaḥ pratisammodyamānaḥ paripṛṣṭaśca na yuktarūpeṇa vāk pratyudāhāreṇa

SA20bsa034_u:2636: anāpattiḥ [suptaḥ] syādayañca prativibuddhasaṃjñī upaśliṣyed ālapet saṃlapet pratisammodayet paripṛcchet /

SA20bsa034_u:2641: [Dutt_111] anāpattistenopāyena teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ damayato vinayataḥ akuśalātsthānādvyutthāpya kuśale sthānepratiṣṭhāpayataḥ /

SA20bsa034_u:2668: bodhisattvaḥ pareṣāṃ dharmārthināmāghātacittaḥ pratighacittaḥ īrṣyāviprakṛto vā dharmaṃ nānuprayacchati /

SA20bsa034_u:2676: anāpattirmṛdvindriyasyodārayā dharmadeśanayā dharmaparyāptyā uttrāsaṃ mithyādarśanaṃ mithyābhiniveśaṃ kṣatiñcopahatiñca saṃbhāvayet /

SA20bsa034_u:2678: bodhisattvo raudreṣu duḥśīleṣu ca sattveṣvāghātacittaḥ pratighacittaḥ upekṣate viceṣṭate vā raudratāṃ duḥśīlatāmeva ca pratyayaṃ kṛtvā /
SA20bsa034_u:2681: sāpattiko bhavati sātisāro no tu kliṣṭāmāpattimāpadyate /
SA20bsa034_u:2683_0: na hi bodhisattvasya śīlavataḥ śānteḥ kāyavāṅmanaskarmapracāre tathānukampācittañca

SA20bsa034_u:2688: bodhisattvo yadbhagavatā prātimokṣe vinaye pratikṣepaṇa-sāvadyaṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ paracittānurakṣāmupādāyāprasannānāṃ sattvānāṃ prasādāya prasannānāñca bhūyobhāvāya /
SA20bsa034_u:2689: tatra tulyāṃ śrāvakaiḥ śikṣāṃ karoti nirnirākaraṇam /
SA20bsa034_u:2692: te tāvanna paraniranurakṣā aprasannānāṃ prasādāya prasannānāñca bhūyobhāvāya śikṣāsu śikṣante /

SA20bsa034_u:2697: śobhate śrāvakaḥ svārthaparamaḥ parārthanirapekṣaḥ parārthamārabhyālpārthaḥ alpakṛtyaścālpotsukavihārī ca /

SA20bsa034_u:2699: teṣāṃ ca sattvānāṃ balābalaṃ saṃlakṣya yāvadartha pratigṛhītavyāni /

SA20bsa034_u:2709: asti kiñcitprakṛtisāvadyamapi [yad] bodhisattvastadrūpeṇopāyakauśalyena samudācarati yenānāpattikaśca bhavati bahu ca puṇyaṃ prasūyate /

SA20bsa034_u:2712: yadyapyahamenaṃ prāṇinaṃ jīvitādvyaparopya narakeṣūpapadyeyaṃ kāmaṃ bhavatu me narakopapattiḥ /

SA20bsa034_u:2715: anāpattiko bhavati bahu ca puṇyaṃ prasūyate /
SA20bsa034_u:2716: yathāpi tad bodhisattvo ye sattvā rājāno vā bhavanti rājamahāmātrā vā adhimātraraudrāḥ sattveṣu nirdayā ekāntaparapīḍāpravṛttāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:2717: tāṃ satyāṃ śaktau tasmādrājyaiśvaryādhipatyāccyāvayati yatra sthitāste tannidānaṃ bahvapuṇyaṃ prasavanti anukampācitto hitasukhāśayaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:2718: ye ca paradravyāpahāriṇaścaurāstaskarāḥ sāṃdhikaṃ staupikañca prabhūtaṃ dravyaṃ hṛtvā svīkṛtyopabhoktukāmāsteṣāmantikāttad dravyaṃ bodhisattva ācchinatti /

SA20bsa034_u:2840: yaḥ punarbodhisattvaḥ evaṃdṛṣṭi syādevaṃvādī na bodhisattvena śrāvakayānapratisaṃyukto dharmaḥ śrotavyo nodgrahītavyo na tatra śikṣā karaṇīyā /

SA20bsa034_u:2848: bodhisattvo buddhavacane sati buddhavacane akṛtayogyastīrthikaśāstreṣu bahiḥśāstreṣu yogyāṃ karoti /

SA20bsa034_u:2851: evamapi ca bodhisattvo vidhimanatikramya tīrthikaśāstreṣu bahiḥśāstreṣu kauśalaṃ kurvannabhiratarūpastatra karauti tena ca ramate na tu kaṭubhaiṣajyamiva niṣevamāṇaḥkaroti /
SA20bsa034_u:2853: bodhisattvo bodhisattvapiṭake gambhīrāṇi sthānāni śrutvā paramagaṃbhīrāṇi tattvārthaṃ vārabhya buddhabodhisattvaprabhāvaṃ vā 'nadhimucyamāno 'pavadate /
SA20bsa034_u:2854: naite arthopasaṃhitā na dharmopasaṃhitā na tathāgatabhāṣitā na hitasukhāya sattvānāmiti /
SA20bsa034_u:2857: bhavati khalu bodhisattvasya gambhīrāṇi paramagaṃbhīrāṇi sthānāni śrutvā cetaso 'nadhimokṣaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:2860: iti [evaṃ] sa bodhisattva ātmānañcājñaṃ vyavasthāpayati [Dutt_120] tathāgatameva ca teṣu buddhadharmeṣvaparokṣatāyāṃ samanupaśyati /

SA20bsa034_u:2868: bodhisattvo dharmaśravaṇa-dharmasāṃkathyaviniścayaṃ vā mānābhinigṛhītaḥ āghātacittaḥ pratighacitto nopasaṃkrāmati /
SA20bsa034_u:2874: anāpattirdhārmakathikacitattānurakṣiṇaḥ anāpattiḥ punaḥ punaḥ [anu]śrutāmavadhṛtāṃ vijñātārthāṃ kathāṃ saṃjānataḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:2877: anāpattiradhimātradhandhaprajñasya dhandhaṃ dharmamudgṛhṇataḥ dhandhaṃ dhārayataḥ dhandhamālambane cittaṃ samādadhataḥ /

SA20bsa034_u:2885: anāpattiḥ svayaṃ kartumasamarthaḥ syāt sapratisaraṇaśca yācakaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:2890: anāpattiḥ kuśalapakṣe nairantaryeṇa samyak prayuktaḥ syāt /
SA20bsa034_u:2894: bodhisattvo glānaṃ vyādhitaṃ sattvamāsādya nopasthānaparicaryāṃ karoti āghātacittaḥ pratighacittaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:2903: anāpattiradhimātradhandhaprajñasya dhandhaṃ dharmamuddiśato dhandhaṃ dhārayato dhandhamālambane cittaṃ samādadhataḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:2907: bodhisattvo dṛṣṭadhārmike sāṃparāyike cārthe anayaprayuktān [sattvān] dṛṣṭvā āghātacittaḥ pratighacitto nyāyaṃ nayaṃ na vyapadiśati /
SA20bsa034_u:2913: anāpattiḥ sa eva svayaṃ pratibalaḥ syāt /
SA20bsa034_u:2916: anāpattiryasya nyāyopadeśaḥ karaṇīyaḥ sa āghātacittaḥsyāddurvaco viparītagrāhī vigatapremagauravaḥ khaṭuṅkajātīyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:2918: bodhisattva upakāriṇāṃ sattvānāmakṛtajño bhavatyakṛtavedī āghātacitto na pratyupakāreṇānurūpeṇa pratyupatiṣṭhate /
SA20bsa034_u:2925: bodhisattvo jñātibhogavyasanasthānāṃ sattvānāmāghātacittaḥ utpannaṃśokaṃ na vinodayati /
SA20bsa034_u:2930: bodhisattvo bhojanapānādinyupakaraṇajātāni bhojanapānādikārthibhyaḥ samyagyācito na prayacchatyāghātacittaḥ pratighacittaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:2938: bodhisattvaḥ pariṣadamupasthāpya na kālena kālaṃ sabhyagavavadati samyaksamanuśāsti /
SA20bsa034_u:2939: na ca teṣāmarthavighātināṃ śrāddhānāṃ brāhmaṇagṛhapatīnāmantikāddharmeṇa cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsana[glāna]pratyayamaiṣajyapariṣkārān paryeṣate āghātacittaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:2941: [ālasyakausīdyāt pramādādvā nāvavadati na samanuśāsti na paryeṣate akliṣṭāmāpattimāpadyate /

SA20bsa034_u:2961: bodhisattvaḥ āghātacittaḥ pareṣāṃ bhūtān guṇān nodbhāvayati bhūtaṃ varṇaṃ na bhāṣate subhāṣite sādhukāraṃ na dadāti /
