SA20bsa034_u:2979: ālasyakausīdyāt pramādādvā nāvasādāyati yāvanna pravāsayati akliṣṭāmāttimāpadyate /
SA20bsa034_u:2984: anāpattiste sattvā aśaṭhā bhaveyustrīvreṇa hrīvyapatrāpyena samanvāgatā laghu laghveva pratyāpadyeran /
SA20bsa034_u:2987: anāpattiryatra sattvā yadbhūyasā pratiniviṣṭā bhaveyustīrthikā āryāpavādikayā mithyādṛṣṭ samanvāgatāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:2989: itīmānyutpannavastukāni bodhisattvānāṃ śikṣāpadāni teṣu teṣu sūtrānteṣu vyagrāṇi bhagavatā ākhyātāni saṃvaraśīlaṃ kuśalasaṃgrāhakaṃ śīlaṃ sattvārthakriyāśīlañcārabhya /
SA20bsa034_u:2990: tānyasyāṃ bodhisattvapiṭakamātṛkāyāṃ samagrāṇyākhyātāni yeṣu bodhisattvenāradajātena paramagauravamupasthāpya śikṣā karaṇīyā /
SA20bsa034_u:2991: parataḥ saṃvarasamādanaṃ kṛtvā suviśuddhena śikṣitukāmāśayena bodhyāśayena sattvārthāśayena ādita eva cāvyatikramāyādarajātena bhavitavyam /
SA20bsa034_u:2994: yasya kasyacicchrāvakayānīyasya vā mahāyānīyasya vā 'ntike deśayitavyā yastāṃ vāgvijñaptiṃ pratibalaḥ syādavaboddhaṃ pratigrahītum /
SA20bsa034_u:2995: sa cedbodhisattvaḥ pārājayikasthānīyaṃ dharmamadhyāpanno bhavatyadhimātreṇa paryavasthānena tena tyaktaḥ saṃvaraḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:2997: sa cenmadhyena paryavasthānenāpanno bhavati tena trayāṇāṃ pudgalānāmantike tato vā uttari duṣkṛtā deśayitavyā /
SA20bsa034_u:2998: pūrva vastu parikīrtayitvā parato niṣadyedaṃ syādvacanīyam /
SA20bsa034_u:2999: samanvāharatvāyupmannahamevaṃnāmā bodhisattva-vinayātisāriṇīṃ yathā parikīrtite vastuni dṛṣkṛtāmāpattimāpannaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:3001: pārājayikasthānīyasya ca dharmasya mṛdunā paryavasthānena tadanyāsāñcāpattīnāmekasyaiva purato deśanā veditavyā /
SA20bsa034_u:3002: asati cānukūle pudgale yasya purato deśyetāśayato bodhisattvena punaranadhyācārāya cittamutpādayitavyam /
SA20bsa034_u:3006: yadi tairguṇairyuṃktaḥ puṅgalo na sannihitaḥsyāttato bodhisattvena tathāgatapratimāyāḥ purataḥ svayameva bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvarasamādānaṃ karaṇīyam /
SA20bsa034_u:3008: ekāṃsamuttarāsaṃgaṃ kṛtvā [Dutt_125] dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya purato vā utkuṭukasthitena idaṃ syādvacanīyam /
SA20bsa034_u:3009: ahamevaṃnāmā daśasu dikṣu sarvāstathāgatān mahābhūmipraviṣṭāṃśca bodhisattvān vijñāpayāmi /
SA20bsa034_u:3010_0: teṣāñca purataḥ sarvāṇi bodhisattvaśikṣāpadāni sarvaṃ bodhisattvaśīlaṃ samādade saṃvaraśīlaṃ
SA20bsa034_u:3010_2: anāgatāḥ sarvabodhisattvāḥ śikṣiṣyante pratyutpannā daśasu dikṣu sarvabodhisattvā etarhi śikṣante /

SA20bsa034_u:3017: nākṛtyaṃ na ca kṛtyaṃ kurvataḥ āpattiryujyate /
SA20bsa034_u:3018: sattveṣu tu dviṣṭo bodhisattvo nātmano na pareṣāṃ hitamācarati /
SA20bsa034_u:3023: evañca punaḥ svavinaye śikṣāprayukto bodhisattvastisṛbhiḥ saṃpattibhiḥ samanvāgataḥ sukhaṃ sparśaṃ viharati prayogasampattyā āśayasampattyā pūrvahetusampattyā ca /
SA20bsa034_u:3025: yathāpi tadbodhisattvaḥ śīleṣvakhaṇḍacārī bhavati pariśuddhakāyavāṅmanaḥsamudācāro nābhīkṣṇāpattiko vivṛtapāpaśca bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:3031: sa evamarthī na kusīdo viharati [na] hīnavīryo [nāvīryo] na vyavakīrṇa pāpakairakuśalairdharmaiḥ sāṃkleśikaiḥ paunarbhavikaiḥ sajvarairduḥkhavipākairāyatyāṃ jātijarāmaraṇīyaiḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:3035: yathāpi tadbodhisattvaḥ pūrvamanyāsu jātiṣu kṛtapuṇyo bhavati kṛtakuśalamūlo yenaitarhi svayañca na vihanyate covarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:3038: ābhistisṛbhiḥ saṃpattibhiḥ samanvāgato vinaye śikṣāprayukto bodhisattvaḥ sukhaṃ sparśaṃ viharati /
SA20bsa034_u:3039: etadviparyayāttisṛbhirvipattibhiḥ samanvāgato duḥkhaṃ saṃsparśaṃ viharatīti veditavyam /

SA20bsa034_u:3041: asyaiva ca sarvaśīlasya pravibhāgastadanyānyapi duṣkaraśīlādīni veditavyāni /
SA20bsa034_u:3044: mahābhogasya bodhisattvasya mahatyaiśvaryādhipatye vartamānasya prahāya bhogān prahāya mahadaiśvaryādhipatyaṃ śīlasaṃvarasamādānaṃ bodhisattvasya duṣkaraśīlamityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:3045: kṛcchrāpanno 'pi ca bodhisattvaḥ samāttaśīlaḥ āprāṇairvipadyamānastacchīlasaṃvarasamādānaṃ na chidrīkaroti /
SA20bsa034_u:3049: yathā yāvajjīvena [api] pratanukāmapyāpatiṃ nāpadyate na śīle ca skhalati kutaḥ punargurvīm /
SA20bsa034_u:3054: tatra samāttaṃ śīlaṃ yena trividhamapi bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvarasamādānaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavati saṃvaraśīlasya kuśalasaṃgrāhaka[śīlasya] sattvārthakriyāśīlasya ca /
SA20bsa034_u:3055: tatra prakṛtiśīlaṃ yadgotrasthasyaiva bodhisattvasya prakṛtibhadratayaiva santānasya pariśuddhaṃ kāyavākkarma pravartate /
SA20bsa034_u:3057: tatrābhyastaṃ śīlaṃ yena bodhisattvena pūrvamanyāsu jātiṣu trividhamapi yathānirdiṣṭaṃ śīlamabhyastaṃ bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:3058: sa tena pūrvahetubalādhānena [na] sarveṇa sarvaṃ pāpasamacāreṇa ramate /
SA20bsa034_u:3062: tatredamupāyayuktaṃ śīlaṃ yaccatvāri saṃgrahavastūni niśritya bodhisattvasya sattveṣu kuśalaṃ kāyavakkarma pravartate /
SA20bsa034_u:3072: tat ṣaḍvidhaṃ saptavidhaṃ caikadhyamabhisaṃkṣipya trayodaśavidhaṃ veditavyam /
SA20bsa034_u:3091: adattamādadyāt kāmeṣu mithyācaret mṛṣāvācaṃ bhāṣeta paiśunyaṃ pāruṣyaṃ sabhinnapralāpaṃ kuryāt pāṇiloṣṭatāḍana saṃsparśaiścāniṣṭairvihiṃsāsaṃsparśaiḥ samudācarediti /
SA20bsa034_u:3092: tasya me evamarthinaḥ sa cet pare viparyayeṇa samudācareyuḥ tena me syādvidhātastanme syādamanāpam /
SA20bsa034_u:3093: paro 'pyarthino yathā 'smākaṃ pare na jīvitadvyaparopayeyurvistareṇa yāvanna vihiṃsāsasparśai samudācareyuriti /
SA20bsa034_u:3094: [Dutt_128] teṣāmapyevamarthināṃ sa cedahaṃ viparyayeṇa samudācareyaṃ tena te syurvighātinastatteṣāṃ syādamanāpam /
SA20bsa034_u:3095: iti yanmama pareṣāñcāmanāpaṃ so 'haṃ kiṃ tena parān samudācariṣyāmi /
SA20bsa034_u:3096: iti pratisaṃkhyāya bodhisattvo jīvitahetorapi parānaṣṭavidhenāmanāpena na samudācarati /
SA20bsa034_u:3100: iha bodhisattvaḥ sattvānāṃ pratiśeddhavyāni sthānāni pratiṣedhayati /
SA20bsa034_u:3106: punaranyaddānasahagataṃ śīlaṃ kṣāntisahagataṃ [vīryasahagataṃ] dhyānasahagataṃ prajñāsahagatañca pañcavidham /
SA20bsa034_u:3108: tasya ca bodhisattvasya pareṣāñca dṛṣṭadharmasaṃparāyasukhāya saṃvartate /
SA20bsa034_u:3112: ādita eva sugṛhīta bhavati śrāmaṇyasabodhikāmatayā na jīvikānimittam /
SA20bsa034_u:3118: samyakpraṇihitaṃ bhavati lābhasatkāragardhavigamāt devatvāya praṇidhāya brahmacaryāvāsānābhyupagamācca /
SA20bsa034_u:3125: ityeṣa bodhisattvasya mahān śīlaskandho mahābodhiphalodayo yamāśritya [Dutt_129] bodhisattvaḥ śīlapāramitāṃ paripūrayitvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisambudhyate /
SA20bsa034_u:3126: yāvacca nābhisabudhyate tāvadayamasminnaprameye bodhisattvaśīlaskandhe śikṣamāṇaḥ pañcānuśaṃsān pratilabhate /
SA20bsa034_u:3129: kāyasya ca bhedāttatropapadyate yatrāsya samānādhikaśīlā bodhisattvāḥ sabhāgāḥ sahadhārmikāḥ kalyāṇamitrabhūtā bhavanti /
SA20bsa034_u:3131: dṛṣṭe dharme samparāye 'pi prakṛtiśīlatāṃ śīlatanmayatāṃ pratilabhate /
SA20bsa034_u:3132: sarvañcaitacchīlaṃ yathānirdiṣṭaṃ svabhāvaśīlādikaṃ navākāraṃ trividhena śīlena saṃgṛhītaṃ veditavyam /
SA20bsa034_u:3134: tatpunastrividhaṃ śīlaṃ samāsato bodhisattvasya trīṇi kāryāṇi karoti /
SA20bsa034_u:3143: etāvat bodhisattvaśīlakāryaṃ nāta uttari nāto bhūyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:3153: yā pratisaṃkhyānabalasanniśrayeṇa vā prakṛtyā vā parāpakārasya marṣaṇā sarveṣāñca marṣaṇā sarvasya ca marṣaṇā nirāmiṣeṇa ca cittena kevalayā karuṇayā [marṣaṇā] /
SA20bsa034_u:3162: tatra kathaṃ bodhisattvaḥ parāpakāraṃ marṣayati kṣamate /
SA20bsa034_u:3163: iha bodhisattvastīvre nirantare citre dīrghakālikea 'pi parāpakāraje duḥkhe sammukhībhūte idaṃ pratisaṃśikṣate /
SA20bsa034_u:3165: yenāhaṃ svayaṃkṛtasyāśubhasya karmaṇo duḥkhamīdṛśaṃ phalaṃ pratyanubhavāmi /
SA20bsa034_u:3173: tatpare tāvadajñāḥ ye asmākaṃ prakṛtiduḥkhitānāṃ bhūyo duḥkhamupasaṃharanti /
SA20bsa034_u:3174: asmākaṃ tu vijñānāṃ satāṃ na pratirūpaṃ syādyadvayamapi pareṣāṃ prakṛtiduḥkhitānāṃ bhūyo duḥkhamupasaṃharemaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:3175: bhūyo 'pi cātmārthe tāvatprayuktānāṃ śrāvakāṇāmakṣāntirna yuktarūpā syāt svapareṣāṃ duḥkhajanikā /
SA20bsa034_u:3177_0: idaṃ pratisaṃkhyāya sa [Dutt_131] bodhisattvaḥ pañcākārāṃ saṃjñāṃ bhāvayan mitrāmitrodāsīnebhyaḥ
SA20bsa034_u:3184: nāsau sattvaḥ sulabharūpo yo me na dīrghasyādhvano 'tyayāt pūrvamanyāsu jātiṣu mātā vābhūt pitā vā bhrātā vā bhaginī vā ācāryo vā upādhyāyo vā gururvā gurusthānīyo vā /
SA20bsa034_u:3185: tasyaivaṃ yoniśo manasikurvataḥ pratyarthikasaṃjñā apakāriṣu sattveṣu antardhīyate suhṛtsaṃjñā ca saṃtiṣṭhate /
SA20bsa034_u:3186: sa tāṃ suhṛtsaṃjñāṃ niśrityāpakārān marṣayati kṣamate /
SA20bsa034_u:3187: kathañca bodhisattvaḥ apakāriṣu sattveṣu dharmamātrānusāriṇīṃ saṃjñāṃ bhāvayati /
SA20bsa034_u:3190: nāstyatra kaścidātmā vā sattvo vā jīvo vā janturvāya ākrośedroṣayettāḍayed bhaṇḍayet paribhāṣeta vā yo vā punarākruśyeta vā roṣyeta vā tāḍayeta vā bhaṇḍayeta vā paribhāṣyeta vā /

SA20bsa034_u:3890: tatra yadbodhisattvastathāgatamuddisya stūpaṃ vā gahaṃ vā kūṭaṃ vā purāṇacaitya vā abhinava-caityaṃ vā pūjayati /
SA20bsa034_u:3892: yad bodhisattvastathāgata-kāya vā tathāgata-caityaṃ vā sammukhībhūtamadhyakṣa pūjayati /
SA20bsa034_u:3894: tatra yad bodhisattvastathāgate vā tathāgate-caitye vā sammukha-pūjāṃ kurvannevamadhyāśaya-sahagataṃ prasāda-sahagataṃ cittamabhisaṃskaroti /
SA20bsa034_u:3895: yā ekasya tathāgatasya dharmatā sā sarveṣāṃ tathāgatānāmatītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ dharmatā /
SA20bsa034_u:3896: yā ekasya tathāgata-caityasya dharmatā sā sarveṣāṃ tathāgata-caityānāṃ dharmatā /
SA20bsa034_u:3897: ityato 'hametañca sammukhībhūtaṃ tathāgataṃ pūjayāmi sarvāṃśca tān atītānāgatapratyutpannāṃśca tathāgatān pūjayāmi /
SA20bsa034_u:3899: tadanyāni ca daśasu dikṣvanantāparyanteṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvāṇi stūpāni gahāni kūṭāgārāṇi purāṇa-caityāni abhinava-caityāni pūjayāmi /
SA20bsa034_u:3901: vimukhā ca tathāgata-pūjā tathāgata-caitya-pūjā ca veditavyā /
SA20bsa034_u:3902: yatpunarbodhisattvaḥ asammukhībhūte tathāgate tathāgata-caitye vā tathāgatacittamabhisaṃskṛtya [Dutt_160] pūjāṃ prayojayati sarvabuddhānuddiśya sarvatathāgatacaityāni coddiśya /

SA20bsa034_u:3904_1: stūpaṃ vā kārayati gahaṃ vā kūṭaṃ vā ekaṃ vā dvau vā sambahulāni vā yāvat koṭi-śatasahasrāṇi

SA20bsa034_u:3912_0: tatra yadbodhisattvastathāgate vā tathāgatacaitye vā pūjāṃ kartukāmo na kevalaṃ svayeva
SA20bsa034_u:3912_3: śreṣṭhabhiḥ sārthavāhairantataḥ strīpuruṣadārakadārikābhiḥ kṛpaṇaiduḥkhitaira ā-caṇḍālairapi kārayati /
SA20bsa034_u:3913: tathā 'cāryopādhyāyaiḥ sārdhavihāryantevāsibhiḥ sabrahmacāribhiśca pravrajitairapyanyatīrthyaistathāgate [vā tathāgata-]caitye vā pūjāṃ kārayati /

SA20bsa034_u:3915_2: tathāgate vā tathāgatacaitye vā kārāṃ kṛtvā sukhitā bhavantviti /
SA20bsa034_u:3916: pare ca tena vastunā tathāgate vā tathāgatacaitye vā pūjāṃ kurvanti na bodhisattvaḥ iyaṃ bodhisattvasya kevalā parakāritā pūjā veditavyā /
SA20bsa034_u:3918: tatra yā kevalā svayaṃkṛtā sā mahāpuṇyaphalā /
SA20bsa034_u:3920: yā punaḥ sādhāraṇā yā mahattamapuṇyaphalā niruttarā veditavyā /
SA20bsa034_u:3921_0: tatra yadbodhisattvaḥ tathāgate vā tathāgatacaitye vā cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārairabhivādanavandanapratyutthānāñjalikarmabhiśca
SA20bsa034_u:3923: iyaṃ bodhisattvasya tathāgate vā tathāgatacaitye vā lābhasatkārapūjā veditavyā /
SA20bsa034_u:3924_0: tatra yadbodhisattvo dīrghakālikīñca tathāgate vā tathāgatacaitye vā etāmeva lābhasatkārapūjāṃ
SA20bsa034_u:3924_2: ghanarasena ca prasādena sammukhībhūtena tīvrayā cādhimuktyā pūjāṃ karoti /
SA20bsa034_u:3927: tatra yadbodhisattvaḥ svahastaṃ tathāgate vā tathāgatacaitye vā kārāṃ karoti na parairavajñayā kārayati pramādakausīdyādvā /
SA20bsa034_u:3930: na buddhābhiprasannānāṃ rājādīnāmudārasattvānāṃ lābhasatkārahetoḥ kuhanārthaṃ pratirūpeṇa ca vastunā pūjayati /
SA20bsa034_u:3933: tāṃ punaretāmudārāmasaṃkliṣṭāṃ lābhasatkārapūjāṃ bodhisattvastathāgate vā tathāgatacaitye vā svabāhubalopārjitairbhogaiḥ karoti parato vā paryeṣitaiḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:3935_0: tatra pariṣkāravaśitāprāpto bodhisattvaḥ dvau vā [Dutt_162] trīnvā saṃbahulān vā

SA20bsa034_u:3946: tāṃ sarvāṃ śrāddho bodhisattvaḥ prasādasahagatenodārādhimuktisahagatena cetasā spharitvābhyanumodate /
SA20bsa034_u:3947: iyamapi bodhisattvasyālpakṛcchreṇa mahatī apramāṇā tathāgatapūjā bodhāya mahāsaṃbhāraparigṛhītā yasyāṃ bodhisattvena satata-samitaṃ kalyāṇacittena hṛṣṭacittena yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:3948: tatra yadbodhisattvaḥ stokastokaṃ muhūrtamuhūrtamantato godohamātramapi sarvasattva prāṇibhūteṣu maitracittaṃ bhāvayati /
SA20bsa034_u:3950: tathā sarvasaṃskāreṣvanityasaṃjñāmanitye duḥkhasaṃjñāṃ duḥkhe 'nātmasaṃjñāṃ nirvāṇe cānuśaṃsasaṃjñāṃ bhāvayati /
SA20bsa034_u:3952: tathā stokastokaṃ muhūrtamuhūrtaṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ prādeśikena mṛdukṣāntikenāpi jñānena nirabhilāpyadharmasvabhāvatathatādhimukto nirvikalpena nirnimittena cetasā viharati /

SA20bsa034_u:3958: yasyāḥ pūjāyāḥ pūrvikā lābhasatkārapūjā sarvākārāpi śatatamīmapi kalāṃ nopaiti sahasratamīmapi kalāṃ nopaiti vistareṇa yāvadupaniṣadamapi nopaiti /

SA20bsa034_u:3962_1: udumbarapuṣpavat sudurlaṃbhā 'dhyāśayatayā ekākinastrisāhasrama sāhasre loka utpādātkevalādhyāśayatayā
SA20bsa034_u:3963: tasyaibhiḥ ṣaḍbhiradhyāśayaiḥ tathāgate tasya vā dharme tasya vā saṃghe pūjā prakalpitā parīttāpyaprameyaphalā bhavanti prāgeva prabhūtā /
SA20bsa034_u:3964: tatra katibhirākāraiḥ samanvāgataṃ bodhisattvasya kalyāṇamitraṃ veditavyam /
SA20bsa034_u:3969: katyākārayā ca saṃjñayā kalyāṇamitrasyāntikādbodhisattvena dharmaḥ śrotavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:3970: katiṣu ca sthāneṣu kalyāṇamitrasyāntikād bodhisattvena dharmaṃ śruṇvatā tasmindharmabhāṇake pudgale 'manasikāraḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:3971: tatrāṣṭābhiraṅgaiḥ samanvāgataṃ bodhisattvasya kalyāṇamitraṃ sarvākāraparipūrṇaṃ veditavyam /
SA20bsa034_u:3974: adhigamayuktaśca bhavati lābhī bhāvanāmayasyānyatamānyatamasya kuśalasya lāmī śamathavipaśyanāyāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:3975: anukampakaśca bhavati kāruṇikaḥ so 'dhyupekṣya svaṃ dṛṣṭadharmaṃsukhavihāraṃ pareṣāmarthāya parayujyate /
SA20bsa034_u:3976: viśārado bhavati na pareṣāmasya dharmaṃ deśayataḥ smṛtiḥ pratibhānaṃ - va śāradyabhayāt pramuṣyate /
SA20bsa034_u:3977: kṣamaśca bhavati parato 'vamānanāvahasanāvaspandana durukta-durāga-tādīnāmaniṣṭānāṃ vacanspathānāṃ vividhānañca sattvavipratipattīnām /
SA20bsa034_u:3978: aparikhinnamānasaśca [Dutt_164] bhavati balavān pratisaṃkhyānabahulaḥ akilāsī catasṛṇāṃ pariṣadāṃ dharmadeśanāyai /
SA20bsa034_u:3980: tatra pañcabhirākāraireva sarvākāraguṇayuktasya bodhisattvasya kalyāṇamitrasyābandhyaṃ kalyāṇamitrakaraṇīyaṃ bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:3981: sa hi pareṣāmādita eva hitasukhaiṣī bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:3984: yena copāyena yadrupayā dharmadeśanayā yaḥ sattvaḥ śakyarūpo bhavati vinetuṃ tatra śakto bhavati pratibalaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:3988: tatra pañcabhirākāraistatkalyāṇamitraṃ prasādapadasthitaṃ bhavati yenainaṃ pare 'tyarthamabhiprasīdantyanuśraveṇāpi śrutvā prāgeva sammukhaṃ nirīkṣya /
SA20bsa034_u:3991: niṣkuhakaśca bhavati na pareṣāṃ kuhanārthamīryāpathaṃ sthairyaṃ vā pratisaṃkhyāya kalpayati /
SA20bsa034_u:3992: anīrṣukaśca bhavati na pareṣāṃ dharmyaṃ kathāṃ lābhasatkāraṃ vā ārabhyāmarṣamutpādayati /
SA20bsa034_u:3993: api tu svayamadhyeṣyamāṇo 'pi dharmakathane paraiḥ labhamāno 'pi vipulaṃ lābhasatkāraṃ paramapadiśati aśaṭhena cetasā prasannena /
SA20bsa034_u:3995: yathā svena lābhasatkāreṇa tuṣṭo bhavati tathā bhṛśataraṃ paralābhena parasatkāreṇa tuṣṭo bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:3997: tatra pañcabhirākārairayaṃ kalyāṇamitrabhūto bodhisattvaḥ pareṣāṃ vineyānāṃ kalyāṇamitrakāryaṃ karoti /
SA20bsa034_u:4004: tadyathā śrāvakabhūmāvavavādānuśāsanañca bhūyastata uttari veditavyaṃ tadyathā balagotrapaṭale /
SA20bsa034_u:4008: niśritasya ca dhārmikeṣvarthasaṃyoga-viyogeṣu vaśavartanatayā avikampanatayā yathābhūtatvāviṣkaraṇatayā /
SA20bsa034_u:4010: tatra kalyāṇamitrasyāntikāddharmaṃ śrotukāmena bodhisattvena pañcākārayā saṃjñayā dharmaḥ śrotavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:4016: tatra bodhisattvena kalyāṇamitrasyāntikāddharmaṃ śruṇvatā tasmindharmabhāṇake pudgale pañcasthāneṣvamanasikāraṃ kṛtvā 'vahitaśrotreṇa prasannamānasena dharmaḥ śrotavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:4027: naivaṃ cittamabhisaṃskartavyaṃ paruṣavākyoyaṃ krodhano na ca madhuraṃ dharmaṃ bhāṣate nāhamataḥ śroṣyāmīti /
SA20bsa034_u:4028: ityevaṃ pañcasu sthāneṣvamanasikāraṃ kṛtvā bodhisattvena sādareṇa saddharmaparigrahaḥ kāryo na jātu dharmaḥ pudgaladoṣeṇa duṣṭo bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:4029: tatra yo 'sau mandaprajño bodhisattvaḥ pudgaladoṣeṣūpahatacitto dharmaṃ necchati śrotuṃ sa ātmana evāhitāya prajñāparihāṇāya pratipanno veditavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:4035_0: yadbodhisattvastriṣu rāśiṣu sarvasattvānavasthāpya sukhitān duḥkhitān aduḥkhitāsukhitān
SA20bsa034_u:4035_1: sattvān sukhakāmānadhikṛtya sukhopasaṃhārādhyāśayagatena maitreṇa cetasā daśadiśaḥ
SA20bsa034_u:4037: yatpunaḥ dharmamātrasaṃjñī dharmamātre sattvopacāramāśayataḥ saṃpaśyaṃstāmeva maitrīṃ bhāvayati /

SA20bsa034_u:4042: tatra bodhisattvo duḥkhitān sattvānārabhya duḥkhāpanayanādhyāśayo daśasu dikṣu karuṇāsahagataṃ cittaṃ bhāvayati /
SA20bsa034_u:4044: sukhitānvā punaḥ sattvānārabhya sukhānumodanādhyāśayo dasaśu dikṣu muditāsahagataṃ cittaṃ bhāvayati /
SA20bsa034_u:4046: sa teṣāmeva trividhānāṃ sattvānāmaduḥkhāsukhitānā duḥkhitānāṃ sukhitānāñca yathākramaṃ mohadveṣarāgakleśavivekādhyāśayo daśasu dikṣūpekṣāsahagataṃ cittaṃ bhāvayati /
SA20bsa034_u:4048: tatra yāni bodhisattvasya maitryādīnyapramāṇāni sattvālambanāni tānyanyatīrthya sādhāraṇāni veditavyāni /
SA20bsa034_u:4049: yāni punardharmālambanāni tāni śrāvakapratyekabuddhasādhāraṇāni na tvanyatīrthyasādhāraṇāni veditavyāni /
SA20bsa034_u:4053: ekama pramāṇaṃ hitādhyāśayasaṃgṛhītaṃ veditavyaṃ yaduta upekṣā /
SA20bsa034_u:4057: tatra daśottaraśatākāraṃ duḥkhaṃ sattvadhātau saṃpaśyanto bodhisattvāḥ sattveṣu karuṇāṃ bhāvayanti /
SA20bsa034_u:4063: sammohavipākañca duḥkhaṃ yaistīvraiḥ śārīrairveditaiḥ spṛṣṭastasminnātmabhāve ahamiti vā mameti vā sammūḍho 'tyarthaṃ śocati /
SA20bsa034_u:4065: trividhaṃ duḥkhaṃ duḥkhaduḥkhatayā saṃskāraduḥkhatayā vipariṇāmaduḥkhatayā ca /
SA20bsa034_u:4078: jātirduḥkhaṃ jarāvyādhirmaraṇamapriyasaṃyogaḥ priyavinābhāvaḥ yadapīcchanparyeṣamāṇo na labhate tadapi duḥkham /
SA20bsa034_u:4088: sarvaduḥkhaṃ mahāduḥkhaṃ sarvatomukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ vipratipattiduḥkhaṃ pravṛttiduḥkhamakāmakāraduḥkhaṃ vighātaduḥkhamānuṣaṅgikaṃ duḥkhaṃ sarvākārañca [Dutt_168] duḥkham /
SA20bsa034_u:4090: tatra mahāduḥkhaṃ yaddīrghaṃkālikaṃ pragāḍhaṃ citraṃ nirantarañca /
SA20bsa034_u:4091: tatra sarvatomukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ yannārakaṃ tairyagyonikaṃ pretalaukikaṃ sugatiparyāpannañca /
SA20bsa034_u:4092: tatra vipratipattiduḥkhaṃ yad dṛṣṭe vā dharme paravyatikramāt parāpakārakaraṇāllabhate samutthāpayati /
SA20bsa034_u:4094: anayena vātmadṛṣṭadharmaduḥkhopakramāt svayaṃ kṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ samutthāpayati /
SA20bsa034_u:4097: tatra pravṛttiduḥkhaṃ yat ṣaḍākārādaniyamādutpadyate saṃsāre saṃsarataḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:4100: mitrāmātyajñātisālohitāniyamāt mātāpitarau bhūtvā yāvadvistareṇa mitrāmātyajñātisālohito bhūtvā 'pareṇa samayena saṃsarato vadhako bhavati pratyarthikaḥ pratyamitraḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:4101: bhogāniyamācca saṃsāre saṃsaran mahābhogo bhūtvā punarapareṇa samayena paramadaridro bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:4110: yacca dukhaṃ durbhikṣopaghātādvā paracakropadhātādvā 'ṭavīdurgapraveśasambādha saṃkaṭopaghātādvā utpadyate /
SA20bsa034_u:4114_0: tatrānuṣaṅgikaṃ duḥkhaṃ yadaṣṭāsu lokadharmeṣu duḥkhaṃ naśana dharmake naṣṭe kṣayadharmake

SA20bsa034_u:4451_0: yo me kaścitparijane vā vijite vā 'mātṛjño bhaviṣyati vistareṇa yāvaddauśīlyaṃ samādāya

SA20bsa034_u:4608_1: jātyādīnāmiti yathābhūtaṃ paśyati tānyetāni catvāryaṣi saṃskṛtalakṣaṇānyabhisamasya

SA20bsa034_u:4981: tasminneva ca bodhisattvapiṭake ya sarvadharmāṇāṃ tattvārthaprakāśanā /
SA20bsa034_u:4982: tasminneva bodhisattvapiṭake yā sarvabuddhabodhisattvānāmacintyā paramodārā prabhāvasaṃprakāśanā /
SA20bsa034_u:4988: evaṃ hi bodhisattvāḥ śikṣamāṇā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhthante /
SA20bsa034_u:4989: ke punaste bodhisattvā ya evaṃ śikṣamāṇā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyante /
SA20bsa034_u:5003: sa eva punaravatīrṇo yāvat śuddhāśayabhūmimapraviṣṭo bhavati tāvadaśuddhāśaya ityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:5005: sa eva punaḥ śuddhāśayo yāvanniṣṭhāgamanabhūmimapraviṣṭo bhavati tāvadaparipakva ityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:5007: sa punaraparipakvo yāvanniyataniyatācaryābhūmau [Dutt_203] vā nānupraviṣṭo bhavati tāvadaniyata ityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:5012: tatra te gotramupādāya yāvadanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherdaśa bodhisattvā nirdiṣṭāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:5013: ye bodhisattvaśikṣāsu śikṣante teṣāṃ nāta uttari śikṣā vidyate /
SA20bsa034_u:5014: yatra śikṣeran yathā ca śikṣeran na ca ebhyo yathā nirdiṣṭebhyo bodhisattvebhya uttari bodhisattvo vidyate yo bodhisattvaśikṣāsu śikṣate /
SA20bsa034_u:5015: teṣāṃ punaḥ sarveṣāṃ eva bodhisattvānāmabhedenimānyevaṃ bhāgīyāni gauṇāni nāmāni veditavyāni /
SA20bsa034_u:5016: tadyathā bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ dhīmānuttamadyutiḥ jinaputro jinādhāraḥ vijetā jināṅkuraḥ vikrāntaḥ paramāryaḥ sārthavāho mahāyaśaḥ kṛpālurmahāpuṇyaḥ īśvaro dhārmikaśceti /
SA20bsa034_u:5017: teṣāṃ punardaśasu dikṣvanantāparyanteṣu lokadhātuṣvanantānāṃ bodhisattvānāmaprameyāḥ prayātmagatāḥ saṃjñāprāptayo veditavyāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:5018: tatra ye bodhisattvāḥ sma iti pratijñāyāṃ bodhisattvā vartante na ca bodhisattvaśikṣāsu samyak pratipadyante te bodhisattvapratirūpakā veditavyāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:5020: bodhisattvāḥ sma iti pratijñāyāṃ vartante samyak [ca ye] bodhisattvaśikṣāṣu śikṣante te bhūtā bodhisattvā veditavyāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:5028: pañcemāni bhūtasya bodhisattvasya bodhisattvaliṅgāni yaiḥ samanvāgato [bodhisattvo] bodhisattva iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati /
SA20bsa034_u:5030: anukampā priyavāditā vairyaṃ muktahastatā gambhīrārthasandhinirmocanatā ca /
SA20bsa034_u:5031: ime punaḥ pañca dharmāḥ pañca parivartena veditavyāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:5036: pratipattigataśca svabhāvato 'nukampāyāḥ yadāśayo bhavati bodhisattvaḥ sattveṣu tadeva yathāśaktyā yathābalaṃ kāyena vācā upasaṃharati /
SA20bsa034_u:5037: tatra priyavāditāyāḥ svabhāvaḥ pūrvavadāmodanī saṃmodanī upakarā ca vāgveditavyā /
SA20bsa034_u:5039: tatra sattvaṃ dhṛtiralīnatvaṃ ca yadbalaṃ bodhisattvasya ayaṃ vairyaṃsvabhāva ityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:5042: catasraḥ pratisaṃvidastāsāmeva cābhinirhārāya yatsamyak prāyogikaṃ jñānamayaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ gambhīrārthasandhinirmocanatāyāḥ svabhāvo veditavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:5045: duḥkhitāḥ sattvā duścaritacāriṇaḥ pramattā mithyāpratipannāḥ kleśānuśayitāśca /
SA20bsa034_u:5046: nārakānsattvānupādāya śeṣāṃ keṣāṃcitsattvānāṃ duḥkhā vedanā prābandhikī santatisamārūḍhā vartate /
SA20bsa034_u:5048: ye punarnāvaśyaṃ duḥkhitāapi tu bahulaṃ kāyaduścaritamadhyācaranti vāgduścaritaṃ manoduścaritamadhyācaranti /
SA20bsa034_u:5051: ye punarnāvaśyaṃ duḥkhitā na duścaritacāriṇo 'pi tvadhyavasitāḥ kāmānupabhuñjate naṭanartakahāsakalāsakaprekṣaṇaparā viharanti ātmopalāḍanaparāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:5052: ime sattvāḥ pramattā ityucyante tadyathā tadekatyāḥ kāmopabhoginaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:5053: ye punarnāvaśyaṃ duḥkhitā na duścaritacāriṇo na vāpi pramattāḥ api tu dṛṣṭivipattimāśritya duḥkhavimokṣāya pratipannāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:5054: ime sattvā mithyāpratipannā ityucyante tadyathā kāmānutsṛjya durākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajitāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:5055_0: ye punaḥ sattvā nāvaśyaṃ duḥkhitā vistareṇa yāvan na mithyāpratipannāḥ api tu sakalabandhanāśca
SA20bsa034_u:5055_1: vikalabandhanāśca kleśaiḥ ime sattvāḥ kleśānuśayitā ityucyante tadyathā ye ca samyak
SA20bsa034_u:5055_2: prayuktāḥ pṛthagjanā kalyāṇakā ye ca śaikṣāḥ etāvadanukampādhiṣṭhānaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ
SA20bsa034_u:5066: yaireva pañcabhirākārairbodhipakṣapaṭale dhṛtibalādhānatā bodhisattvānāmuktā tānyeva bodhisattvasya vairyādhiṣṭhānāni ve ditavyāni /
SA20bsa034_u:5072: abhīkṣṇadānatā pramuditadānatā satkṛtyadānatā asaṃkliṣṭadānatā aniśrityadānatā ca /
SA20bsa034_u:5079: ye te tathāgatabhāṣitāḥ sūtrāntāḥ gambhīrāgambhīrāvabhāṣāḥ śūnyatā-pratisaṃyuktā idaṃpratyayatā /
SA20bsa034_u:5092: anukampā bodhisattvasya sattveṣvādita eva tāvadvairaprahāṇāya saṃvartate /
SA20bsa034_u:5095: anukampā tad-bahulavihāritā cāsyānavadyadṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārāya parānugrahāya ca saṃvartate /
SA20bsa034_u:5096: ye ca bhagavatā maitryā anuśaṃsā uktānāsya kāye viṣaṃ krāmati na śasramityevamādayaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:5099: priyavādī bodhisattvo dṛṣṭe dharme caturvidhaṃ vāgdoṣaṃ vijahāti mṛṣāvādaṃ paiśūnyaṃ ṣāruṣyaṃ sambhinnapralāpañca /
SA20bsa034_u:5100: sā cāsya bāgātmānugrahāya parānugrahāya ca pravṛttā bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:5101: dṛṣṭa eva ca dharme āyatyāṃ ca priyavādī bodhisattvaḥ ādeyavacano bhavati grāhyavacanaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:5103: dhīro bodhisattvo dṛṣṭe [tāvata] dharme sarveṇa sarvamālasyakausīdyāpagato bhavati pramuditacittaśca /
SA20bsa034_u:5107: āyatyāṃ ca sarvabodhisattvakṛtyasamārambheṣu prakṛtyā dṛḍhasamāraṃbho bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:5114: pūrvaṃ tāvadbodhisattvo 'nukampayā sattvānanugṛhṇāti teṣu ca sāpekṣo bhavatyarthakāmaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:5115: tataścākuśalātsthānādvyutthāpya kuśale sthāne pratiṣṭhāpanāya yuktiṃ bhāṣate grāhayati vyapadiśati /
SA20bsa034_u:5116: evamavatīrṇeṣu ca sattveṣu sattvavipratipattiṣu [ca] kleśaviprakṛtāsvarthavidhāsu vimardasaho bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:5118: sa evaṃ dhīraḥ ekatyānsattvānāmiṣasaṃgraheṇa paripācayati ekatyāndharmasaṃgraheṇa tadekatyāṃstadubhābhyāṃ dharmābhiṣasaṃgrahābhyām /
SA20bsa034_u:5121: āsāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ pāramitānāṃ katamayā pāramitayā katamadbodhisattvaliṅgaṃ saṃgṛhītam /
SA20bsa034_u:5124: vairyaṃ vīryapāramitayā kṣāntipāramitayā prajñāpāramitayā ca saṃgṛhītam /
SA20bsa034_u:5126: gambhīrārthasandhinirmocanatā dhyānapāramitayā prajñāpāramitayā ca saṃgṛhītā evamimāni [pañca bodhi]sattvaliṅgāni pañcaparivartena veditavyāni /
SA20bsa034_u:5132: sukṛtakarmāntatā kauśalyaṃ parānugrahaḥ pariṇāmanaṃ ca paścimam /
SA20bsa034_u:5133: gṛhipakṣe vā pravrajitapakṣe vā vartamānasya bodhisattvasya samāsataścatvāro dharmā veditavyāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:5134: yeṣu gṛhī pravrajito va bodhisattvaḥ śikṣamāṇaḥ kṣipramevānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyante /
SA20bsa034_u:5138: yā pāramitāsu niyatakāritā nipuṇakāritā nityakāritā anavadyakāritā ca /
SA20bsa034_u:5139: kathañca bodhisattvo niyatakārī bhavati yaduta dāne /
SA20bsa034_u:5140: iha bodhisattvaḥ saṃvidyamāne deyadharme yācanake samyak prapyupasthite apakāriṇyupakāriṇi vā guṇavati doṣavati vā 'vaśyaṃ dadāti /
SA20bsa034_u:5141: nāsya dānacittaṃ kaścidvikampayituṃ samartho bhavati manuṣyo vā 'manuṣyo vā śramaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā kaścidvā punarloke sahadharmeṇa /
SA20bsa034_u:5142: kathaṃ ca bodhisattvo nipuṇakārī bhavati yadut dāne /
SA20bsa034_u:5143: iha bodhisattvaḥ saṃvidyamāne deyadharme samyak pratyupasthite yācanake sarvaṃ dadāti /
SA20bsa034_u:5144: nāstyasya kiñcidyadaparityājyaṃ bhavati sattvebhyaḥ ādhyātmikamapi vastu prāgeva bāhyam /
SA20bsa034_u:5145: kathaṃ ca bodhisattvo nityakārī bhavati yaduta dāne /
SA20bsa034_u:5146: iha bodhisattvo aparikhidyamāno dānena satatasamitameva sarvakālaṃ yathotpannaṃ dānaṃ dadāti /
SA20bsa034_u:5147: kathaṃ ca bodhisattvaḥ anavadyakārī bhavati yaduta dāne /
SA20bsa034_u:5148: iha bodhisattvo yattatsaṃkliṣṭaṃ dānaṃ varṇitaṃ dānapaṭale tatsaṃkliṣṭaṃ varjayitvā asaṃkliṣṭaṃ dānaṃ dadāti /
SA20bsa034_u:5149: evaṃ hi bodhisattvaḥ sukṛtakārī bhavati yaduta dāne /
SA20bsa034_u:5150: yathā dāne evaṃ śīlakṣāntivīryadhyānaprajñāpāramitāsu [Dutt_212] yathāyogaṃ veditavyam /
SA20bsa034_u:5151: eta eva catvāra ākārā niyatakāritā nipuṇakāritā nityakāritā anavadyakāritā ca /
SA20bsa034_u:5153: tatsamāsato daśavidhaṃ veditavyam pratihatānāṃ sattvānāṃ pratighātāpanayāyopāyakauśalyam /
SA20bsa034_u:5158: eṣāṃ sarveṣāmeva kauśalyānāṃ pūrvavadyathāyogaṃ tatra tatrāsyāmeva bodhisattvabhūmau pravibhāgo veditavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:5159: etāni punarbodhisattvasya daśa kauśalyāni pañcakṛtyāni kurvanti /
SA20bsa034_u:5166: tribhinnaṃ kauśalyairbodhisattvo yathā gotrendriyādhimuktānāṃ tadupamaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati /
SA20bsa034_u:5172: iha bodhisattvaścatvāri saṃgrahavastūni niśritya dānaṃ priyavāditāmarthacaryāṃ samānārthatāñca tadekatyānāṃ sattvānāṃ hitamapyupasaṃharati /
SA20bsa034_u:5180: na tasya kuśalamūlasyānyaṃ phalavipākaṃ pratikāṃkṣati nānya[trā]nuttarāmeva samyaksaṃbodhim /
SA20bsa034_u:5181_0: ye ca kecidbhagavatā gṛhiṇāṃ vā pravrajitānāṃ vā bodhisattvānāṃ śikṣādharmā vyapadiṣṭāḥ
SA20bsa034_u:5181_1: sarveṣāṃ teṣāmeṣveva caturṣu saṃgraho veditavyaḥ sukṛtakarmāntatāyāṃ kauśalye parānugrahe pariṇāmanāyāṃ ca /
SA20bsa034_u:5182: tasmādevaṃ sukṛtakarmāntasya bodhisattvasya kuśalasya parānugrahapravṛttasya pariṇāmakasya evaṃ duṣprāpā duradhigamā ca bodhirāsannā samāsannā veditavyā /
SA20bsa034_u:5183_0: atītānāgatapratyutpanneṣvadhvasu ye kecidbodhisattvā gṛhi-pravrajita pakṣeṣu śikṣamāṇā
SA20bsa034_u:5185: evamapi caturṣu dharmeṣu samyakprayukto gṛhī pravrajito vā bodhisattvo bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:5186: api tu gṛhiṇo bodhisattvasyāntikātpravrajitasya bodhisattvasya sumahān viśeṣaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:5188: tathāhi pravrajito bodhisattvaḥ parimukto bhavatyādita eva tāvanmātāpitṛputtadārādikalatraparigrahadoṣāt /
SA20bsa034_u:5190: punaḥ pravrajito bodhisattvaḥ parimukto bhavati tasyaiva parigrahasyārthe kṛṣivaṇijyā-rājapauruṣyādi-parikleśe vyāsaṅgaduḥkhebhyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:5192: punaḥ pravrajito bodhisattva ekāntasaṅkalīkṛtaṃ brahmacaryaṃ śaknoti carituṃ [na tu] gṛhī bodhisattvaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:5193: punaḥ pravrajito bodhisattvaḥ sarveṣu bodhipakṣyeṣu dharmeṣu kṣiprābhijño bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:5194: yadyadeva kuśalamārabhate tatra tatraiva laghuladhveva niṣṭhāṃ gacchati /
SA20bsa034_u:5196: punaḥ pravrajito bodhisattvaḥ pareṣāṃ vrataniyame sthitatvād ādeyavacano bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:5205: saptākāraṃ bodhisattvānāṃ sattveṣu vātsalyaṃ pravartate yena vātsalyenopetā bodhisattvāḥ kalyāṇāśayāḥ paramakalyāṇāśayā ityucyante /
SA20bsa034_u:5209: ānulomikena kāyavāṅmanaskarmaṇā samudācarati manāpena hitasukhena ca /
SA20bsa034_u:5210: na ca punarbodhisattvasya sattveṣu yogarahitaṃ vātsalyaṃ pravartate tadyathā adharme 'vinaye 'satyasamudācāre asthāne samādāpanatāyai /
SA20bsa034_u:5211: tathā ca bodhisattvo vatsalo bhavati sattveṣu yathā teṣāmarthe sarvārambhairna parikhidyate /
SA20bsa034_u:5212: ayācita eva ca bodhisattvaḥ sattveṣu vatsalo bhavati na tu kenacidyācitaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:5213: nirāmiṣeṇa ca cittena vatsalo [bhavati] na parataḥ pratyupakāraṃ pratikāṃkṣamāṇaḥ paratra ca vipākamiṣṭaṃ pratyāśaṃsamāna iti niṣkāraṇavatsalo bhavati sattveṣu bodhisattvaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:5214: vipulañca tadbodhisattvasya vātsalyaṃ bhavati sattveṣu na parīttam /
SA20bsa034_u:5215: tathā ca vipulaṃ bhavati yathaiṣāṃ sattvānāmantikādbodhisattvaḥ sarvākāramapyapakāraṃ labhamāno notsṛjati ātmānaṃ kāmamapriyaṃ karoti /
SA20bsa034_u:5217: tatpunarevaṃ lakṣaṇameva guṇayuktaṃ vātsalyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ sarvasattveṣveva samamāsamanta sattvadhātuprādeśikaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:5218: evamanena saptākāreṇaiva vātsalyena yuktā bodhisattvāḥ kalyāṇāśayāḥ paramakalyāṇāśayā ityucyante /
SA20bsa034_u:5220: tatra śraddhāpūrvaṃko dharmavicayapūrvakaśca buddhadharmeṣu yo 'dhimokṣaḥ pratyavagamo niścayo bodhisattvasya so 'dhyāśaya ityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:5221: te punaradhyāśayā bodhisattvasya samāsataḥ pañcadaśa veditavyāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:5223_0: agryāśayo vṛttāśayaḥ pāramitāśayaḥ tattvārthāśayaḥ prabhāvāśayaḥ hitāśayaḥ sukhāśayo
SA20bsa034_u:5223_1: vinirmuktāśayaḥ dṛḍhāśayaḥ avisaṃvādanāśayaḥ aśuddhāśayaḥ śuddhāśayaḥ suśuddhāśayaḥ
SA20bsa034_u:5224: tatra yo buddhadharmasaṃgharatneṣu bodhisattvasyādhyāśayaḥ so 'gryāśaya ityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:5227: dharmapugdalanairātmye paramārthe ca dharmatathatāyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ yo 'dhyāśayo 'yaṃ tattvārthāśaya ityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:5228: buddhabodhisattvānāmacintye 'bhijñāprabhāve sahaje vā prabhāve yo 'dhyāśayo 'yaṃ prabhāvāśaya ityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:5231: sattveṣveva nirāmiṣacittatā iṣṭe ca vipāke niṣpratibaddhacittatā vinirmuktāśaya ityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:5232: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau yā citaikāntikatāyaṃ dṛḍhāśaya ityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:5237: tatra yo hi [a]śuddhāśayaḥ sa eva nigṛhī[tāśaya] ityucyate pratisaṃkhyānakaraṇīyatayā /
SA20bsa034_u:5238: yaḥ punaḥ śuddhaḥ suśuddhaścādhyāśayaḥ sa sahajo 'dhyāśaya ityucyate prakṛtyā tanmayatayā āśrayasusaṃniviṣṭatayā ca /
SA20bsa034_u:5239: ityebhirbodhisattvāḥ pañcadaśabhiḥ kalyāṇairadhyāśayaiḥ sarvabhūmigataiḥ samāsato daśakṛtyāni kurvanti /
SA20bsa034_u:5244: pāramitāśayena kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ bhāvanāsātatyakriyayā 'pramādavihāriṇo bhavanti paramāpramādavihāriṇaśca /
SA20bsa034_u:5247: prabhāvādhyāśayena ghanarasaṃ ca śāsane prasādaṃ pravedayanti /
SA20bsa034_u:5248: bhāvanāyāṃ ca sārasaṃjñinaḥ spṛhājātā bahulaṃ viharanti /
SA20bsa034_u:5250: hitāśayena sukhāśayena vinirmuktāśayena ca sarvākarāsu sattvārthakriyāsu prayujyante /
SA20bsa034_u:5255: avisaṃvādanādhyāśayena kṣiprābhijñā bhavanti teṣu teṣu kuśaladharmābhinirhāreṣu /
SA20bsa034_u:5258: sahajena punaradhyāśayena kṣipramanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyante arthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanuṣyāṇām /
SA20bsa034_u:5259: tatra ye kecidbhagavatā bodhisattvānāmadhyāśayā ākhyātāḥ prajñaptāḥ prakāśitāsteṣu teṣvadhikaraṇeṣu teṣāṃ sarveṣāmebhireva pañcadaśabhiradhyāśayaiḥ saṃgraho veditavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:5271_0: evaṃ gotrasaṃpadamupādāya yathoktāyāṃ bodhisattvaśikṣāyāṃ śikṣamāṇānāṃ yathokteṣu
SA20bsa034_u:5271_1: ca bodhisattvaliṅgeṣu saṃdṛśyamānānāṃ bodhisattvapakṣyaprayogeṣu ca samyak prayuktānāṃ
SA20bsa034_u:5271_2: bodhisattvādhyāśayāñca yathoktāṃ viśodhayatāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ samāsato dvādaśabodhisattvavihārā bhavanti /
SA20bsa034_u:5273: trayodaśaśca tathāgato vihāro yo 'sya bhavatyabhisaṃbodherniruttaro vihāraḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:5284: iti yena [ca] bodhisattvastattvaṃ paśyati yañca tattvaṃ paśyati tasya ca tattvasyājñānād yathā pravṛttirduḥkhasya jñānācca punarapravṛttirduḥkhasya bhavati sattvānām /
SA20bsa034_u:5285: tadetadbodhisattvasya tribhirmukhaiḥ prajñayā vyavacārayataḥ trayoradhiprajñavihārā bhavanti /

SA20bsa034_u:5911: śrāvakavihāre sādharmyeṇa caiṣāṃ dvādaśānāṃ bodhisattvavihārāṇāmanukramo veditavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:5914: yathā tasya nyāmāvakrāntivihāraḥ tathāsya tṛtīyo vihāraḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:5915: yathā tasyāvetyaprasādalābhinaḥ āryakāntādhiśīlavihāra uttari āsravakṣayāya tathāsya caturtho vihāraḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:5916: yathā tasyādhiśīlaṃ niśrityādhicittaśikṣānirhāravihāraḥ tathāsya pañcamo vihāraḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:5917: yathā tasya yathā pratilabdhasatyajñānādhipraśikṣāvihāraḥ tathāsya ṣaṣṭha saptamāṣṭamā vihārā veditavyā /
SA20bsa034_u:5918: yathā tasya suvicārita jñeyasyānimittasamādhiprayogavihāraḥ tathāsyanavamo vihāraḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:5919: yathā tasya pariniṣpanno nirnimitto vihāraḥ tathāsya daśamo vihāraḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:5920: yathā tasya vyutthitasya vimuktyāyatanavihāraḥ tathāsyaikādaśo vihāraḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:5921: yathā tasya sarvākāro 'rhatvavihāraḥ tathāsya dvādaśo vihāro veditavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:5927: samāsato bodhisattvānāṃ pañcavidhā upapattiḥ sarvatraṃ sarvavihāreṣu ca sarveṣāñca bodhisattvānāmanavadyā parvasattvahitasukhāya /
SA20bsa034_u:5930: iha bodhisattvo durbhikṣeṣu kṛcchreṣu mahākāntāreṣu kāleṣu praṇidhāya sattvānāmalpakṛcchreṇa yātrānimittaṃ mahāmatsyādiyoniṣūpapadyate /
SA20bsa034_u:5932: vyādhibahuleṣu ca sattveṣu praṇidhāya siddhavidyādhara-mahāvaidyātmabhāvaṃ parigṛhṇāti teṣāṃ vyādhīnāṃ praśamāya /
SA20bsa034_u:5933_0: bhṛśa-paracakropadraveṣu ca sattveṣu balavān bhūmipatirbhavati dharmeṇa śamenopāyakauśalyena
SA20bsa034_u:5934: daṇḍabandhanacitrapīḍāpravṛtteṣu ca prajānāṃ rājasu teṣāmeva sattvopadravāṇāṃ prahāṇāya tadrūpeṣu rājakuleṣūpapadyate /
SA20bsa034_u:5936: ye ca sattvā mithyādṛṣṭayaśca pāpakāriṇaśca kasmiṃściddevāyatane 'dhimuktāḥ teṣāmanukampayā mithyādṛṣṭiduściritaprahāṇāya tasmindevāyatane upapadyate /
SA20bsa034_u:5937: praṇidhānavaśitābalābhyāñca iyamupapattiranukampā-pūrvikā aprameyā veditavyā vistaranirdeśatastāsu tāsu vicitrāsu yoniṣu tiryagyonyupapanneṣu sattveṣu samāsa-nirdeśastvayamāśayaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:5939_0: iha bodhisattvaḥ praṇidhāya vā vaśitāprāptito vā vicitreṣu tiryagyonyupapanneṣu sattveṣu
SA20bsa034_u:5939_1: devanāgayakṣāsurādiṣu cānyonyadrugdha viruddheṣu tathā mithyādṛṣṭikeṣu brāhmaṇeṣu
SA20bsa034_u:5939_2: tathā duścaritacāriṣu tat [Dutt_248] ājīveṣu tadabhirateṣu tathākāmeṣvatyarthādhyavasiteṣu
SA20bsa034_u:5939_3: kāmādhimukteṣu [sattveṣu] teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ sabhā[gatā]yāmupapadyate prāmukhyena tasya
SA20bsa034_u:5940: sa pramukho bhūtvā yatte sattvāḥ samudācaranti tadasā na samudācaranti /
SA20bsa034_u:5941: yatte na samudācaranti kuśalaṃ tadasau samudācarati /
SA20bsa034_u:5943: te tayā [ca] dharmadeśanayā [tayā] ca visabhāgasamudācāratayā tebhyo doṣebhyastenopāyakauśalyena vinivartante /
SA20bsa034_u:5947: tena ca vipākena yathoktaṃ svaparārthapaṭale karma karoti /
SA20bsa034_u:5950: yā bodhisattvasya prathamaṃ pramuditavihāramupādāya yāvaddaśamādvihārādupapattirvarṇitā sā 'syādhipattyopapattirityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:5951: jambūdvīpeśvaratvamupādāya yāvanmaheśvaratvādakaniṣṭhānatikramya sarvopapattyāyatanapraviṣṭaṃ yatra paramavihāraprāptā eva bodhisattvā upapadyante /
SA20bsa034_u:5954: yasyāmupapattau paripūrṇabodhisambhārī bodhisattvaḥ purohitakule vā rājakule vā upapadyānuttarāñca samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate /
SA20bsa034_u:5957: ye kecid bodhisattvā atītānāgatapratyutpanneṣvadhvasu śubhāsu bhadrāsu kalyāṇāsu upapattiṣūpapannā upapatsyante upapadyante ca sarve te āsveva pañcasu /
SA20bsa034_u:5958: nāta uttari nāto bhūyaḥ sthāpayitvā bālabhūmyupapattīḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:5959: tathā hi vijñairbodhisattvaiḥ upapattaya etāḥ pañcābhipretāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:5965: tatra sarvāsu vihāragatāsu bodhisattvacaryāsu bodhisattvānāṃ samāsataḥ ṣaḍvidhaḥ samyaktvaparigraho veditavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:5972: prathama eva cittotpāde bodhisattvena sarvaḥ sattvadhātuḥ kalatrabhāvena parigṛhītaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:5973: eṣāṃ mayā yathāśakti yathābalaṃ sarvākārahitasukhopasaṃhāraḥ karaṇīya iti /
SA20bsa034_u:5977: sa ca tasminparigrahe parigrahānurūpayā kriyayā bodhisattvānurūpayā pravartate /
SA20bsa034_u:5988: kālena ca kālaṃ vaiśeṣikeṇa lābhena priyavāditayā copavatsayati na caiṣu dāsadāsīsaṃjñāṃ karoti /
SA20bsa034_u:5990: rājyajane punā rājabhūto bodhisattvaḥ adaṇḍenāśastreṇa rājyaṃ kārayati /
SA20bsa034_u:6001: sa dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ samyak pariṣadaṃ parigṛhṇāti /
SA20bsa034_u:6005: sarvasmiṃśca parigrahe samacitto bhavati na pakṣapatitaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:6006: na ca teṣāmantike dharmamātsaryaṃ karoti na cācāryamuṣṭim /
SA20bsa034_u:6008: kuśalakāmatayā tu svayaṃ kurvatāṃ na nivārayati teṣāmeva-puṇyasambhāropacayanimittam kālaṃ ca prāpya svayamevateṣāmupasthānaparicaryākartā bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:6013: gambhīraṃ cārthapadaṃ prajñayā pratividhya kālena kālaṃ saṃprakāśayati /
SA20bsa034_u:6015: ātmanaścāntikāt teṣāmarthe āmiṣahetoradhikena vyāpāreṇa samanvāgato bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:6018: vyādhitāṃścaitāṃ vimanaskaṃ vā sarvathā nābhyupekṣate vyādhipraśamāya daurmanasyāpagamāya /
SA20bsa034_u:6020: kālena ca kālaṃ teṣāṃ khedamanupraviśya yuktarūpaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati /
SA20bsa034_u:6023: taiśca saha tulyavṛttasamācāro bhavatyadhiko vā [na] nyūnaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:6033: na ca bodhisattvaḥ sarvaṃ kālaṃ pariṣadupādānaṃ karoti /
SA20bsa034_u:6036: tatra ye mṛduke paripāke vyavasthitāḥ sattvāste bodhisattvasya dīrghakālikamupādānamityucyante cireṇa kālena viśuiddhibhavyatayā /
SA20bsa034_u:6038: ye punarmadhye paripāke vyavasthitāste 'dīrghakālikamupādānamityucyante na cireṇa viśuddhibhavyatayā /
SA20bsa034_u:6039: ye punaḥ sattvā adhimātre paripāke vyavasthitāste bodhisattvasya caramamupādānamityucyante tasminneva janmani viśuddhibhavyatayā /
SA20bsa034_u:6041: yena parigraheṇātītānāgatapratyutpannā bodhisattvāḥ sattvān parigṛhītavantaḥ parigrahīṣyanti parigṛhṇanti vā /
SA20bsa034_u:6045_0: vyatikramavyavasthiteṣu sattveṣu yudi vā bādhanaṃ yadi vā 'dhyupekṣaṇā bodhisattvasya
SA20bsa034_u:6045_1: saṃbādhasaṃkaṭaprāptiḥ kaṭukena ca prayogeṇa sattve samudācāraḥ svasya cāśayasya
SA20bsa034_u:6046: alpake ca deyadharme saṃvidyamāne bahūnāṃ yācakānāṃ sammukhībhāvo yācanāya saṃbādhasaṃkaṭaprāptiḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:6047: ekātmakasya cāsya bahūnāṃ sattvānāṃ kṛtyeṣu vicitreṣūtpanneṣu sahāyībhāvayācanā saṃbādhasaṃkaṭaprāptiḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:6050: mūḍhaśaṭhakhaṭhuṃkeṣu sattveṣu dharmasya deśanā vādhyupekṣaṇā vā saṃbādhasaṃkaṭaprāptiḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:6051: saṃsāre ca nityakālaṃ doṣadarśanaṃ saṃsārāparityāgaśca saṃbādhasaṃkaṭaprāptiḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:6053_0: aviśuddhe cādhyāṣaye parairagrasya parama-priyasya vastuno yācanā saṃbādhasaṃkaṭaprāptiḥ
SA20bsa034_u:6053_1: nānādhibhinnamatānāṃ nānādhimuktikānāṃ sattvānāṃ saṃjñaptikā adhyupekṣaṇā vā saṃbādhasaṃkaṭaprāptiḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:6054: ātyantikaścāpramādaḥ karaṇīyaḥ kleśāśca sarveṇa sarvaṃ na prahātavya iti saṃbādhasaṃkaṭaprāptiḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:6055: evaṃ saṃbādhasaṃkaṭaprāptena bodhisattve kvacidgurulāghavaṃ lakṣayitvā tathaiva prayoktavyam kvacitpudgalapravicayaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:6063: evaṃ samyak pratipakṣakuśalo bodhisattvaḥ sarvasaṃbādhasaṃkaṭaprāptisammukhībhāve 'pi na viṣīdati samyakcātmānaṃ pariharati /
SA20bsa034_u:6064: iti bodhisattvabhūmāvādhāre niṣṭhe yogasthāne parigrahapaṭalaṃ dvitīyam /
SA20bsa034_u:6067: eṣu yathāvarṇiteṣu trayodaśasu vihāreṣvanugatāḥ sapta bhūmayo veditavyāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:6084: tāthāgatasya punarvihārasya bhūmeśca paścānnirdeśo bhaviṣyati buddhadharmapratiṣṭhā paṭale /
SA20bsa034_u:6085: tatra bodhisattvaḥ adhimukticaryābhūmeḥ śuddhādhyāśayabhūmimanupraviśan katham apāyānsamatikrāmati /
SA20bsa034_u:6086_0: iha bodhisattvo laukikaṃ pariśuddhaṃ dhyānaṃ niśrityādhimukticaryābhūmau susambhṛtabodhi
SA20bsa034_u:6087: sa bhāvanānvayāt tadrūpaṃ sattveṣvanukampāśayaṃ karuṇāśayaṃ pratilabhate /
SA20bsa034_u:6089: yadi me eṣveva sannivasato 'nuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ samudāgacchati tathāpyahamutsahāmīti sattvānāṃ duḥkhāpanayanahetoḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:6092: tasya tathā paribhāvitaṃ tallaukikaṃ pariśuddhaṃ dhyānam /
SA20bsa034_u:6094: acireṇa tasya prahāṇādāśrayo 'sya bodhisattvasya parivartate pāpakasyāpāyikasya karmaṇo 'tyantamakaraṇatāyai apāyāgamanatāyai [Dutt_254] ca /
SA20bsa034_u:6098: ye ca te daśadharmā vihārapaṭale nirdiṣṭā /
SA20bsa034_u:6099: śraddhādayo vihārapariśodhanāḥ ta ihāpi bhūmiviśodhanā veditavyāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:6103: eṣāṃ daśānāṃ bhūmiviśodhanānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ vipakṣabhūtā dharmāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:6106: sarveṇa sarvamanārambhacittotpādanā bodhisattvaśikṣāpadāsamādānam ayaṃ śraddhāvipakṣo dharmaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:6124: śāstari kāṃkṣā vimatirvicikitsā tathāgatapūjopa sthānatāyāḥ vipakṣaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:6136: śāstrajñaśca yathā loke [Dutt_255] pravartitavyamanena tathā jānāti /
SA20bsa034_u:6140: dhṛtibalādhānaprāptaśca samyak prayogādaparihīyamānaḥ kuśalaiśca dharmairvivardhamānaḥ pratipattipūjayā lābhasatkārapūjayā ca tathāgatapūjopasthānaṃ karoti /
SA20bsa034_u:6143: iti bodhisattvabhūmāvādhāre niṣṭhe yogasthāne tṛtīyaṃ bhūmipaṭalam /
SA20bsa034_u:6146: adhimukticaryābhūmimupādāya sarvāsu bodhisattvabhūmiṣu bodhisattvānāṃ samāsataścatasraścaryā veditavyāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:6150: upāyakauśalyapāramitā ca praṇidhānapāramitā ca balapāramitā ca jñānapāramitā ca /
SA20bsa034_u:6168_1: paramabodhiphalaparigrahāccaite daśa [Dutt_257] dānādayo dharmāḥ parameṇa kālena
SA20bsa034_u:6168_2: samudāgatāḥ paramayā svabhāvaviśuddhyā viśuddhāḥ paramañca phalamanuprayacchanti /
SA20bsa034_u:6173: tatra mātsaryaṃ duścaritaṃ sattveṣu vairotpīḍanatā kausīdyaṃ vikṣepo mandamomuhatā ca /
SA20bsa034_u:6175: eṣāṃ [ṣaṇṇāṃ] dharmāṇāṃ pratipakṣeṇa ṣaṭ pāramitā yathāyogaṃ veditavyāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:6179: ihādita eva bhoganirapekṣo bodhisattvaḥ tyaktvā āgārikān kāmān śīlasamādānaṃ karoti /
SA20bsa034_u:6182: samādānataśca kṣāntitaśca viśuddhiśīlo niścalena nirantareṇa kuśalapakṣaprayogeṇa prayujyate /
SA20bsa034_u:6184: sa tathā samāhitacitto yathābhūtaṃ jñeyaṃ jānāti dṛśyaṃ paśyati /
SA20bsa034_u:6187: iha bodhisattvasya dṛṣṭe dharme etān dānādīn kuśalāndharmān samādāya vartamānasya tannidānamāyatyāṃ bāhyataśca bhogasampatpratilambho bhavati dānakṛtaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:6192: sahajā cakuśalamūlaprayoge akhedatā paravyatikramasahiṣṇutā ca paropatāpapriyatā /
SA20bsa034_u:6196: sahajā ca mandarajaskasya svacittavaśitā cittakarmaṇyatā sarvārtheṣu kṣiprābhijñatāyai /
SA20bsa034_u:6198: sahajañca mativaipulyaṃ pāṇḍityaṃ [Dutt_258] vicakṣaṇatā ca sarvārtheṣu /
SA20bsa034_u:6199: iyaṃ pañcamī sampat itīdaṃ phalavipākakṛtamanyadanukramavyavasthānaṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ pāramitānāṃ veditavyam /
SA20bsa034_u:6200: tatra catasṛbhiḥ pāramitābhiḥ [saha]sambhāreṇa svabhāvena parivāreṇa rakṣayā ca paripūrṇā bodhisattvānāmadhiśīlaṃ śikṣā veditavyā /
SA20bsa034_u:6211: etāni ca catvāri kṛtyāni bodhisattvāḥ ābhiścatasṛbhiścaryābhiryathākramaṃ kurvantyanutiṣṭhanti /
SA20bsa034_u:6213: iti bodhisattvabhūmāvādhāre niṣṭhe yogasthāne caturthaṃ caryāpaṭalam /
SA20bsa034_u:6216: tatra tathāgatavihāramārabhya tāthāgatīñca niṣṭhāgamanabhūmiṃ bhagavatāṃ catvāriṃśaduttaramāveṇikaṃ buddhadharmaśataṃ bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:6217_1: daśa tathāgatabalāni catvāri vaiśāradyāni trīṇi smṛtyupasthānāni trīṇyarakṣāṇi mahāṃkaruṇā
SA20bsa034_u:6221: adhasthātpādatalayoścakre jāte sahasrāre sanābhike sanemike sarvākāraparipūrṇe /
SA20bsa034_u:6234: ekaikamasya romakūpe jātaṃ nīlaṃ kuṇḍalakajātaṃ pradakṣiṇāvartam /
SA20bsa034_u:6237: ślakṣṇatvāt tvace rajo malasya kāye nāvatiṣṭhate /
SA20bsa034_u:6250: prabhūtatvāj jihvāyāḥ mukhājjihavāṃ nirṇāmya sarvamukhamaṇḍalamavacchādayati yāvantakaṃ kleśaparyantam /
SA20bsa034_u:6258: ūrṇā cāsya bhrūvormadhye jātā śvetā śaṃkhanibhā pradakṣiṇāvartā /
SA20bsa034_u:6276: dve pārśve dve kakṣe dvau stanauabhisamasya ṣaḍanuvyañjane bhavanti /
SA20bsa034_u:6278: ityetyāni adhaḥ kāyagatāni grīvāyāma ūrdhvaṃ sthāpayitvā ṣaṣṭiranuvyañjanāni bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:6290: ityetāni grīvāyāḥ ūrdhvaṃ kāye viṃśatiranuvyañjanāni bhavanti /
SA20bsa034_u:6291: pūrvakāni ca ṣaṣṭiḥ paścimakāni ca viṃśatirekadhyamabhisaṃkṣipya aśītiranuvyañjanāni bhavanti /
SA20bsa034_u:6292: ityetāni lakṣaṇānuvyañjanāni [bhadrāṇi] śuddhāśayabhūmipraviṣṭo bodhisattvo vipākataḥ pratilabhate /
SA20bsa034_u:6295: hīnaistu taiḥ pūrvamapi bodhisattvabhūtaḥ samanvāgato bhavati śuddhādhyāśayabhūmimupādāya /
SA20bsa034_u:6296: sarvaścāviśeṣeṇa bodhisambhāraḥ sarveṣāṃ lakṣaṇānuvyañjanānāṃ nirvartako bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:6308_0: apyeva te tasya pāpakasya karmaṇo vipakṣabhūtasya vicitrasya yatprātipakṣikaṃ vicitraṃ
SA20bsa034_u:6308_1: kuśalaṃ lakṣaṇānuvyañjananirvartakaṃ karma tasyedaṃ vicitraphalānuśaṃsaṃ śrutvā tasya
SA20bsa034_u:6312: mātāpitrorupasthānena vicitreṇa vicitrayā ca sattvopadravārakṣayā āgamana-gamanādiparispandamupādāya cakrāṅkapādatāṃ pratilabhate /
SA20bsa034_u:6314: yaiśca tribhiḥ karmabhiretāni trīṇi mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni nirdiṣṭāni taireva sarvaiḥ samastairāyatapādapārṣṇitvaṃ pratilabhate /
SA20bsa034_u:6315: tatra trayāṇāmapi lakṣaṇānāṃ saṃniśrayatvāt caturbhiḥ saṃgrahavastubhirgurūn saṃgṛhya jālapāṇipādatāṃ pratilabhate /
SA20bsa034_u:6317: kuśaladharmāsaṃtuṣṭyā uttarottarān kuśalāndharmānvardha yitvā ucchaṅgacaraṇatāṃ pratilabhate /
SA20bsa034_u:6318: yathāvaddharmānudgṛhya paryavāpya pareṣāṃ ca deśayitvā dautyañca samyak pareṣāṃ kṛtvā aiṇeyajaṅghatāṃ pratilabhate /
SA20bsa034_u:6320: tatrānavanataḥ glāneṣu ca glānopasthānaṃ kṛtvā bhaiṣajyañca dattvā vyādhyanavanatocchrayaṇān mātrāśī ca kāmeṣvanavanataḥ anavanatakāyatāṃ pratilabhate /

SA20bsa034_u:6363: tadanyāsu taduttarottarāsu bodhisattvabhūmiṣu viśuddhireṣāṃ [Dutt_264] veditavyā tāthāgatyāṃ niṣṭhāgamanabhūmau suviśuddhataiṣāṃ niruttaratā ca veditavyā /

SA20bsa034_u:6390: savāsanānāṃ sarvakleśapakṣyāṇāṃ dauṣṭhulyānāmāśrayān niravaśeṣato 'tyantaparamaḥ sve cātmabhāve yathākāmādānasthānacyutivaśavartitā sarvākārā āśrayaśuddhistyucyate /

SA20bsa034_u:6427: sarva[ku]vaidyapratijñā pratikṣepaṇavat svayaṃ ca niyataṃ vyādhipraśamanapratijñānavatpariṣadi samyak siṃhanādaṃ naditaṃ draṣṭavyam /

SA20bsa034_u:6544: sarvāsravāṇāmaśeṣānuśayaprahāṇādyattat prātipakṣikamanāsravaṃ cittamanāśravā prajñāparamādhiprajñasaṃgṛhītā āsravāṇāṃ kṣayādanāsravā cetovimuktiḥ prajñāvimuktirityucyate /

SA20bsa034_u:6579: iyameṣāṃ samatā vihāraviśeṣastu tathāgatānāmanyonyaṃ bhavedanyena balavihāreṇa anyastathāgatastadvahulavihārī bhavati /

SA20bsa034_u:6596: kathañca punastathāgatā bodhisattvamādikarmikaṃ tatprathamakarmikaṃ samādhisambhāraparigrahe 'vasthitañcittasthitikāmaṃ cittasthitaye 'vavadanti /
SA20bsa034_u:6597: iha tathāgato bodhisattvāsataṃ samādhisambhāragurukamādikarmikaṃ tatprathamakarmikaṃ tatprathamataḥ evamavavadati /
SA20bsa034_u:6598: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra praviviktaśayanāsanagata ekākī advitīyo yatte mātāpitṛbhyāṃ nāma vyavasthāpitamācāryopādhyāyābhyāṃ vā tadeva nāmādhyātmaṃ manasikuru /
SA20bsa034_u:6599: evañca punarmanasikuru-asti me [sa] kaścitṣaḍāyatanavinirmukto dharmaḥ svabhāvena pariniṣpannaḥ adhyātmaṃ vā bahirdhā vā ubhayamantareṇa vā vidyate /
SA20bsa034_u:6600: yatredaṃ nāma [Dutt_273] saṃjñā prajñaptiḥ upacāraḥ pravartate sa tvamevaṃ yoniśo manasikurvaṃstaṃ dharmaṃ nopalapsyase /
SA20bsa034_u:6603: yadā ca te kulaputra tasmin svanāmni āgantukasaṃjñā utpānna bhavati pratilabdhā sa tvaṃ yā te cakṣuṣi cakṣurnāma cakṣuḥsaṃjñā cakṣuḥ-prajñaptistāmadhyātmaṃ yoniśomanasikuru /
SA20bsa034_u:6610: tatra yaccakṣuṣi nāma saṃjñā prajñaptistattāvanna cakṣuḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:6611: yadapi tadvastu yatra cakṣuḥsaṃjñā tadapi svabhāvato na cakṣuḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:6613: na hi tatra cakṣurnāma cakṣuḥsaṃjñāṃ cakṣuḥprajñaptiṃ vinā kasyacit cakṣurbuddhiḥ pravartate /
SA20bsa034_u:6615: yena nāmnā 'bhilapyate na tatra punastadapekṣā cakṣurityevaṃ buddhiḥ pravartate /
SA20bsa034_u:6616: nānyatra prakṛtyaivāśruto 'parikalpita-nāmakānāmapi tasmin vastuni cakṣuriti buddhiḥ pravartate /
SA20bsa034_u:6617: na ca punaḥ pravartamānā upalabhyate tasmādidamapi cakṣurnāma cakṣuḥsaṃjñā cakṣuḥprajñaptiḥ āgantuke dharme saṃjñā āgantukī /
SA20bsa034_u:6620: evaṃ [te] svātmani yā saṃjñā [avasthā] tasyā vibhavāya prayogamārgaḥ samyak parigṛhīto bhaviṣyati /
SA20bsa034_u:6621: vistareṇa yāvatsarvadharmeṣu yā saṃjñā tasyā vibhavāya prayogamārgaḥ samyak parigṛhīto bhaviṣyati /
SA20bsa034_u:6622_0: sa tvamevaṃ sarvajñeya-suvicāritayā buddhyā evaṃ te sarvadharmasaṃjñāsvāgantukasaṃjñayā
SA20bsa034_u:6624: sa tvaṃ sacedaśubhāṃ manasikaroṣi enaṃ manasikāraṃ mā riñciṣyasi /
SA20bsa034_u:6625_0: sa cenmaitrī midaṃpratyayatā pratītyasamutpādaṃ dhātuprabhedamānāpānasmṛtiṃ prathamaṃ
SA20bsa034_u:6627: evaṃ te 'yaṃ bodhisattva manaskāro 'nupūrveṇa yāvadanuttarāyai samyaksambodhaye niryāsyatīti /
SA20bsa034_u:6632: śrāvako 'pi cānena manaskāreṇa prayujyamānaḥ kṣiprābhijñataraḥ syād dharmābhisamayāya yadi śaknuyādetaṃ manasikāraṃ yathāvatprativeddhum /
SA20bsa034_u:6633: sarvatrāgaminī pratipat jñānabalena tathāgataḥ sarvaduḥkha-nairyāṇikīmanairyāṇikīṃ ca pratipadaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
SA20bsa034_u:6635: pūrve nivāsānusmṛtijñānabalena tathāgataḥ pūrvānte itivṛttakāṃśca jātakāṃśca smṛtvā cittasaṃvegāya cittaprasādāya vineyānāṃ deśayati /
SA20bsa034_u:6639: āsravakṣayajñānabalena tathāgataḥ sve ca vimokṣe niṣkāṃkṣo bhavati nirvicikitsaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:6643: sahābhisaṃbodhādanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodhestathāgataḥ sarvāṇyeva daśa balāni sakṛtpratilabhate /
SA20bsa034_u:6645: abhisaṃbuddhamātra eva tathāgato dharmāṇāṃ samyageva hetuphalavyavasthānaṃ sthānāsthānajñāgabalena vyavalokayati /
SA20bsa034_u:6646: vyavalokya kāmadhātāveva sabhāge dhātāviṣṭaphala-viśeṣārthikānāṃ karmasvakatā-jñānabalenākuśalakarmaparivarjanāṃ kuśalakarmasamudācāratāñca vyapadiśati /
SA20bsa034_u:6654: tata evaṃ samyak prayuktaḥ śamathopastabdho aprahīṇakleśasamudācārayogākṛte kṛtābhimānināmabhimānaṃ tyājayati āsravakṣayajñānabalena /
SA20bsa034_u:6657: iha tathāgato 'nuttarāṃ samyaksambodhibhisaṃbudhya tatprathamataḥ sthānāsthānajñānabalaṃ sammukhīkṛtya pratītyasamutpanneṣu dharmeṣu paramaṃ dharmasthitijñānaṃ vyavacārayati /
SA20bsa034_u:6658: tacca dharmasthitijñānaṃ niḥśritya karmasvakatājñānabalena gṛhipakṣaṃ vyavalokayati yena yena karmaṇā vicitreṇa teṣāṃ gṛhipakṣāśritānāṃ samudāgamo 'bhūdbhaviṣyati vidyate [ca] /
SA20bsa034_u:6660: kimastyasmin kaścid pravrajitapakṣe duḥkhānniḥsṛto duḥkhān niḥsaraṇāya ca mārgasya deśayitā /
SA20bsa034_u:6662: sa nāstīti avagamya nisrāṇamaśaraṇaṃ sarvaṃ lokamavekṣya mahākaruṇāmupādāya buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ vyavalokayati /
SA20bsa034_u:6664: santi sattvā loke jātā [loke] vṛddhā mṛdvindriyā api madhyendriyā api tīkṣṇendriyā apīti /
SA20bsa034_u:6666: tataḥ pūrvavatsarvānukramo nānādhimuktyādikānāṃ tadanyeṣāṃ balānāṃ veditavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:6669: pūrvaṃ tāvattathāgato 'bhisaṃbudhyamātra eva sthānāsthānajñānabalena pratītyasamutpannaṃ dharmadhātuṃ vicārayati /
SA20bsa034_u:6670: tataḥ karmasvakajñānabalena yeṣu pratītatyasamutpanneṣu dharmeṣu sattvasaṃjñātaṃ sattvadhātuṃ vicārayati /
SA20bsa034_u:6671: amī sattvā evaṃ rūpasya svayaṃkṛtasya karmaṇa evaṃ rūpaṃ phalaṃ pratyanubhavantīti /
SA20bsa034_u:6672: dharmadhātuṃ [sattvadhātuṃ] ca yathāvadvyavacārayitvā dhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattijñānabalena tāneva sattvān duḥkhavimokṣāya samyak tribhiḥ prātihāryairavavadati /
SA20bsa034_u:6673: avavadan pūrvaṃvadananukrameṇāvaśiṣṭairvalairindriyādīni jñātvā mārge cāvatārayitvā tān sattvān duḥkhādvimocayati /
SA20bsa034_u:6676: tatra sthānāsthānajñānavalasya karmasvakajñānabalasya ca ko viśeṣaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:6677: yatkuśalākuśalasya karmaṇa iṣṭāniṣṭaphalaṃ nirvartate idaṃ sthānāsthānajñānabalāt /
SA20bsa034_u:6678: yatpunarya eva kuśalākuśalaṃ karma karoti sa eva tadiṣṭāniṣṭaphalaṃ pratyanubhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:6680: yattāvadya eva dhyānavimokṣādīnāṃ samāpattyā tasyaiva te bhavanti /
SA20bsa034_u:6709: prakṛtisthaṃ bījaṃ pūrvābhyāsasamutthitaṃ bījaṃ viśodhyaṃ bījam /
SA20bsa034_u:6720: yatpunaḥ pravibhajya vyavahārapadānugataṃ pūrvavat ṣaḍvidhaṃ caritaṃ prajānāti /
SA20bsa034_u:6732: tatra catvāryetāni sthānāni tathāgataiḥ pariṣadi pratijñātavyāni bhavanti /
SA20bsa034_u:6737: vimokṣakāmānāṃ ca sattvānāṃ duḥkhasamatikramāya nairyāṇiko mārgaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:6739: tasyaiva ca mārgasya prāptivibandhabhūtā ye āntarāyikā dharmāḥ parivarjayitavyāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:6742_0: ataḥ pratijñāviguṇāṃ dvayoḥ pūrvayoḥ sthānayoḥ kāyavāṅmanaśceṣṭāṃ pratijñāviguṇāṃ
SA20bsa034_u:6742_1: ca dvayoḥ paścimayoḥ sthānayoḥ pūrvāparavirodhatāmayuktipatitāñcāpareṣāṃ divyadṛśāṃ
SA20bsa034_u:6742_3: nimittabhūtāmasamanupaśyan yenaitāni sthānāni viśārado 'līnacitto nirāśaṅko nirbhīḥ pratijānāti /
SA20bsa034_u:6743: etāvacca śāstrā pratijñātavyam yaduta paripūrṇā svahitapratipattiḥ parahitapratipattiśca /
SA20bsa034_u:6744: tatra pūrvakābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ sthānābhyāṃ paripūrṇā svahitapratipattiḥ pratijñātā bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:6750: yo vā me bodhisattvānāṃ śrāvakāṇāñca nairyāṇiko mārgo deśita iti vistaraḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:6754: dīrgharātraṃ tathāgata evaṃ kāmaḥ kaccinmayā sudeśite dharme vineyāḥ pratipattau yathāvadavatiṣṭeranniti /
SA20bsa034_u:6755: tasya ca dīrgharātraṃ tatkāmasya dharmasvāmino gaṇaparikarṣakasya tasyāḥ prārthitāyāḥ sampattibhyāmasaṃkleśasribhiḥ smṛtyupasthānaiḥ samāsataḥ prabhāvyate /
SA20bsa034_u:6762: tṛtīyā punaḥ pariṣadyāsyāṃ tadekatyāḥ samyak pratipadyante tadekatyā mithyā pratipadyante /
SA20bsa034_u:6765: etattathāgatasya tribhirarakṣyaiḥ paridīpitam yadapi tadarthato 'pi kiñcidavyākṛtaṃ kukṛtamātrakaṃ bhavati kadācitkarhicitsmṛtipramoṣāt /
SA20bsa034_u:6771: api tu niṣṭhuraṃ pratipadyate nāsya teṣvanurakṣā utpadyate /
SA20bsa034_u:6772: mā haiva me śrāvakāḥ saṃvāsānvayādapariśuddhakāyavāṅmanaḥ-samudācāratāṃ viditvā tena vastunā 'nāttamanaskā anabhirāddhyāścodayiṣyanti /
SA20bsa034_u:6775: tatra tathāgatānāṃ mahākaruṇā sarvākārā yathā pūrvanirdiṣṭā pūjāsevāpramāṇapaṭale veditavyā /
SA20bsa034_u:6777: tatra tathāgatasyānuṣṭeyaṃ yacca bhavati [yatra ca bhavati] yathā ca bhavati yadā ca bhavati tatra tasya tathā tadā samyaganuṣṭhānādiyaṃ tathāgatasyāsammoṣadharmatetyucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:6778: iti yā ca tatra tathāgatasya sarvakṛtyeṣu sarvadeśeṣu sarvakṛtyopāyeṣu sarvakāleṣu smṛtyasaṃpramoṣatā sadopasthitasmṛtitā /
SA20bsa034_u:6780: tatra yā tathāgatasya spandite vā prekṣite vā kathite vā vihāre vā kleśasadbhāvasadṛśaṃ ceṣṭā 'samudācāra-pracāratā /
SA20bsa034_u:6782: arhatāṃ punaḥ prahīṇakleśānāmapi kleśasadbhāvasadṛśī ceṣṭā spandita-prekṣita-kathita-vihṛteṣu bhavatyeva /
SA20bsa034_u:6790: tatra yacca sarvākāraṃ jñānaṃ yacca varajñānaṃ tadaikadhyamabhisaṃkṣipya sarvākāravarajñānamityucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:6792: tatra lakṣaṇānuvyañjanānyanena bodhisattvabhūtena carame bhave supariśuddhāni pratilabdhāni bhavanti /
SA20bsa034_u:6793_0: yadā tu bodhimaṇḍe niṣīdati suparipūrṇa-bodhisaṃbhāramārgo bodhisattvaḥ paścime bhave
SA20bsa034_u:6793_2: nāma samādhiṃ pratilabhate śaikṣyabhūtasya bodhisattvasya vajropamasamādhi-saṃgṛhītam /
SA20bsa034_u:6794: tasyānantaraṃ dvitīye kṣaṇe pariśiṣṭānāṃ daśabalādīnāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ sarvākāra-varajñāna-paryavasānānāṃ suviśuddhatāṃ niruttaratāṃ sakṛtpratilabhate /
SA20bsa034_u:6795: teṣāñca lābhāt sarvasmin jñeye 'saktamanāvaraṇaṃ suviśuddhaṃ nirmalaṃ jñānaṃ pravartate ābhogamātra-pratibaddham /
SA20bsa034_u:6799: sāragatasya ca jñeyāvaraṇapakṣyasya dauṣṭhulyasya niravaśeṣaṃ prahāṇādasyāśrayaḥ parivṛtto bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:6801: anyāḥ sarvāḥ paramavihārāvasānā bodhisattvānāmāśrayaparivṛttayaḥ sottarā eva veditavyāḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:6802: tatra niṣṭhāgamana-bhūmisthitasya ca bodhisattvasya [tathāgatasya ca kathaṃ jñānaviśeṣo 'vagantavyo jñānāntaram /
SA20bsa034_u:6803: iha niṣṭhāgamana-bhūmisthitasya bodhisattvasya] pelavapaṭāntaritaṃ yathācakṣuṣmato rūpadarśanam /
SA20bsa034_u:6804: evaṃ tasya sarvasmin jñeye jñānaṃ veditavyam /
SA20bsa034_u:6807: tadyathā sarvākāraraṃga-paripūrṇaṃ citrakarma paścimayā suviśuddhayā raṃgalekhayā 'pariśodhitam /
SA20bsa034_u:6813: tadyathā cakṣuṣmata ārādrūpadarśanam evaṃ evaṃ bodhisattvasya pūrvavat yathā āsanne evaṃ tathāgatasya pūrvavat /
SA20bsa034_u:6814: yathā mṛdutaimirikasya rūpadarśanam evaṃ bodhisattvasya pūrvavat yathā suviśuddha-cakṣuṣaḥ evaṃ tathāgatasya pūrvavat /
SA20bsa034_u:6815: yathā garbhagatasyātmabhāva evaṃ niṣṭhāgamanabhūmisthito bodhisattvo draṣṭavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:6817: yathārhataḥ svapnāntaragatasya cittapracārastathā niṣṭhāgamana-bhūmisthitasya bodhisattvasya draṣṭavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:6818: yathā tasyaiva prativibuddhasya cittapracāra evaṃ tathāgatasya draṣṭavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:6819: tadyathā pradīpasyāviśuddhasya svabhāvaḥ tathā niṣṭhāgamana-bhūmisthitasya bodhisattvasya jñānasvabhāvo draṣṭavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:6820: yathā suviśuddhasya pradīpasya svabhāvaḥ evaṃ tathāgatasya jñānasvabhāvo draṣṭavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:6822: evamabhisaṃbuddho bodhistathāgato daśasu dikṣu sarvabuddhakṣetre sarvabuddhakāryaṃ karoti /
SA20bsa034_u:6828: sve mahāpuruṣabhāve [Dutt_281] ādita eva cittaprasādakārakamahāpuruṣa[bhāva]saṃpratyayajananā prathamaṃ tathā[gata]kṛtyaṃ tacca lakṣaṇānuvyañjanaiḥ sampādayati /
SA20bsa034_u:6832: yattathāgato daśabhirtāthāgatabalaiḥ sampādayati tathā hi tathāgato daśabhiḥ pūrvanirdiṣṭairvalaiḥ sarvasattvānāṃ sarvārthasampādanaṃ prati samartho bhavati /
SA20bsa034_u:6833: ye cainaṃ tathāgatabalānyārabhya praśnaṃ pṛcchanti yathā yāni tathāgatena jñātāni dṛṣṭāni viditāni vijñātāni tathā tāni tathāgatasteṣāṃ praśnaṃ pṛṣṭo vyākaroti /
SA20bsa034_u:6835: yattathāgato vaiśāradyaiḥ sampādayati tathāgatājñāyāṃ sthiteṣvasyiteṣu ca vineyeṣvasaṃkliṣṭacittatā pañcamaṃ tathāgatakṛtyam /
SA20bsa034_u:6836: yattathāgataḥ smṛtyupasthānaiḥ sampādayati yathāvādi tathākāritā ṣaṣṭhaṃ tathāgatakṛtyam /
SA20bsa034_u:6837: yattathāgataḥ arakṣyaiḥ sampādayati buddhacakṣuṣā rātrindivaṃ sarvalokavyavalokanā saptamaṃ tathāgatakṛtyam /
SA20bsa034_u:6840: yattathāgato 'sammoṣadharmatayā sampādayati tathāgatasyācāravihārasya yathāvadanuvartanā adhitiṣṭhanā navamaṃ tathāgatakṛtyam /
SA20bsa034_u:6841_0: yattathāgato vāsanāsamuddhātena sampādayati ye dharmā anarthopasaṃhitā ye ca naivārthopasaṃhitānānārthopasaṃhitāstānabhinirvarjya
SA20bsa034_u:6841_1: ye ca dharmā arthopasaṃhitāsteṣāṃ samākhyānaṃ vivaraṇā uttānīkarme daśamaṃ tathāgatakṛtyam /
SA20bsa034_u:6842: yattathāgataḥ sarvākāravarajñānena sampādayati evaṃ hi tathāgato 'nenāveṇikena catvāriṃśaduttareṇa buddhadharmaśatena daśatathāgata kṛtyāni kurvan sarvabuddhakāryaṃ karoti /
SA20bsa034_u:6843: vistaravibhāgataḥ punarasyaiva buddhakāryasya na sukarāsaṃkhyāṃ kartuṃ yāvatkalpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrairapi /
SA20bsa034_u:6844: ayaṃ sa tathāgato vihārastathāgatī bhūmiḥ pratiṣṭhetyucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:6846_0: etāmāśrityaitāṃ pratiṣṭhāya yasyāḥ spṛhayamāṇarūpā bodhisattvā bodhisattvaśikṣāsu
SA20bsa034_u:6846_1: śikṣante adhigamyāpi ca tāṃ pratiṣṭhāmetāmevāśrityaitāṃ pratiṣṭhāya sarvasattvānāṃ
SA20bsa034_u:6849: sarve caite buddhadharmā atyarthaṃ parārthakriyānukūlāḥ parārthakriyāprabhāvitāśca tathāgatānām /
SA20bsa034_u:6852: santi ca te buddhadharmā ye sarveṇa sarvaṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddheṣu nopalabhyante /
SA20bsa034_u:6855: tathāgatasya tu sarve copalabhyante sarvākāraparipūrṇāścātikrāntatarāśca praṇītatarāśca /
SA20bsa034_u:6860: sarvabodhisattva-śikṣāmārgasya śikṣāmārgaphalasya ca tarvākārasya nirdeśāya adhiṣṭhānabhūtam sā khalviyaṃ bodhisattvabhūmirbodhisattvapiṭakamātṛketyapyucyate /
SA20bsa034_u:6864_0: yaḥ kaścit sadevamānuṣā[surā]llokāddevabhūto vā [manuṣyabhūto vā] śramaṇo vā brāhmaṇo
SA20bsa034_u:6864_2: bhāvanākāreṇa vā prayokṣyate pareṣāṃ vā vistareṇa prakāśayiṣyatyantato lekhayitvā
SA20bsa034_u:6865_0: tasya samāsato yāvān puṇyaskandho bhagavatā sarvabodhisattvapiṭake saṃgṛhītasya sūtrāntasya
SA20bsa034_u:6865_1: śravaṇādikarmaṇa ākhyāta uttāno vivṛtaḥ prajñaptaḥ prakāśitaḥ tāvānasya puṇyaskandhaḥ pratyāśaṃsitavyaḥ /
SA20bsa034_u:6867: tathā hyasyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sarvasya bodhisattvapiṭakasyoddeśanirdeśamukhāni saṃgṛhītānyākhyātāni /
SA20bsa034_u:6868_0: yāvaccāsyāṃ [bodhisattva]bhūmau yo dharmavinayo vistareṇa prakāśitaḥ sa bahulamuddeśasvādhyāya-dharmānudharmapratipattitaḥ
SA20bsa034_u:6868_1: sthāsyati pṛthuvṛddhivaipulyatāñca gamiṣyati na tāvatsaddharmapratirūpakāḥ pracurā
SA20bsa034_u:6869: yataśca punaḥ saddharmapratirūpakāḥ pracurā bhaviṣyanti tataścāyaṃ saddharmo bhūtārthopasaṃhito tasya tadantardhānaṃ bhaviṣyati /
SA20bsa034_u:6870: iti bodhisattvabhūmāvādhāre niṣṭhe yogasthāne ṣaṣṭhaṃ pratiṣṭhāpaṭalam /
SA20bsa034_u:6873: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāntathāgato hyavadat /
SA20bsa034_u:6874: teṣāñca yo nirodha evaṃ vādī mahāśramaṇaḥ //
